[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     44[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       const id1 = generateId();
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     45[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       const id2 = generateId();
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     46[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       expect(id1).not.toBe(id2);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     47[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       expect(id1).toHaveLength(21); // nanoid default length
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     48[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     });

[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     65[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   describe('Function Utilities', () => {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     66[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     test('debounce should delay function execution', async () => {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     67[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       const mockFn = jest.fn();
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     68[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       const debouncedFn = debounce(mockFn, 100);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     69[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     70[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       debouncedFn();
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     71[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       debouncedFn();
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     72[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       debouncedFn();
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     73[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     74[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       expect(mockFn).not.toHaveBeenCalled();
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     75[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     76[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       await sleep(150);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     77[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       expect(mockFn).toHaveBeenCalledTimes(1);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     78[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     });
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     79[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     80[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     test('throttle should limit function calls', async () => {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     81[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       const mockFn = jest.fn();
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     82[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       const throttledFn = throttle(mockFn, 100);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     83[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     84[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       throttledFn();
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     85[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       throttledFn();
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     86[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       throttledFn();
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     87[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     88[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       expect(mockFn).toHaveBeenCalledTimes(1);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     89[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     90[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       await sleep(150);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     91[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       throttledFn();
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     92[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       expect(mockFn).toHaveBeenCalledTimes(2);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     93[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     });
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     94[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   });
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     95[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     96[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   describe('Object Utilities', () => {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     97[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     test('deepMerge should merge objects deeply', () => {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     98[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       const obj1 = { a: 1, b: { c: 2 } };
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     99[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       const obj2 = { b: { d: 3 }, e: 4 };
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    100[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       const result = deepMerge(obj1, obj2);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    101[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    102[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       expect(result).toEqual({
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    103[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         a: 1,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    104[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         b: { c: 2, d: 3 },
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    105[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         e: 4
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    106[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       });
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    107[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     });
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    108[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    109[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     test('pick should select specified properties', () => {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    110[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       const obj = { a: 1, b: 2, c: 3 };
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    111[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       expect(pick(obj, ['a', 'c'])).toEqual({ a: 1, c: 3 });
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    112[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     });
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    113[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    114[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     test('omit should exclude specified properties', () => {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    115[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       const obj = { a: 1, b: 2, c: 3 };
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    116[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       expect(omit(obj, ['b'])).toEqual({ a: 1, c: 3 });
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    117[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     });
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    118[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    119[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     test('isEmptyObject should detect empty objects', () => {

[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    121[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       expect(isEmptyObject({ a: 1 })).toBe(false);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    122[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     });
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    123[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   });
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    124[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    125[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   describe('String Utilities', () => {

[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    127[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       expect(capitalize('hello')).toBe('Hello');
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    128[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       expect(capitalize('HELLO')).toBe('Hello');
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    129[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     });
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    130[39m:[38;5;10m[49m

[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    132[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       expect(slugify('Hello World!')).toBe('hello-world');
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    133[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       expect(slugify('Test & Example')).toBe('test-example');
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    134[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     });
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    135[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    136[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     test('truncate should truncate long strings', () => {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    137[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       expect(truncate('Hello World', 5)).toBe('Hello...');
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    138[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       expect(truncate('Hi', 10)).toBe('Hi');
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    139[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     });
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    140[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   });
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    141[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    142[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   describe('Async Utilities', () => {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    143[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     test('retry should retry failed operations', async () => {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    144[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       let attempts = 0;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    145[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       const failingFn = async () => {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    146[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         attempts++;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    147[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         if (attempts < 3) throw new Error('Failed');
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    148[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         return 'Success';
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    149[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       };
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    150[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    151[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       const result = await retry(failingFn, 3);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    152[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       expect(result).toBe('Success');
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    153[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       expect(attempts).toBe(3);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    154[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     });
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    155[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    156[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     test('sleep should delay execution', async () => {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    157[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       const start = Date.now();
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    158[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       await sleep(100);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    159[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       const end = Date.now();
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    160[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       expect(end - start).toBeGreaterThanOrEqual(90);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    161[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     });
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    162[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   });
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    163[39m:[38;5;10m[49m

[0m[49m[38;5;10m+      4[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+      5[39m:[38;5;10m[49m import { test, expect } from '@playwright/test';
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+      6[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+      7[39m:[38;5;10m[49m test.describe('API Endpoints', () => {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+      8[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   let authToken: string;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+      9[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     10[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   test.beforeAll(async ({ request }) => {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     11[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     // Get auth token
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     12[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     const response = await request.post('/api/auth/login', {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     13[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       data: {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     14[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         email: 'test@example.com',
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     15[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         password: 'password123'
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     16[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     17[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     });
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     18[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     19[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     expect(response.ok()).toBeTruthy();
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     20[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     const data = await response.json();
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     21[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     authToken = data.token;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     22[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   });
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     23[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     24[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   test.describe('Authentication API', () => {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     25[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     test('should login with valid credentials', async ({ request }) => {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     26[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       const response = await request.post('/api/auth/login', {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     27[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         data: {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     28[39m:[38;5;10m[49m           email: 'test@example.com',
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     29[39m:[38;5;10m[49m           password: 'password123'
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     30[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     31[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       });
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     32[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     33[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       expect(response.ok()).toBeTruthy();
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     34[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       const data = await response.json();

[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     40[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       const response = await request.post('/api/auth/login', {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     41[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         data: {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     42[39m:[38;5;10m[49m           email: 'invalid@example.com',

[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    198[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   test.describe('Error Handling', () => {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    199[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     test('should handle 404 errors', async ({ request }) => {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    200[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       const response = await request.get('/api/nonexistent');
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    201[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       expect(response.status()).toBe(404);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    202[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     });
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    203[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    204[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     test('should handle rate limiting', async ({ request }) => {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    205[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       // Make multiple rapid requests
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    206[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       const promises = Array.from({ length: 100 }, () =>
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    207[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         request.get('/api/users/profile', {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    208[39m:[38;5;10m[49m           headers: {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    209[39m:[38;5;10m[49m             'Authorization': `Bearer ${authToken}`
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    210[39m:[38;5;10m[49m           }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    211[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         })
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    212[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       );
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    213[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    214[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       const responses = await Promise.all(promises);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    215[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       const rateLimitedResponses = responses.filter(r => r.status() === 429);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    216[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    217[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       // Should have some rate limited responses
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    218[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       expect(rateLimitedResponses.length).toBeGreaterThan(0);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    219[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     });
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    220[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   });
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    221[39m:[38;5;10m[49m });

[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     93[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     it('should reject duplicate email', async () => {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     94[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       // First registration

   pnpm ci:lint
   [0m[38;5;10m[0m[0m[0m

[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     39[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     40[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   constructor(
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     41[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     @InjectQueue('event-processing') private eventQueue: Queue,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     42[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     @InjectQueue('user-activity') private userActivityQueue: Queue,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     43[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     @InjectQueue('system-metrics') private systemMetricsQueue: Queue,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     44[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   ) {}
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     45[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     46[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   // HTTP endpoint for direct event ingestion
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     47[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   async ingestEvent(event: AnalyticsEvent): Promise<void> {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     48[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     this.logger.debug(`Ingesting event: ${event.type} from ${event.source}`);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     49[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     50[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     await this.eventQueue.add('process-event', event, {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     51[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       priority: this.getEventPriority(event.type),
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     52[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       attempts: 3,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     53[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       backoff: {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     54[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         type: 'exponential',
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     55[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         delay: 2000,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     56[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       },
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     57[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     });
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     58[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     59[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     60[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   // Microservice event handlers
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     61[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   @EventPattern('user.activity')
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     62[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   async handleUserActivity(activity: UserActivity): Promise<void> {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     63[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     this.logger.debug(`Processing user activity: ${activity.action} by ${activity.userId}`);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     64[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     65[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     await this.userActivityQueue.add('process-user-activity', activity, {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     66[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       priority: 5,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     67[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       attempts: 3,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     68[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     });
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     69[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     70[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     71[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   @EventPattern('system.metrics')
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     72[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   async handleSystemMetrics(metrics: SystemMetrics): Promise<void> {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     73[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     this.logger.debug(`Processing system metrics: ${metrics.metric} from ${metrics.service}`);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     74[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     75[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     await this.systemMetricsQueue.add('process-system-metrics', metrics, {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     76[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       priority: 3,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     77[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       attempts: 2,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     78[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     });
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     79[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     80[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     81[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   @MessagePattern('analytics.health')
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     82[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   async getHealth(): Promise<{ status: string; queues: Record<string, number> }> {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     83[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     const eventQueueCount = await this.eventQueue.count();
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     84[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     const userActivityQueueCount = await this.userActivityQueue.count();
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     85[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     const systemMetricsQueueCount = await this.systemMetricsQueue.count();
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     86[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     87[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     return {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     88[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       status: 'healthy',
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     89[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       queues: {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     90[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         'event-processing': eventQueueCount,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     91[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         'user-activity': userActivityQueueCount,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     92[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         'system-metrics': systemMetricsQueueCount,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     93[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       },
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     94[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     };
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     95[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     96[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     97[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   // Batch ingestion for high-volume scenarios
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     98[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   async ingestEventsBatch(events: AnalyticsEvent[]): Promise<void> {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     99[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     this.logger.debug(`Batch ingesting ${events.length} events`);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    100[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    101[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     const jobs = events.map(event => ({
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    102[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       name: 'process-event',
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    103[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       data: event,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    104[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       opts: {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    105[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         priority: this.getEventPriority(event.type),
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    106[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         attempts: 3,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    107[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       },
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    108[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     }));
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    109[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    110[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     await this.eventQueue.addBulk(jobs);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    111[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    112[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    113[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   // Real-time streaming ingestion
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    114[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   async ingestStream(eventStream: AsyncIterable<AnalyticsEvent>): Promise<void> {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    115[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     this.logger.debug('Starting stream ingestion');
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    116[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    117[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     for await (const event of eventStream) {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    118[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       await this.ingestEvent(event);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    119[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    120[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    121[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    122[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   private getEventPriority(eventType: string): number {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    123[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     const priorityMap: Record<string, number> = {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    124[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       'error': 10,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    125[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       'security': 9,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    126[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       'payment': 8,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    127[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       'user.signup': 7,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    128[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       'user.login': 6,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    129[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       'page.view': 3,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    130[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       'click': 2,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    131[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       'scroll': 1,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    132[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     };
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    133[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    134[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     return priorityMap[eventType] || 5;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    135[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    136[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    137[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   // Data validation and enrichment
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    138[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   private enrichEvent(event: AnalyticsEvent): AnalyticsEvent {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    139[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     return {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    140[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       ...event,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    141[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       metadata: {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    142[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         ...event.metadata,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    143[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         ingestionTime: new Date(),
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    144[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         version: '1.0',
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    145[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         source: event.source || 'unknown',
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    146[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       },
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    147[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     };
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    148[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    149[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    150[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   // Get ingestion statistics
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    151[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   async getIngestionStats(): Promise<{
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    152[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     totalProcessed: number;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    153[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     processingRate: number;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    154[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     queueSizes: Record<string, number>;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    155[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     errorRate: number;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    156[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   }> {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    157[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     const [eventStats, userActivityStats, systemMetricsStats] = await Promise.all([
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    158[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       this.eventQueue.getJobCounts(),
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    159[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       this.userActivityQueue.getJobCounts(),
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    160[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       this.systemMetricsQueue.getJobCounts(),
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    161[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     ]);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    162[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    163[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     const totalProcessed = 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    164[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       eventStats.completed + 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    165[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       userActivityStats.completed + 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    166[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       systemMetricsStats.completed;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    167[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    168[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     const totalFailed = 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    169[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       eventStats.failed + 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    170[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       userActivityStats.failed + 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    171[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       systemMetricsStats.failed;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    172[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    173[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     return {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    174[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       totalProcessed,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    175[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       processingRate: totalProcessed / (Date.now() / 1000 / 60), // per minute
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    176[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       queueSizes: {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    177[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         events: eventStats.waiting + eventStats.active,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    178[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         userActivity: userActivityStats.waiting + userActivityStats.active,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    179[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         systemMetrics: systemMetricsStats.waiting + systemMetricsStats.active,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    180[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       },
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    181[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       errorRate: totalFailed / (totalProcessed + totalFailed) || 0,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    182[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     };
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    183[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    184[39m:[38;5;10m[49m }

[0m[49m[38;5;10m+      6[39m:[38;5;10m[49m export interface RealTimeMetric {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+      7[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   id: string;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+      8[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   name: string;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+      9[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   value: number;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     10[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   timestamp: Date;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     11[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   dimensions: Record<string, string>;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     12[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   aggregationType: 'sum' | 'avg' | 'count' | 'max' | 'min';
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     13[39m:[38;5;10m[49m }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     14[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     15[39m:[38;5;10m[49m export interface Alert {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     16[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   id: string;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     17[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   type: 'threshold' | 'anomaly' | 'trend';
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     18[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   severity: 'low' | 'medium' | 'high' | 'critical';
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     19[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   message: string;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     20[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   metric: string;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     21[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   value: number;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     22[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   threshold?: number;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     23[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   timestamp: Date;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     24[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   metadata: Record<string, any>;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     25[39m:[38;5;10m[49m }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     26[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     27[39m:[38;5;10m[49m @Injectable()
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     28[39m:[38;5;10m[49m export class RealTimeProcessingService {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     29[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   private readonly logger = new Logger(RealTimeProcessingService.name);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     30[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   private readonly metricsCache = new Map<string, RealTimeMetric[]>();
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     31[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   private readonly alertsCache = new Map<string, Alert[]>();
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     32[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     33[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   constructor(
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     34[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     @InjectQueue('stream-processing') private streamQueue: Queue,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     35[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     @InjectQueue('aggregation') private aggregationQueue: Queue,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     36[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     @InjectQueue('alerts') private alertsQueue: Queue,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     37[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   ) {}

[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     39[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   // Process real-time events
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     40[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   async processRealTimeEvent(event: any): Promise<void> {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     41[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     this.logger.debug(`Processing real-time event: ${event.type}`);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     42[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     43[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     // Add to stream processing queue
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     44[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     await this.streamQueue.add('process-stream-event', event, {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     45[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       priority: 8,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     46[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       attempts: 2,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     47[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       removeOnComplete: 100,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     48[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       removeOnFail: 50,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     49[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     });
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     50[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     51[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     52[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   // Generate real-time metrics
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     53[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   async generateMetrics(timeWindow: string = '1m'): Promise<RealTimeMetric[]> {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     54[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     const cacheKey = `metrics_${timeWindow}`;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     55[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     56[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     if (this.metricsCache.has(cacheKey)) {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     57[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       return this.metricsCache.get(cacheKey)!;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     58[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     59[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     60[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     // Simulate real-time metrics generation
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     61[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     const metrics: RealTimeMetric[] = [
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     62[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     63[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         id: crypto.randomUUID(),
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     64[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         name: 'active_users',
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     65[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         value: Math.floor(Math.random() * 1000) + 100,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     66[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         timestamp: new Date(),
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     67[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         dimensions: { source: 'web' },
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     68[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         aggregationType: 'count',
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     69[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       },
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     70[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     71[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         id: crypto.randomUUID(),
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     72[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         name: 'page_views_per_minute',
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     73[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         value: Math.floor(Math.random() * 500) + 50,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     74[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         timestamp: new Date(),
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     75[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         dimensions: { source: 'all' },
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     76[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         aggregationType: 'sum',
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     77[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       },
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     78[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     79[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         id: crypto.randomUUID(),
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     80[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         name: 'avg_response_time',
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     81[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         value: Math.random() * 200 + 50,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     82[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         timestamp: new Date(),
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     83[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         dimensions: { service: 'api' },
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     84[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         aggregationType: 'avg',
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     85[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       },
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     86[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     87[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         id: crypto.randomUUID(),
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     88[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         name: 'error_rate',
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     89[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         value: Math.random() * 5,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     90[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         timestamp: new Date(),
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     91[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         dimensions: { service: 'all' },
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     92[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         aggregationType: 'avg',
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     93[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       },
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     94[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     ];
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     95[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     96[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     // Cache for 30 seconds
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     97[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     this.metricsCache.set(cacheKey, metrics);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     98[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     setTimeout(() => this.metricsCache.delete(cacheKey), 30000);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     99[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    100[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     return metrics;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    101[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    102[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    103[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   // Real-time aggregations
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    104[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   async performAggregation(
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    105[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     metric: string,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    106[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     timeWindow: string,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    107[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     aggregationType: 'sum' | 'avg' | 'count' | 'max' | 'min'
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    108[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   ): Promise<number> {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    109[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     await this.aggregationQueue.add('perform-aggregation', {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    110[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       metric,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    111[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       timeWindow,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    112[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       aggregationType,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    113[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       timestamp: new Date(),
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    114[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     });
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    115[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    116[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     // Simulate aggregation result
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    117[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     switch (aggregationType) {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    118[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       case 'sum':
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    119[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         return Math.floor(Math.random() * 10000);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    120[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       case 'avg':
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    121[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         return Math.random() * 100;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    122[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       case 'count':
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    123[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         return Math.floor(Math.random() * 1000);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    124[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       case 'max':
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    125[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         return Math.random() * 1000;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    126[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       case 'min':
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    127[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         return Math.random() * 10;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    128[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       default:
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    129[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         return 0;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    130[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    131[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    132[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    133[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   // Alert processing
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    134[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   async processAlert(alert: Alert): Promise<void> {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    135[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     this.logger.warn(`Processing alert: ${alert.type} - ${alert.message}`);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    136[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    137[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     await this.alertsQueue.add('process-alert', alert, {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    138[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       priority: this.getAlertPriority(alert.severity),
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    139[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       attempts: 3,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    140[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     });
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    141[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    142[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     // Cache recent alerts
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    143[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     const alertsKey = `alerts_${alert.type}`;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    144[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     const existingAlerts = this.alertsCache.get(alertsKey) || [];
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    145[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     existingAlerts.push(alert);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    146[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    147[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     // Keep only last 100 alerts
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    148[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     if (existingAlerts.length > 100) {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    149[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       existingAlerts.splice(0, existingAlerts.length - 100);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    150[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    151[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    152[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     this.alertsCache.set(alertsKey, existingAlerts);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    153[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    154[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    155[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   // Get real-time dashboard data
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    156[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   async getDashboardData(): Promise<{
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    157[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     metrics: RealTimeMetric[];
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    158[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     alerts: Alert[];
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    159[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     systemHealth: Record<string, any>;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    160[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   }> {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    161[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     const metrics = await this.generateMetrics();
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    162[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     const recentAlerts = this.getRecentAlerts();
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    163[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     const systemHealth = await this.getSystemHealth();
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    164[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    165[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     return {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    166[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       metrics,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    167[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       alerts: recentAlerts,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    168[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       systemHealth,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    169[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     };
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    170[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    171[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    172[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   // Anomaly detection
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    173[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   async detectAnomalies(metric: string, value: number): Promise<boolean> {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    174[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     // Simple threshold-based anomaly detection
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    175[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     const thresholds: Record<string, { min: number; max: number }> = {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    176[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       'error_rate': { min: 0, max: 10 },
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    177[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       'response_time': { min: 0, max: 1000 },
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    178[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       'active_users': { min: 10, max: 10000 },
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    179[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     };
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    180[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    181[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     const threshold = thresholds[metric];
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    182[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     if (!threshold) return false;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    183[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    184[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     const isAnomaly = value < threshold.min || value > threshold.max;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    185[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    186[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     if (isAnomaly) {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    187[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       await this.processAlert({
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    188[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         id: crypto.randomUUID(),
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    189[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         type: 'anomaly',
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    190[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         severity: value > threshold.max * 2 ? 'critical' : 'high',
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    191[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         message: `Anomaly detected in ${metric}: ${value}`,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    192[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         metric,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    193[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         value,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    194[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         threshold: threshold.max,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    195[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         timestamp: new Date(),
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    196[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         metadata: { detectionMethod: 'threshold' },
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    197[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       });
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    198[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    199[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    200[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     return isAnomaly;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    201[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    202[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    203[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   // Scheduled tasks
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    204[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   @Cron(CronExpression.EVERY_MINUTE)
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    205[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   async generatePeriodicMetrics(): Promise<void> {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    206[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     this.logger.debug('Generating periodic metrics');
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    207[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     await this.generateMetrics();
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    208[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    209[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    210[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   @Cron(CronExpression.EVERY_5_MINUTES)
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    211[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   async performHealthCheck(): Promise<void> {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    212[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     this.logger.debug('Performing system health check');
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    213[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     const health = await this.getSystemHealth();
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    214[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    215[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     // Check for unhealthy conditions
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    216[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     if (health.queueHealth.some((q: any) => q.status === 'unhealthy')) {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    217[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       await this.processAlert({
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    218[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         id: crypto.randomUUID(),
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    219[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         type: 'threshold',
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    220[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         severity: 'medium',
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    221[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         message: 'Queue health degraded',
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    222[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         metric: 'queue_health',
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    223[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         value: 0,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    224[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         timestamp: new Date(),
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    225[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         metadata: { healthCheck: health },
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    226[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       });
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    227[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    228[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    229[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    230[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   private getAlertPriority(severity: string): number {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    231[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     const priorityMap: Record<string, number> = {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    232[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       'critical': 10,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    233[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       'high': 8,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    234[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       'medium': 5,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    235[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       'low': 2,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    236[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     };
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    237[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     return priorityMap[severity] || 5;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    238[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    239[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    240[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   private getRecentAlerts(): Alert[] {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    241[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     const allAlerts: Alert[] = [];
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    242[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     for (const alerts of this.alertsCache.values()) {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    243[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       allAlerts.push(...alerts);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    244[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    245[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    246[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     return allAlerts
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    247[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       .sort((a, b) => b.timestamp.getTime() - a.timestamp.getTime())
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    248[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       .slice(0, 20);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    249[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    250[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    251[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   private async getSystemHealth(): Promise<Record<string, any>> {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    252[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     const [streamStats, aggregationStats, alertsStats] = await Promise.all([
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    253[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       this.streamQueue.getJobCounts(),
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    254[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       this.aggregationQueue.getJobCounts(),
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    255[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       this.alertsQueue.getJobCounts(),
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    256[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     ]);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    257[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    258[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     return {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    259[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       timestamp: new Date(),
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    260[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       queueHealth: [
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    261[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    262[39m:[38;5;10m[49m           name: 'stream-processing',
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    263[39m:[38;5;10m[49m           status: streamStats.failed > streamStats.completed * 0.1 ? 'unhealthy' : 'healthy',
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    264[39m:[38;5;10m[49m           stats: streamStats,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    265[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         },
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    266[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         {

[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    268[39m:[38;5;10m[49m           status: aggregationStats.failed > aggregationStats.completed * 0.1 ? 'unhealthy' : 'healthy',
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    269[39m:[38;5;10m[49m           stats: aggregationStats,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    270[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         },
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    271[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         {

[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    275[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         },

[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     72[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       priority: this.getPriority(request.priority),
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     73[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       attempts: this.getMaxAttempts(channel),
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     74[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       backoff: {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     75[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         type: 'exponential',
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     76[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         delay: 2000,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     77[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       },
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     78[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       delay: request.scheduledAt ? request.scheduledAt.getTime() - Date.now() : 0,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     79[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       removeOnComplete: 100,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     80[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       removeOnFail: 50,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     81[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     };
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     82[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     83[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     switch (channel) {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     84[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       case 'email':
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     85[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         await this.emailQueue.add('send-email', jobData, jobOptions);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     86[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         break;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     87[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       case 'sms':
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     88[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         await this.smsQueue.add('send-sms', jobData, jobOptions);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     89[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         break;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     90[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       case 'push':
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     91[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         await this.pushQueue.add('send-push', jobData, jobOptions);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     92[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         break;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     93[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       case 'slack':
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     94[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         await this.slackQueue.add('send-slack', jobData, jobOptions);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     95[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         break;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     96[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       case 'discord':
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     97[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         await this.discordQueue.add('send-discord', jobData, jobOptions);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     98[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         break;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     99[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       case 'webhook':
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    100[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         await this.webhookQueue.add('send-webhook', jobData, jobOptions);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    101[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         break;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    102[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       default:
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    103[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         this.logger.warn(`Unknown notification channel: ${channel}`);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    104[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    105[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    106[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    107[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   // Bulk notification sending
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    108[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   async sendBulkNotifications(requests: NotificationRequest[]): Promise<{
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    109[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     total: number;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    110[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     queued: number;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    111[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     failed: number;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    112[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   }> {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    113[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     this.logger.debug(`Sending bulk notifications: ${requests.length} requests`);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    114[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    115[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     let queued = 0;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    116[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     let failed = 0;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    117[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    118[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     const promises = requests.map(async (request) => {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    119[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       try {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    120[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         await this.sendNotification(request);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    121[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         queued++;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    122[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       } catch (error) {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    123[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         this.logger.error(`Failed to queue notification ${request.id}:`, error);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    124[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         failed++;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    125[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    126[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     });
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    127[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    128[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     await Promise.allSettled(promises);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    129[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    130[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     return {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    131[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       total: requests.length,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    132[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       queued,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    133[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       failed,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    134[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     };
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    135[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    136[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    137[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   // Event handlers for microservice communication
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    138[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   @EventPattern('user.registered')
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    139[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   async handleUserRegistered(data: { userId: string; email: string; name: string }): Promise<void> {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    140[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     await this.sendNotification({
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    141[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       id: crypto.randomUUID(),
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    142[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       userId: data.userId,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    143[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       type: 'email',
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    144[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       priority: 'normal',
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    145[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       template: 'welcome',
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    146[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       data: {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    147[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         name: data.name,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    148[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         email: data.email,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    149[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       },
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    150[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       channels: ['email'],
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    151[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     });
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    152[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    153[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    154[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   @EventPattern('user.password_reset')
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    155[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   async handlePasswordReset(data: { userId: string; email: string; resetToken: string }): Promise<void> {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    156[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     await this.sendNotification({
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    157[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       id: crypto.randomUUID(),
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    158[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       userId: data.userId,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    159[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       type: 'email',
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    160[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       priority: 'high',
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    161[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       template: 'password-reset',
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    162[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       data: {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    163[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         email: data.email,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    164[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         resetToken: data.resetToken,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    165[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         resetUrl: `${process.env.FRONTEND_URL}/reset-password?token=${data.resetToken}`,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    166[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       },
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    167[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       channels: ['email'],
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    168[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       expiresAt: new Date(Date.now() + 24 * 60 * 60 * 1000), // 24 hours
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    169[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     });
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    170[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    171[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    172[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   @EventPattern('system.alert')
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    173[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   async handleSystemAlert(data: { 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    174[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     type: string; 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    175[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     severity: string; 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    176[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     message: string; 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    177[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     metadata: Record<string, any> 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    178[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   }): Promise<void> {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    179[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     const channels = ['slack'];
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    180[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     if (data.severity === 'critical') {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    181[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       channels.push('sms', 'discord');
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    182[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    183[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    184[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     await this.sendNotification({
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    185[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       id: crypto.randomUUID(),
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    186[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       userId: 'system',
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    187[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       type: 'slack',
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    188[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       priority: data.severity === 'critical' ? 'urgent' : 'high',
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    189[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       template: 'system-alert',
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    190[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       data: {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    191[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         type: data.type,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    192[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         severity: data.severity,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    193[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         message: data.message,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    194[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         timestamp: new Date(),
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    195[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         ...data.metadata,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    196[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       },
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    197[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       channels,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    198[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     });
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    199[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    200[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    201[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   @MessagePattern('notification.status')
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    202[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   async getNotificationStatus(notificationId: string): Promise<NotificationStatus[]> {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    203[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     // Get status from all queues
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    204[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     const queues = [
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    205[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       { name: 'email', queue: this.emailQueue },
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    206[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       { name: 'sms', queue: this.smsQueue },
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    207[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       { name: 'push', queue: this.pushQueue },
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    208[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       { name: 'slack', queue: this.slackQueue },
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    209[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       { name: 'discord', queue: this.discordQueue },
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    210[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       { name: 'webhook', queue: this.webhookQueue },
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    211[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     ];
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    212[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    213[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     const statuses: NotificationStatus[] = [];
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    214[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    215[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     for (const { name, queue } of queues) {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    216[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       const jobs = await queue.getJobs(['completed', 'failed', 'active', 'waiting']);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    217[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       const relevantJobs = jobs.filter(job => job.data.id === notificationId);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    218[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    219[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       for (const job of relevantJobs) {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    220[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         statuses.push({
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    221[39m:[38;5;10m[49m           id: notificationId,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    222[39m:[38;5;10m[49m           status: this.mapJobStatus(job.opts.jobId ? 'completed' : 'pending'),
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    223[39m:[38;5;10m[49m           channel: name,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    224[39m:[38;5;10m[49m           sentAt: job.finishedOn ? new Date(job.finishedOn) : undefined,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    225[39m:[38;5;10m[49m           error: job.failedReason,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    226[39m:[38;5;10m[49m           attempts: job.attemptsMade,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    227[39m:[38;5;10m[49m           maxAttempts: job.opts.attempts || 1,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    228[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         });
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    229[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    230[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    231[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    232[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     return statuses;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    233[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    234[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    235[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   // Get notification statistics
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    236[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   async getNotificationStats(): Promise<{
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    237[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     totalSent: number;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    238[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     totalFailed: number;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    239[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     channelStats: Record<string, { sent: number; failed: number }>;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    240[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     recentActivity: Array<{ timestamp: Date; channel: string; status: string; count: number }>;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    241[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   }> {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    242[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     const queues = [
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    243[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       { name: 'email', queue: this.emailQueue },
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    244[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       { name: 'sms', queue: this.smsQueue },
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    245[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       { name: 'push', queue: this.pushQueue },
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    246[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       { name: 'slack', queue: this.slackQueue },
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    247[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       { name: 'discord', queue: this.discordQueue },
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    248[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       { name: 'webhook', queue: this.webhookQueue },
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    249[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     ];
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    250[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    251[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     let totalSent = 0;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    252[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     let totalFailed = 0;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    253[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     const channelStats: Record<string, { sent: number; failed: number }> = {};
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    254[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    255[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     for (const { name, queue } of queues) {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    256[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       const jobCounts = await queue.getJobCounts();
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    257[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       const sent = jobCounts.completed;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    258[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       const failed = jobCounts.failed;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    259[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    260[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       totalSent += sent;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    261[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       totalFailed += failed;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    262[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       channelStats[name] = { sent, failed };
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    263[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    264[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    265[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     return {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    266[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       totalSent,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    267[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       totalFailed,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    268[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       channelStats,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    269[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       recentActivity: [], // Would be populated from a time-series database
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    270[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     };
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    271[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    272[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    273[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   // Template management
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    274[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   async getTemplate(templateName: string): Promise<{
