[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     24[39m:[38;5;10m[49m export interface EventHandler<T = any> {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     25[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   handle(event: T): Promise<void> | void;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     26[39m:[38;5;10m[49m }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     27[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     28[39m:[38;5;10m[49m export interface Saga {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     29[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   id: string;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     30[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   type: string;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     31[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   status: 'pending' | 'running' | 'completed' | 'failed' | 'compensating';
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     32[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   steps: SagaStep[];
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     33[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   currentStep: number;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     34[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   data: Record<string, any>;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     35[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   createdAt: Date;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     36[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   updatedAt: Date;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     37[39m:[38;5;10m[49m }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     38[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     39[39m:[38;5;10m[49m export interface SagaStep {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     40[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   id: string;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     41[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   name: string;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     42[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   service: string;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     43[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   action: string;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     44[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   compensationAction?: string;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     45[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   status: 'pending' | 'completed' | 'failed' | 'compensated';
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     46[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   data?: Record<string, any>;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     47[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   error?: string;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     48[39m:[38;5;10m[49m }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     49[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     50[39m:[38;5;10m[49m @Injectable()
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     51[39m:[38;5;10m[49m export class EventBusService implements OnModuleInit, OnModuleDestroy {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     52[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   private readonly logger = new Logger(EventBusService.name);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     53[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   private client: ClientProxy;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     54[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   private redis: Redis.RedisClientType;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     55[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   private eventStream = new Subject<DomainEvent>();
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     56[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   private eventHandlers = new Map<string, EventHandler[]>();
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     57[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   private sagas = new Map<string, Saga>();
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     58[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   private connectionStatus = new BehaviorSubject<'connected' | 'disconnected' | 'error'>('disconnected');
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     59[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     60[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   constructor() {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     61[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     this.initializeRedisClient();
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     62[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     this.initializeMicroserviceClient();
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     63[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     64[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     65[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   async onModuleInit() {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     66[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     await this.connect();
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     67[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     this.setupEventListeners();
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     68[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     69[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     70[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   async onModuleDestroy() {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     71[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     await this.disconnect();
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     72[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     73[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     74[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   private initializeRedisClient() {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     75[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     this.redis = Redis.createClient({
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     76[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       host: process.env.REDIS_HOST || 'localhost',
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     77[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       port: parseInt(process.env.REDIS_PORT || '6379'),
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     78[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       retryDelayOnFailover: 100,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     79[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       maxRetriesPerRequest: 3,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     80[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     });
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     81[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     82[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     this.redis.on('connect', () => {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     83[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       this.logger.log('Connected to Redis');
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     84[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       this.connectionStatus.next('connected');
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     85[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     });
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     86[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     87[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     this.redis.on('error', (error) => {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     88[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       this.logger.error('Redis connection error:', error);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     89[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       this.connectionStatus.next('error');
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     90[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     });
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     91[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     92[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     93[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   private initializeMicroserviceClient() {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     94[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     this.client = ClientProxyFactory.create({
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     95[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       transport: Transport.REDIS,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     96[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       options: {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     97[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         host: process.env.REDIS_HOST || 'localhost',
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     98[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         port: parseInt(process.env.REDIS_PORT || '6379'),
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     99[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         retryAttempts: 5,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    100[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         retryDelay: 3000,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    101[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       },
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    102[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     });
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    103[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    104[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    105[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   private async connect() {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    106[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     try {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    107[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       await this.redis.connect();
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    108[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       await this.client.connect();
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    109[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       this.logger.log('Event bus connected successfully');
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    110[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     } catch (error) {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    111[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       this.logger.error('Failed to connect event bus:', error);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    112[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       throw error;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    113[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    114[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    115[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    116[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   private async disconnect() {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    117[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     try {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    118[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       await this.redis.disconnect();
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    119[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       await this.client.close();
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    120[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       this.logger.log('Event bus disconnected');
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    121[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     } catch (error) {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    122[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       this.logger.error('Error disconnecting event bus:', error);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    123[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    124[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    125[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    126[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   // Publish domain event
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    127[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   async publishEvent(event: DomainEvent): Promise<void> {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    128[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     try {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    129[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       // Add metadata
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    130[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       const enrichedEvent: DomainEvent = {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    131[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         ...event,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    132[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         id: event.id || crypto.randomUUID(),
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    133[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         timestamp: event.timestamp || new Date(),
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    134[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         metadata: {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    135[39m:[38;5;10m[49m           ...event.metadata,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    136[39m:[38;5;10m[49m           publishedAt: new Date(),
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    137[39m:[38;5;10m[49m           source: event.metadata?.source || 'event-bus',
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    138[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         },
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    139[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       };
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    140[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    141[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       // Store event in event store
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    142[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       await this.storeEvent(enrichedEvent);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    143[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    144[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       // Publish to Redis streams
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    145[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       await this.redis.xAdd(
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    146[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         `events:${event.aggregateType}`,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    147[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         '*',
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    148[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    149[39m:[38;5;10m[49m           eventId: enrichedEvent.id,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    150[39m:[38;5;10m[49m           eventType: enrichedEvent.type,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    151[39m:[38;5;10m[49m           data: JSON.stringify(enrichedEvent),
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    152[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    153[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       );
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    154[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    155[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       // Emit to microservices
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    156[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       this.client.emit(event.type, enrichedEvent);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    157[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    158[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       // Emit to local event stream
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    159[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       this.eventStream.next(enrichedEvent);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    160[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    161[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       this.logger.debug(`Published event: ${event.type} for ${event.aggregateType}:${event.aggregateId}`);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    162[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     } catch (error) {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    163[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       this.logger.error(`Failed to publish event ${event.type}:`, error);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    164[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       throw error;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    165[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    166[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    167[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    168[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   // Subscribe to events
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    169[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   subscribe<T = any>(eventType: string): Observable<T> {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    170[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     return this.eventStream.pipe(
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    171[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       filter(event => event.type === eventType),
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    172[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       map(event => event as T)
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    173[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     );
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    174[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    175[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    176[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   // Register event handler
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    177[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   registerHandler(eventType: string, handler: EventHandler): void {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    178[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     if (!this.eventHandlers.has(eventType)) {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    179[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       this.eventHandlers.set(eventType, []);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    180[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    181[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     this.eventHandlers.get(eventType)!.push(handler);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    182[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     this.logger.debug(`Registered handler for event type: ${eventType}`);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    183[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    184[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    185[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   // Unregister event handler
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    186[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   unregisterHandler(eventType: string, handler: EventHandler): void {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    187[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     const handlers = this.eventHandlers.get(eventType);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    188[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     if (handlers) {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    189[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       const index = handlers.indexOf(handler);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    190[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       if (index > -1) {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    191[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         handlers.splice(index, 1);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    192[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         this.logger.debug(`Unregistered handler for event type: ${eventType}`);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    193[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    194[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    195[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    196[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    197[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   // Saga orchestration
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    198[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   async startSaga(saga: Omit<Saga, 'id' | 'createdAt' | 'updatedAt'>): Promise<string> {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    199[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     const sagaId = crypto.randomUUID();
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    200[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     const newSaga: Saga = {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    201[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       ...saga,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    202[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       id: sagaId,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    203[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       createdAt: new Date(),
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    204[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       updatedAt: new Date(),
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    205[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     };
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    206[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    207[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     this.sagas.set(sagaId, newSaga);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    208[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     await this.storeSaga(newSaga);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    209[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    210[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     // Start executing saga
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    211[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     this.executeSaga(sagaId);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    212[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    213[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     this.logger.debug(`Started saga: ${saga.type} with ID: ${sagaId}`);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    214[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     return sagaId;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    215[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    216[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    217[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   private async executeSaga(sagaId: string): Promise<void> {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    218[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     const saga = this.sagas.get(sagaId);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    219[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     if (!saga || saga.status !== 'pending') return;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    220[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    221[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     try {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    222[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       saga.status = 'running';
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    223[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       await this.updateSaga(saga);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    224[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    225[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       for (let i = saga.currentStep; i < saga.steps.length; i++) {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    226[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         const step = saga.steps[i];
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    227[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    228[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         try {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    229[39m:[38;5;10m[49m           // Execute step
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    230[39m:[38;5;10m[49m           await this.executeSagaStep(saga, step);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    231[39m:[38;5;10m[49m           step.status = 'completed';
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    232[39m:[38;5;10m[49m           saga.currentStep = i + 1;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    233[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         } catch (error) {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    234[39m:[38;5;10m[49m           step.status = 'failed';
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    235[39m:[38;5;10m[49m           step.error = error.message;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    236[39m:[38;5;10m[49m           
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    237[39m:[38;5;10m[49m           // Start compensation
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    238[39m:[38;5;10m[49m           await this.compensateSaga(saga, i);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    239[39m:[38;5;10m[49m           return;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    240[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    241[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    242[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    243[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       saga.status = 'completed';
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    244[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       await this.updateSaga(saga);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    245[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    246[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       this.logger.debug(`Saga completed: ${saga.type} (${sagaId})`);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    247[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     } catch (error) {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    248[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       saga.status = 'failed';
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    249[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       await this.updateSaga(saga);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    250[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       this.logger.error(`Saga failed: ${saga.type} (${sagaId}):`, error);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    251[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    252[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    253[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    254[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   private async executeSagaStep(saga: Saga, step: SagaStep): Promise<void> {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    255[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     const event: DomainEvent = {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    256[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       id: crypto.randomUUID(),
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    257[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       type: `saga.${step.action}`,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    258[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       aggregateId: saga.id,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    259[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       aggregateType: 'saga',
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    260[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       version: 1,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    261[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       timestamp: new Date(),
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    262[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       data: {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    263[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         sagaId: saga.id,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    264[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         stepId: step.id,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    265[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         service: step.service,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    266[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         action: step.action,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    267[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         ...step.data,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    268[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         ...saga.data,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    269[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       },
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    270[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       metadata: {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    271[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         sagaType: saga.type,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    272[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         stepName: step.name,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    273[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       },
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    274[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     };
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    275[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    276[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     await this.publishEvent(event);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    277[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    278[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    279[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   private async compensateSaga(saga: Saga, failedStepIndex: number): Promise<void> {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    280[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     saga.status = 'compensating';
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    281[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     await this.updateSaga(saga);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    282[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    283[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     // Execute compensation actions in reverse order
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    284[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     for (let i = failedStepIndex - 1; i >= 0; i--) {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    285[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       const step = saga.steps[i];
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    286[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    287[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       if (step.compensationAction && step.status === 'completed') {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    288[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         try {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    289[39m:[38;5;10m[49m           const compensationEvent: DomainEvent = {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    290[39m:[38;5;10m[49m             id: crypto.randomUUID(),
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    291[39m:[38;5;10m[49m             type: `saga.${step.compensationAction}`,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    292[39m:[38;5;10m[49m             aggregateId: saga.id,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    293[39m:[38;5;10m[49m             aggregateType: 'saga',
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    294[39m:[38;5;10m[49m             version: 1,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    295[39m:[38;5;10m[49m             timestamp: new Date(),
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    296[39m:[38;5;10m[49m             data: {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    297[39m:[38;5;10m[49m               sagaId: saga.id,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    298[39m:[38;5;10m[49m               stepId: step.id,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    299[39m:[38;5;10m[49m               service: step.service,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    300[39m:[38;5;10m[49m               action: step.compensationAction,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    301[39m:[38;5;10m[49m               ...step.data,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    302[39m:[38;5;10m[49m               ...saga.data,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    303[39m:[38;5;10m[49m             },
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    304[39m:[38;5;10m[49m             metadata: {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    305[39m:[38;5;10m[49m               sagaType: saga.type,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    306[39m:[38;5;10m[49m               stepName: step.name,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    307[39m:[38;5;10m[49m               isCompensation: true,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    308[39m:[38;5;10m[49m             },
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    309[39m:[38;5;10m[49m           };
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    310[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    311[39m:[38;5;10m[49m           await this.publishEvent(compensationEvent);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    312[39m:[38;5;10m[49m           step.status = 'compensated';
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    313[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         } catch (error) {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    314[39m:[38;5;10m[49m           this.logger.error(`Compensation failed for step ${step.name}:`, error);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    315[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    316[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    317[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    318[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    319[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     saga.status = 'failed';
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    320[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     await this.updateSaga(saga);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    321[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    322[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    323[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   // Event sourcing
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    324[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   async getEventHistory(aggregateId: string, aggregateType: string): Promise<DomainEvent[]> {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    325[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     const key = `events:${aggregateType}:${aggregateId}`;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    326[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     const events = await this.redis.lRange(key, 0, -1);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    327[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     return events.map(eventData => JSON.parse(eventData));
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    328[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    329[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    330[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   async replayEvents(aggregateId: string, aggregateType: string, fromVersion?: number): Promise<void> {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    331[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     const events = await this.getEventHistory(aggregateId, aggregateType);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    332[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     const filteredEvents = fromVersion 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    333[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       ? events.filter(event => event.version >= fromVersion)
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    334[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       : events;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    335[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    336[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     for (const event of filteredEvents) {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    337[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       this.eventStream.next(event);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    338[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    339[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    340[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    341[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   // Health and monitoring
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    342[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   getConnectionStatus(): Observable<'connected' | 'disconnected' | 'error'> {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    343[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     return this.connectionStatus.asObservable();
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    344[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    345[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    346[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   async getEventStats(): Promise<{
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    347[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     totalEvents: number;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    348[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     eventsByType: Record<string, number>;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    349[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     activeSagas: number;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    350[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     completedSagas: number;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    351[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     failedSagas: number;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    352[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   }> {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    353[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     const eventKeys = await this.redis.keys('events:*');
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    354[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     let totalEvents = 0;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    355[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     const eventsByType: Record<string, number> = {};
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    356[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    357[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     for (const key of eventKeys) {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    358[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       const count = await this.redis.lLen(key);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    359[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       totalEvents += count;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    360[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       const type = key.split(':')[1];
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    361[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       eventsByType[type] = count;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    362[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    363[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    364[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     const activeSagas = Array.from(this.sagas.values()).filter(s => s.status === 'running').length;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    365[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     const completedSagas = Array.from(this.sagas.values()).filter(s => s.status === 'completed').length;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    366[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     const failedSagas = Array.from(this.sagas.values()).filter(s => s.status === 'failed').length;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    367[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    368[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     return {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    369[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       totalEvents,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    370[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       eventsByType,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    371[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       activeSagas,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    372[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       completedSagas,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    373[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       failedSagas,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    374[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     };
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    375[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    376[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    377[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   private setupEventListeners(): void {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    378[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     this.eventStream.subscribe(event => {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    379[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       const handlers = this.eventHandlers.get(event.type) || [];
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    380[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       handlers.forEach(async handler => {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    381[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         try {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    382[39m:[38;5;10m[49m           await handler.handle(event);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    383[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         } catch (error) {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    384[39m:[38;5;10m[49m           this.logger.error(`Event handler failed for ${event.type}:`, error);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    385[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    386[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       });
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    387[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     });
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    388[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    389[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    390[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   private async storeEvent(event: DomainEvent): Promise<void> {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    391[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     const key = `events:${event.aggregateType}:${event.aggregateId}`;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    392[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     await this.redis.rPush(key, JSON.stringify(event));
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    393[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    394[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     // Also store in global event log
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    395[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     await this.redis.rPush('events:all', JSON.stringify(event));
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    396[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    397[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    398[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   private async storeSaga(saga: Saga): Promise<void> {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    399[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     const key = `saga:${saga.id}`;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    400[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     await this.redis.set(key, JSON.stringify(saga));
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    401[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    402[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    403[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   private async updateSaga(saga: Saga): Promise<void> {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    404[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     saga.updatedAt = new Date();
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    405[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     this.sagas.set(saga.id, saga);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    406[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     await this.storeSaga(saga);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    407[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    408[39m:[38;5;10m[49m }
[0m[K

[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    144[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       pathRewrite: (path: string) => {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    145[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         // Remove /api prefix for backend services
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    146[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         return path.replace(/^\/api/, '');
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    147[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       },
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    148[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       onProxyReq: (proxyReq, req: Request) => {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    149[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         // Add correlation ID
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    150[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         const correlationId = req.headers['x-correlation-id'] || this.generateCorrelationId();
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    151[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         proxyReq.setHeader('x-correlation-id', correlationId);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    152[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    153[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         // Add service metadata
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    154[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         proxyReq.setHeader('x-gateway-service', config.service);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    155[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         proxyReq.setHeader('x-gateway-version', config.version);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    156[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         proxyReq.setHeader('x-gateway-route', config.id);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    157[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    158[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         this.logger.debug(`Proxying ${req.method} ${req.path} to ${config.target}`);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    159[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       },
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    160[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       onProxyRes: (proxyRes, req: Request, res: Response) => {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    161[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         // Add response headers
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    162[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         res.setHeader('x-gateway-service', config.service);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    163[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         res.setHeader('x-response-time', Date.now() - req['startTime']);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    164[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    165[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         this.logger.debug(`Response from ${config.service}: ${proxyRes.statusCode}`);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    166[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       },
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    167[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       onError: (err, req: Request, res: Response) => {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    168[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         this.logger.error(`Proxy error for ${config.service}:`, err.message);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    169[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    170[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         if (!res.headersSent) {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    171[39m:[38;5;10m[49m           res.status(502).json({
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    172[39m:[38;5;10m[49m             error: 'Bad Gateway',
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    173[39m:[38;5;10m[49m             message: 'Service temporarily unavailable',
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    174[39m:[38;5;10m[49m             service: config.service,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    175[39m:[38;5;10m[49m             timestamp: new Date().toISOString(),
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    176[39m:[38;5;10m[49m           });
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    177[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    178[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       },
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    179[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     };
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    180[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    181[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     const proxy = createProxyMiddleware(proxyOptions);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    182[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     this.proxies.set(config.id, proxy);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    183[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    184[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     this.logger.debug(`Registered route: ${config.method} ${config.path} -> ${config.target}`);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    185[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    186[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    187[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   getRoute(routeId: string): RouteConfig | undefined {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    188[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     return this.routes.get(routeId);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    189[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    190[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    191[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   getAllRoutes(): RouteConfig[] {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    192[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     return Array.from(this.routes.values());
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    193[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    194[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    195[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   findMatchingRoute(path: string, method: string): RouteConfig | undefined {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    196[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     for (const route of this.routes.values()) {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    197[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       if (this.matchesRoute(path, method, route)) {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    198[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         return route;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    199[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    200[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    201[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     return undefined;

[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    204[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   getProxy(routeId: string): any {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    205[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     return this.proxies.get(routeId);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    206[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    207[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    208[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   async updateRouteTarget(routeId: string, newTarget: string): Promise<void> {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    209[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     const route = this.routes.get(routeId);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    210[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     if (!route) {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    211[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       throw new Error(`Route ${routeId} not found`);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    212[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    213[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    214[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     // Update route configuration
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    215[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     route.target = newTarget;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    216[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     this.routes.set(routeId, route);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    217[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    218[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     // Recreate proxy with new target
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    219[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     this.registerRoute(route);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    220[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    221[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     this.logger.log(`Updated route ${routeId} target to ${newTarget}`);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    222[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    223[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    224[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   async healthCheckRoutes(): Promise<{
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    225[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     healthy: string[];
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    226[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     unhealthy: string[];
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    227[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     total: number;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    228[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   }> {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    229[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     const healthy: string[] = [];
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    230[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     const unhealthy: string[] = [];
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    231[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    232[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     for (const route of this.routes.values()) {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    233[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       try {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    234[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         const isHealthy = await this.serviceDiscovery.checkServiceHealth(route.service);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    235[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         if (isHealthy) {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    236[39m:[38;5;10m[49m           healthy.push(route.id);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    237[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         } else {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    238[39m:[38;5;10m[49m           unhealthy.push(route.id);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    239[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    240[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       } catch (error) {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    241[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         unhealthy.push(route.id);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    242[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         this.logger.warn(`Health check failed for route ${route.id}:`, error.message);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    243[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    244[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    245[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    246[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     return {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    247[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       healthy,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    248[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       unhealthy,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    249[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       total: this.routes.size,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    250[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     };
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    251[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    252[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    253[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   private matchesRoute(path: string, method: string, route: RouteConfig): boolean {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    254[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     // Convert route path pattern to regex
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    255[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     const routePattern = route.path
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    256[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       .replace(/\*/g, '.*')
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    257[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       .replace(/\//g, '\\/');
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    258[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    259[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     const regex = new RegExp(`^${routePattern}$`);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    260[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    261[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     const pathMatches = regex.test(path);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    262[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     const methodMatches = route.method === 'ALL' || route.method === method.toUpperCase();
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    263[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    264[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     return pathMatches && methodMatches;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    265[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    266[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    267[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   private generateCorrelationId(): string {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    268[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     return `gw-${Date.now()}-${Math.random().toString(36).substr(2, 9)}`;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    269[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    270[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    271[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   // Route metrics
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    272[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   async getRouteMetrics(): Promise<{
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    273[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     routeId: string;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    274[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     requests: number;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    275[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     errors: number;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    276[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     avgResponseTime: number;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    277[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     lastUsed: Date;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    278[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   }[]> {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    279[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     // In a real implementation, this would fetch from a metrics store
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    280[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     return Array.from(this.routes.values()).map(route => ({
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    281[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       routeId: route.id,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    282[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       requests: Math.floor(Math.random() * 1000),
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    283[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       errors: Math.floor(Math.random() * 50),
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    284[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       avgResponseTime: Math.floor(Math.random() * 500) + 100,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    285[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       lastUsed: new Date(),
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    286[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     }));
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    287[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    288[39m:[38;5;10m[49m }

[49m[38;5;10m+      1[39m:[38;5;10m[49m import { Controller, Get, Post, Put, Delete, Req, Res, Next, Param, Body } from '@nestjs/common';
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+      2[39m:[38;5;10m[49m import { Request, Response, NextFunction } from 'express';
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+      3[39m:[38;5;10m[49m import { ApiTags, ApiOperation, ApiResponse } from '@nestjs/swagger';
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+      4[39m:[38;5;10m[49m import { RoutingService, RouteConfig } from './routing.service';
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+      5[39m:[38;5;10m[49m import { LoadBalancerService } from '../load-balancer/load-balancer.service';
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+      6[39m:[38;5;10m[49m import { RateLimitingService } from '../rate-limiting/rate-limiting.service';
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+      7[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+      8[39m:[38;5;10m[49m @ApiTags('Gateway Routing')
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+      9[39m:[38;5;10m[49m @Controller()
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     10[39m:[38;5;10m[49m export class RoutingController {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     11[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   constructor(
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     12[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     private readonly routingService: RoutingService,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     13[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     private readonly loadBalancer: LoadBalancerService,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     14[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     private readonly rateLimiting: RateLimitingService,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     15[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   ) {}
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     16[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     17[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   // Dynamic route handler - handles all proxied requests
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     18[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   @Get('*')
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     19[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   @Post('*')
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     20[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   @Put('*')
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     21[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   @Delete('*')
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     22[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   async handleRequest(
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     23[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     @Req() req: Request,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     24[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     @Res() res: Response,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     25[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     @Next() next: NextFunction,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     26[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   ): Promise<void> {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     27[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     const startTime = Date.now();
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     28[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     req['startTime'] = startTime;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     29[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     30[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     try {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     31[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       // Find matching route
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     32[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       const route = this.routingService.findMatchingRoute(req.path, req.method);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     33[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     34[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       if (!route) {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     35[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         return res.status(404).json({
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     36[39m:[38;5;10m[49m           error: 'Route not found',
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     37[39m:[38;5;10m[49m           path: req.path,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     38[39m:[38;5;10m[49m           method: req.method,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     39[39m:[38;5;10m[49m           timestamp: new Date().toISOString(),
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     40[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         });
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     41[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     42[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     43[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       // Apply rate limiting
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     44[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       const rateLimitResult = await this.rateLimiting.checkRateLimit(
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     45[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         req.ip,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     46[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         route.id,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     47[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         route.rateLimit,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     48[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       );
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     49[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     50[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       if (!rateLimitResult.allowed) {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     51[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         return res.status(429).json({
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     52[39m:[38;5;10m[49m           error: 'Rate limit exceeded',
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     53[39m:[38;5;10m[49m           retryAfter: rateLimitResult.retryAfter,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     54[39m:[38;5;10m[49m           limit: route.rateLimit.max,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     55[39m:[38;5;10m[49m           windowMs: route.rateLimit.windowMs,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     56[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         });
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     57[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     58[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     59[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       // Get healthy service instance
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     60[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       const serviceInstance = await this.loadBalancer.getHealthyInstance(route.service);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     61[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     62[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       if (!serviceInstance) {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     63[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         return res.status(503).json({
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     64[39m:[38;5;10m[49m           error: 'Service unavailable',
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     65[39m:[38;5;10m[49m           service: route.service,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     66[39m:[38;5;10m[49m           message: 'No healthy instances available',
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     67[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         });
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     68[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     69[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     70[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       // Update route target if needed
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     71[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       if (route.target !== serviceInstance.url) {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     72[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         await this.routingService.updateRouteTarget(route.id, serviceInstance.url);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     73[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     74[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     75[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       // Get proxy middleware
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     76[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       const proxy = this.routingService.getProxy(route.id);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     77[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     78[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       if (!proxy) {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     79[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         return res.status(500).json({
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     80[39m:[38;5;10m[49m           error: 'Internal server error',
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     81[39m:[38;5;10m[49m           message: 'Proxy not configured',
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     82[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         });
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     83[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     84[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     85[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       // Execute proxy
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     86[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       proxy(req, res, next);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     87[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     88[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     } catch (error) {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     89[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       console.error('Gateway routing error:', error);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     90[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     91[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       if (!res.headersSent) {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     92[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         res.status(500).json({
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     93[39m:[38;5;10m[49m           error: 'Internal server error',
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     94[39m:[38;5;10m[49m           message: 'Gateway processing failed',
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     95[39m:[38;5;10m[49m           timestamp: new Date().toISOString(),
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     96[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         });
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     97[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     98[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     99[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    100[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    101[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   // Admin endpoints for route management
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    102[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   @Get('/_gateway/routes')
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    103[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   @ApiOperation({ summary: 'Get all registered routes' })
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    104[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   @ApiResponse({ status: 200, description: 'Routes retrieved successfully' })
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    105[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   async getRoutes(): Promise<RouteConfig[]> {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    106[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     return this.routingService.getAllRoutes();
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    107[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    108[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    109[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   @Get('/_gateway/routes/:routeId')
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    110[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   @ApiOperation({ summary: 'Get specific route configuration' })
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    111[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   async getRoute(@Param('routeId') routeId: string): Promise<RouteConfig> {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    112[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     const route = this.routingService.getRoute(routeId);

[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    122[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     gateway: string;

[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    130[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       gateway: 'healthy',
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    131[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       routes: routeHealth,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    132[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       services: serviceHealth,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    133[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     };
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    134[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    135[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    136[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   @Get('/_gateway/metrics')

[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    138[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   async getMetrics(): Promise<{
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    139[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     routes: any[];
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    140[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     loadBalancer: any;

[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    148[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       routes: routeMetrics,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    149[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       loadBalancer: lbMetrics,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    150[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       rateLimiting: rlMetrics,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    151[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     };
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    152[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   }

[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    156[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   async updateRouteTarget(
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    157[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     @Param('routeId') routeId: string,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    158[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     @Body() body: { target: string },
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    159[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   ): Promise<{ message: string }> {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    160[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     await this.routingService.updateRouteTarget(routeId, body.target);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    161[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     return { message: `Route ${routeId} target updated to ${body.target}` };
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    162[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    163[39m:[38;5;10m[49m }

[0m[49m[38;5;10m+      7[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   service: string;

[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     10[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   lastHealthCheck: Date;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     11[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   responseTime: number;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     12[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   weight: number;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     13[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   connections: number;
