[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     17[39m:[38;5;10m[49m export interface LoadBalancingStrategy {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     18[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   name: 'round-robin' | 'weighted' | 'least-connections' | 'response-time';
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     19[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   selectInstance(instances: ServiceInstance[]): ServiceInstance | null;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     20[39m:[38;5;10m[49m }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     21[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     22[39m:[38;5;10m[49m @Injectable()
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     23[39m:[38;5;10m[49m export class LoadBalancerService {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     24[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   private readonly logger = new Logger(LoadBalancerService.name);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     25[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   private services = new Map<string, ServiceInstance[]>();
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     26[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   private roundRobinCounters = new Map<string, number>();
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     27[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   private strategies = new Map<string, LoadBalancingStrategy>();
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     28[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     29[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   constructor() {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     30[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     this.initializeStrategies();
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     31[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     this.initializeServices();
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     32[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     33[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     34[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   private initializeStrategies(): void {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     35[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     // Round Robin Strategy
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     36[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     this.strategies.set('round-robin', {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     37[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       name: 'round-robin',
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     38[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       selectInstance: (instances: ServiceInstance[]) => {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     39[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         if (instances.length === 0) return null;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     40[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     41[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         const serviceName = instances[0].service;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     42[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         const counter = this.roundRobinCounters.get(serviceName) || 0;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     43[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         const selectedIndex = counter % instances.length;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     44[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     45[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         this.roundRobinCounters.set(serviceName, counter + 1);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     46[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         return instances[selectedIndex];
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     47[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       },
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     48[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     });
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     49[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     50[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     // Weighted Strategy
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     51[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     this.strategies.set('weighted', {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     52[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       name: 'weighted',
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     53[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       selectInstance: (instances: ServiceInstance[]) => {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     54[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         if (instances.length === 0) return null;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     55[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     56[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         const totalWeight = instances.reduce((sum, instance) => sum + instance.weight, 0);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     57[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         let random = Math.random() * totalWeight;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     58[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     59[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         for (const instance of instances) {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     60[39m:[38;5;10m[49m           random -= instance.weight;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     61[39m:[38;5;10m[49m           if (random <= 0) {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     62[39m:[38;5;10m[49m             return instance;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     63[39m:[38;5;10m[49m           }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     64[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     65[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     66[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         return instances[0];
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     67[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       },
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     68[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     });
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     69[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     70[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     // Least Connections Strategy
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     71[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     this.strategies.set('least-connections', {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     72[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       name: 'least-connections',
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     73[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       selectInstance: (instances: ServiceInstance[]) => {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     74[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         if (instances.length === 0) return null;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     75[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     76[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         return instances.reduce((min, instance) => 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     77[39m:[38;5;10m[49m           instance.connections < min.connections ? instance : min
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     78[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         );
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     79[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       },
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     80[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     });
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     81[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     82[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     // Response Time Strategy
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     83[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     this.strategies.set('response-time', {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     84[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       name: 'response-time',
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     85[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       selectInstance: (instances: ServiceInstance[]) => {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     86[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         if (instances.length === 0) return null;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     87[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     88[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         return instances.reduce((fastest, instance) => 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     89[39m:[38;5;10m[49m           instance.responseTime < fastest.responseTime ? instance : fastest
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     90[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         );
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     91[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       },
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     92[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     });
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     93[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     94[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     95[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   private initializeServices(): void {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     96[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     // Backend service instances
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     97[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     this.registerService('backend', [
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     98[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     99[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         id: 'backend-1',
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    100[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         service: 'backend',
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    101[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         url: 'http://backend:3001',
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    102[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         health: 'unknown',
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    103[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         lastHealthCheck: new Date(),
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    104[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         responseTime: 0,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    105[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         weight: 100,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    106[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         connections: 0,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    107[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         metadata: { version: '1.0.0', region: 'us-east-1' },
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    108[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       },
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    109[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     ]);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    110[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    111[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     // Analytics service instances
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    112[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     this.registerService('analytics', [
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    113[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    114[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         id: 'analytics-1',
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    115[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         service: 'analytics',
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    116[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         url: 'http://analytics:3003',
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    117[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         health: 'unknown',
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    118[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         lastHealthCheck: new Date(),
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    119[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         responseTime: 0,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    120[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         weight: 100,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    121[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         connections: 0,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    122[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         metadata: { version: '1.0.0', region: 'us-east-1' },
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    123[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       },
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    124[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     ]);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    125[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    126[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     // Notification service instances
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    127[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     this.registerService('notification', [
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    128[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    129[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         id: 'notification-1',
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    130[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         service: 'notification',
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    131[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         url: 'http://notification:3004',
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    132[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         health: 'unknown',
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    133[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         lastHealthCheck: new Date(),
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    134[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         responseTime: 0,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    135[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         weight: 100,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    136[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         connections: 0,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    137[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         metadata: { version: '1.0.0', region: 'us-east-1' },
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    138[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       },
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    139[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     ]);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    140[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    141[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     this.logger.log(`Initialized ${this.services.size} services`);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    142[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    143[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    144[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   registerService(serviceName: string, instances: ServiceInstance[]): void {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    145[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     this.services.set(serviceName, instances);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    146[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     this.roundRobinCounters.set(serviceName, 0);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    147[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     this.logger.debug(`Registered service ${serviceName} with ${instances.length} instances`);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    148[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    149[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    150[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   addServiceInstance(serviceName: string, instance: ServiceInstance): void {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    151[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     const instances = this.services.get(serviceName) || [];
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    152[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     instances.push(instance);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    153[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     this.services.set(serviceName, instances);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    154[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     this.logger.debug(`Added instance ${instance.id} to service ${serviceName}`);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    155[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    156[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    157[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   removeServiceInstance(serviceName: string, instanceId: string): void {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    158[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     const instances = this.services.get(serviceName) || [];
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    159[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     const filteredInstances = instances.filter(instance => instance.id !== instanceId);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    160[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     this.services.set(serviceName, filteredInstances);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    161[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     this.logger.debug(`Removed instance ${instanceId} from service ${serviceName}`);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    162[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    163[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    164[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   async getHealthyInstance(
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    165[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     serviceName: string,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    166[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     strategy: string = 'round-robin'
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    167[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   ): Promise<ServiceInstance | null> {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    168[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     const instances = this.services.get(serviceName) || [];
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    169[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     const healthyInstances = instances.filter(instance => instance.health === 'healthy');
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    170[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    171[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     if (healthyInstances.length === 0) {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    172[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       this.logger.warn(`No healthy instances available for service ${serviceName}`);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    173[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       return null;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    174[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    175[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    176[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     const loadBalancingStrategy = this.strategies.get(strategy);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    177[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     if (!loadBalancingStrategy) {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    178[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       this.logger.warn(`Unknown strategy ${strategy}, falling back to round-robin`);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    179[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       return this.strategies.get('round-robin')!.selectInstance(healthyInstances);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    180[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    181[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    182[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     const selectedInstance = loadBalancingStrategy.selectInstance(healthyInstances);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    183[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    184[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     if (selectedInstance) {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    185[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       // Increment connection count
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    186[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       selectedInstance.connections++;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    187[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       this.logger.debug(`Selected instance ${selectedInstance.id} for service ${serviceName}`);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    188[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    189[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    190[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     return selectedInstance;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    191[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    192[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    193[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   releaseConnection(serviceName: string, instanceId: string): void {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    194[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     const instances = this.services.get(serviceName) || [];
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    195[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     const instance = instances.find(inst => inst.id === instanceId);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    196[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    197[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     if (instance && instance.connections > 0) {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    198[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       instance.connections--;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    199[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       this.logger.debug(`Released connection for instance ${instanceId}`);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    200[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    201[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    202[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    203[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   @Cron(CronExpression.EVERY_30_SECONDS)
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    204[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   async performHealthChecks(): Promise<void> {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    205[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     this.logger.debug('Performing health checks on all service instances');
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    206[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    207[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     for (const [serviceName, instances] of this.services.entries()) {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    208[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       for (const instance of instances) {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    209[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         await this.checkInstanceHealth(instance);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    210[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    211[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    212[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    213[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    214[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   private async checkInstanceHealth(instance: ServiceInstance): Promise<void> {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    215[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     const startTime = Date.now();
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    216[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    217[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     try {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    218[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       const response = await axios.get(`${instance.url}/health`, {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    219[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         timeout: 5000,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    220[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         headers: {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    221[39m:[38;5;10m[49m           'User-Agent': 'Nexus-API-Gateway-HealthCheck/1.0',
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    222[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         },
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    223[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       });
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    224[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    225[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       const responseTime = Date.now() - startTime;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    226[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    227[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       if (response.status === 200) {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    228[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         instance.health = 'healthy';
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    229[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         instance.responseTime = responseTime;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    230[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         instance.lastHealthCheck = new Date();
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    231[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    232[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         this.logger.debug(`Health check passed for ${instance.id} (${responseTime}ms)`);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    233[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       } else {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    234[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         instance.health = 'unhealthy';
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    235[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         this.logger.warn(`Health check failed for ${instance.id}: HTTP ${response.status}`);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    236[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    237[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     } catch (error) {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    238[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       instance.health = 'unhealthy';
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    239[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       instance.responseTime = Date.now() - startTime;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    240[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       instance.lastHealthCheck = new Date();
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    241[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    242[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       this.logger.warn(`Health check failed for ${instance.id}:`, error.message);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    243[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    244[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    245[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    246[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   async getServicesHealth(): Promise<{
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    247[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     service: string;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    248[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     totalInstances: number;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    249[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     healthyInstances: number;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    250[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     unhealthyInstances: number;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    251[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     avgResponseTime: number;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    252[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   }[]> {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    253[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     const result = [];
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    254[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    255[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     for (const [serviceName, instances] of this.services.entries()) {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    256[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       const healthyInstances = instances.filter(i => i.health === 'healthy').length;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    257[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       const unhealthyInstances = instances.filter(i => i.health === 'unhealthy').length;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    258[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       const avgResponseTime = instances.reduce((sum, i) => sum + i.responseTime, 0) / instances.length;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    259[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    260[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       result.push({
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    261[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         service: serviceName,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    262[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         totalInstances: instances.length,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    263[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         healthyInstances,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    264[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         unhealthyInstances,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    265[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         avgResponseTime: Math.round(avgResponseTime),
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    266[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       });
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    267[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    268[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    269[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     return result;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    270[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    271[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    272[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   async getMetrics(): Promise<{
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    273[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     totalServices: number;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    274[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     totalInstances: number;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    275[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     healthyInstances: number;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    276[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     strategies: string[];
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    277[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     requestsPerService: Record<string, number>;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    278[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   }> {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    279[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     let totalInstances = 0;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    280[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     let healthyInstances = 0;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    281[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     const requestsPerService: Record<string, number> = {};
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    282[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    283[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     for (const [serviceName, instances] of this.services.entries()) {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    284[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       totalInstances += instances.length;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    285[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       healthyInstances += instances.filter(i => i.health === 'healthy').length;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    286[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       requestsPerService[serviceName] = instances.reduce((sum, i) => sum + i.connections, 0);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    287[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    288[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    289[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     return {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    290[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       totalServices: this.services.size,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    291[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       totalInstances,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    292[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       healthyInstances,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    293[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       strategies: Array.from(this.strategies.keys()),
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    294[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       requestsPerService,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    295[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     };
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    296[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    297[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    298[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   getServiceInstances(serviceName: string): ServiceInstance[] {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    299[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     return this.services.get(serviceName) || [];
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    300[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    301[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    302[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   getAllServices(): Map<string, ServiceInstance[]> {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    303[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     return new Map(this.services);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    304[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    305[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    306[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   // Circuit breaker functionality
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    307[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   private circuitBreakers = new Map<string, {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    308[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     failures: number;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    309[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     lastFailure: Date;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    310[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     state: 'closed' | 'open' | 'half-open';
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    311[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     threshold: number;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    312[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     timeout: number;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    313[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   }>();
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    314[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    315[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   async executeWithCircuitBreaker<T>(
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    316[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     serviceName: string,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    317[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     operation: () => Promise<T>
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    318[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   ): Promise<T> {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    319[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     const breaker = this.circuitBreakers.get(serviceName) || {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    320[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       failures: 0,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    321[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       lastFailure: new Date(0),
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    322[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       state: 'closed',
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    323[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       threshold: 5,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    324[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       timeout: 60000, // 1 minute
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    325[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     };
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    326[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    327[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     // Check if circuit breaker should be reset
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    328[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     if (breaker.state === 'open' && 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    329[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         Date.now() - breaker.lastFailure.getTime() > breaker.timeout) {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    330[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       breaker.state = 'half-open';
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    331[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       this.logger.debug(`Circuit breaker for ${serviceName} moved to half-open state`);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    332[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    333[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    334[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     // Reject if circuit is open
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    335[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     if (breaker.state === 'open') {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    336[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       throw new Error(`Circuit breaker is open for service ${serviceName}`);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    337[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    338[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    339[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     try {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    340[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       const result = await operation();
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    341[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    342[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       // Reset on success
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    343[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       if (breaker.state === 'half-open') {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    344[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         breaker.state = 'closed';
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    345[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         breaker.failures = 0;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    346[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         this.logger.debug(`Circuit breaker for ${serviceName} reset to closed state`);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    347[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    348[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    349[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       this.circuitBreakers.set(serviceName, breaker);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    350[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       return result;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    351[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     } catch (error) {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    352[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       breaker.failures++;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    353[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       breaker.lastFailure = new Date();
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    354[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    355[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       if (breaker.failures >= breaker.threshold) {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    356[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         breaker.state = 'open';
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    357[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         this.logger.warn(`Circuit breaker opened for service ${serviceName} after ${breaker.failures} failures`);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    358[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    359[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    360[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       this.circuitBreakers.set(serviceName, breaker);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    361[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       throw error;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    362[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    363[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    364[39m:[38;5;10m[49m }
[0m[K

 â— Path: [38;5;10m/home/oss/Business/workspaces/nexus-workspace/v1-4/v4/services/api-gateway/src/service-discovery/service-discovery.service.ts[0m

[49m[38;5;10m+      1[39m:[38;5;10m[49m import { Injectable, Logger, OnModuleInit } from '@nestjs/common';
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+      2[39m:[38;5;10m[49m import { Cron, CronExpression } from '@nestjs/schedule';
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+      3[39m:[38;5;10m[49m import axios from 'axios';
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+      4[39m:[38;5;10m[49m import Redis from 'redis';
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+      5[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+      6[39m:[38;5;10m[49m export interface ServiceRegistration {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+      7[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   id: string;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+      8[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   name: string;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+      9[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   version: string;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     10[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   url: string;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     11[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   health: string;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     12[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   metadata: Record<string, any>;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     13[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   registeredAt: Date;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     14[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   lastSeen: Date;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     15[39m:[38;5;10m[49m }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     16[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     17[39m:[38;5;10m[49m @Injectable()
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     18[39m:[38;5;10m[49m export class ServiceDiscoveryService implements OnModuleInit {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     19[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   private readonly logger = new Logger(ServiceDiscoveryService.name);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     20[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   private redis: Redis.RedisClientType;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     21[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   private services = new Map<string, ServiceRegistration[]>();
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     22[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   private readonly SERVICE_TTL = 60; // seconds
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     23[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   private readonly DISCOVERY_KEY = 'nexus:services';
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     24[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     25[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   async onModuleInit() {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     26[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     await this.initializeRedis();
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     27[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     await this.loadServicesFromRegistry();
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     28[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     29[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     30[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   private async initializeRedis(): Promise<void> {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     31[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     this.redis = Redis.createClient({
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     32[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       host: process.env.REDIS_HOST || 'localhost',
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     33[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       port: parseInt(process.env.REDIS_PORT || '6379'),
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     34[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     });
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     35[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     36[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     this.redis.on('error', (error) => {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     37[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       this.logger.error('Redis connection error:', error);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     38[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     });
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     39[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     40[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     await this.redis.connect();
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     41[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     this.logger.log('Connected to Redis for service discovery');
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     42[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     43[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     44[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   async registerService(registration: Omit<ServiceRegistration, 'registeredAt' | 'lastSeen'>): Promise<void> {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     45[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     const serviceRegistration: ServiceRegistration = {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     46[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       ...registration,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     47[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       registeredAt: new Date(),
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     48[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       lastSeen: new Date(),
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     49[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     };
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     50[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     51[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     // Store in Redis with TTL
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     52[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     const key = `${this.DISCOVERY_KEY}:${registration.name}:${registration.id}`;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     53[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     await this.redis.setEx(key, this.SERVICE_TTL, JSON.stringify(serviceRegistration));
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     54[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     55[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     // Update local cache
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     56[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     const serviceList = this.services.get(registration.name) || [];
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     57[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     const existingIndex = serviceList.findIndex(s => s.id === registration.id);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     58[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     59[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     if (existingIndex >= 0) {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     60[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       serviceList[existingIndex] = serviceRegistration;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     61[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     } else {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     62[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       serviceList.push(serviceRegistration);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     63[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     64[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     65[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     this.services.set(registration.name, serviceList);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     66[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     67[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     this.logger.debug(`Registered service: ${registration.name}:${registration.id}`);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     68[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     69[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     70[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   async unregisterService(serviceName: string, serviceId: string): Promise<void> {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     71[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     // Remove from Redis
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     72[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     const key = `${this.DISCOVERY_KEY}:${serviceName}:${serviceId}`;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     73[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     await this.redis.del(key);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     74[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     75[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     // Remove from local cache
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     76[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     const serviceList = this.services.get(serviceName) || [];
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     77[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     const filteredList = serviceList.filter(s => s.id !== serviceId);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     78[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     this.services.set(serviceName, filteredList);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     79[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     80[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     this.logger.debug(`Unregistered service: ${serviceName}:${serviceId}`);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     81[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     82[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     83[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   async discoverServices(serviceName: string): Promise<ServiceRegistration[]> {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     84[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     return this.services.get(serviceName) || [];
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     85[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     86[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     87[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   async getAllServices(): Promise<Map<string, ServiceRegistration[]>> {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     88[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     return new Map(this.services);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     89[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     90[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     91[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   async checkServiceHealth(serviceName: string): Promise<boolean> {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     92[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     const services = await this.discoverServices(serviceName);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     93[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     94[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     if (services.length === 0) {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     95[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       return false;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     96[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     97[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     98[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     // Check if at least one instance is healthy
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     99[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     for (const service of services) {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    100[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       try {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    101[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         const response = await axios.get(`${service.url}/health`, {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    102[39m:[38;5;10m[49m           timeout: 5000,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    103[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         });
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    104[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    105[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         if (response.status === 200) {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    106[39m:[38;5;10m[49m           return true;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    107[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    108[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       } catch (error) {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    109[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         this.logger.debug(`Health check failed for ${service.id}:`, error.message);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    110[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    111[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    112[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    113[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     return false;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    114[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    115[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    116[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   @Cron(CronExpression.EVERY_30_SECONDS)
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    117[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   async refreshServiceRegistry(): Promise<void> {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    118[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     this.logger.debug('Refreshing service registry from Redis');
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    119[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     await this.loadServicesFromRegistry();
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    120[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    121[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    122[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   @Cron(CronExpression.EVERY_MINUTE)
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    123[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   async cleanupExpiredServices(): Promise<void> {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    124[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     this.logger.debug('Cleaning up expired services');
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    125[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    126[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     for (const [serviceName, serviceList] of this.services.entries()) {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    127[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       const activeServices = [];
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    128[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    129[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       for (const service of serviceList) {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    130[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         const key = `${this.DISCOVERY_KEY}:${serviceName}:${service.id}`;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    131[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         const exists = await this.redis.exists(key);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    132[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    133[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         if (exists) {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    134[39m:[38;5;10m[49m           activeServices.push(service);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    135[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         } else {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    136[39m:[38;5;10m[49m           this.logger.debug(`Service expired: ${serviceName}:${service.id}`);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    137[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    138[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    139[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    140[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       this.services.set(serviceName, activeServices);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    141[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    142[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    143[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    144[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   private async loadServicesFromRegistry(): Promise<void> {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    145[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     try {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    146[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       const keys = await this.redis.keys(`${this.DISCOVERY_KEY}:*`);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    147[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       const newServices = new Map<string, ServiceRegistration[]>();
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    148[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    149[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       for (const key of keys) {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    150[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         const serviceData = await this.redis.get(key);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    151[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         if (serviceData) {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    152[39m:[38;5;10m[49m           const service: ServiceRegistration = JSON.parse(serviceData);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    153[39m:[38;5;10m[49m           const serviceList = newServices.get(service.name) || [];
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    154[39m:[38;5;10m[49m           serviceList.push(service);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    155[39m:[38;5;10m[49m           newServices.set(service.name, serviceList);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    156[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    157[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    158[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    159[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       this.services = newServices;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    160[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       this.logger.debug(`Loaded ${keys.length} services from registry`);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    161[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     } catch (error) {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    162[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       this.logger.error('Failed to load services from registry:', error);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    163[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    164[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    165[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    166[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   // Auto-discovery of services by scanning network or configuration
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    167[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   async autoDiscoverServices(): Promise<void> {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    168[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     const knownServices = [
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    169[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       { name: 'backend', url: 'http://backend:3001', version: '1.0.0' },
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    170[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       { name: 'analytics', url: 'http://analytics:3003', version: '1.0.0' },
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    171[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       { name: 'notification', url: 'http://notification:3004', version: '1.0.0' },
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    172[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     ];
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    173[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    174[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     for (const serviceConfig of knownServices) {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    175[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       try {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    176[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         const response = await axios.get(`${serviceConfig.url}/health`, {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    177[39m:[38;5;10m[49m           timeout: 5000,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    178[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         });
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    179[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    180[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         if (response.status === 200) {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    181[39m:[38;5;10m[49m           await this.registerService({
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    182[39m:[38;5;10m[49m             id: `${serviceConfig.name}-auto-discovered`,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    183[39m:[38;5;10m[49m             name: serviceConfig.name,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    184[39m:[38;5;10m[49m             version: serviceConfig.version,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    185[39m:[38;5;10m[49m             url: serviceConfig.url,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    186[39m:[38;5;10m[49m             health: 'healthy',
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    187[39m:[38;5;10m[49m             metadata: {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    188[39m:[38;5;10m[49m               discoveryMethod: 'auto',
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    189[39m:[38;5;10m[49m               lastHealthCheck: new Date(),
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    190[39m:[38;5;10m[49m             },
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    191[39m:[38;5;10m[49m           });
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    192[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    193[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       } catch (error) {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    194[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         this.logger.debug(`Auto-discovery failed for ${serviceConfig.name}:`, error.message);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    195[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    196[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    197[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    198[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    199[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   // Service mesh integration
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    200[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   async getServiceEndpoints(serviceName: string): Promise<{
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    201[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     http: string[];
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    202[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     grpc: string[];
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    203[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     websocket: string[];
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    204[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   }> {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    205[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     const services = await this.discoverServices(serviceName);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    206[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    207[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     return {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    208[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       http: services.map(s => s.url),
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    209[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       grpc: services
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    210[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         .filter(s => s.metadata.grpcPort)
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    211[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         .map(s => `${s.url.split(':')[0]}:${s.metadata.grpcPort}`),
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    212[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       websocket: services
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    213[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         .filter(s => s.metadata.wsPort)
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    214[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         .map(s => `ws://${s.url.split('://')[1].split(':')[0]}:${s.metadata.wsPort}`),
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    215[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     };
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    216[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    217[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    218[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   // Service dependency mapping
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    219[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   async getServiceDependencies(serviceName: string): Promise<{
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    220[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     dependencies: string[];
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    221[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     dependents: string[];
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    222[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   }> {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    223[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     const allServices = await this.getAllServices();
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    224[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     const dependencies: string[] = [];
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    225[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     const dependents: string[] = [];
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    226[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    227[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     for (const [name, serviceList] of allServices.entries()) {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    228[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       for (const service of serviceList) {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    229[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         if (service.metadata.dependencies?.includes(serviceName)) {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    230[39m:[38;5;10m[49m           dependents.push(name);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    231[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    232[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         if (name === serviceName && service.metadata.dependencies) {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    233[39m:[38;5;10m[49m           dependencies.push(...service.metadata.dependencies);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    234[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    235[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    236[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    237[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    238[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     return {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    239[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       dependencies: [...new Set(dependencies)],
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    240[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       dependents: [...new Set(dependents)],
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    241[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     };
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    242[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    243[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    244[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   // Service metrics and monitoring
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    245[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   async getServiceMetrics(): Promise<{
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    246[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     totalServices: number;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    247[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     servicesByStatus: Record<string, number>;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    248[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     averageResponseTime: number;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    249[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     serviceVersions: Record<string, string[]>;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    250[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   }> {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    251[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     const allServices = await this.getAllServices();
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    252[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     let totalServices = 0;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    253[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     const servicesByStatus: Record<string, number> = {};
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    254[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     const serviceVersions: Record<string, string[]> = {};
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    255[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     let totalResponseTime = 0;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    256[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     let responseTimeCount = 0;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    257[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    258[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     for (const [serviceName, serviceList] of allServices.entries()) {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    259[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       totalServices += serviceList.length;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    260[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    261[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       const versions = serviceList.map(s => s.version);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    262[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       serviceVersions[serviceName] = [...new Set(versions)];
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    263[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    264[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       for (const service of serviceList) {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    265[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         const status = service.health || 'unknown';
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    266[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         servicesByStatus[status] = (servicesByStatus[status] || 0) + 1;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    267[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    268[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         if (service.metadata.responseTime) {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    269[39m:[38;5;10m[49m           totalResponseTime += service.metadata.responseTime;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    270[39m:[38;5;10m[49m           responseTimeCount++;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    271[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    272[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    273[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    274[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    275[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     return {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    276[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       totalServices,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    277[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       servicesByStatus,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    278[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       averageResponseTime: responseTimeCount > 0 ? totalResponseTime / responseTimeCount : 0,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    279[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       serviceVersions,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    280[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     };
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    281[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    282[39m:[38;5;10m[49m }
[0m[K
