[49m[38;5;10m+      1[39m:[38;5;10m[49m import { Injectable, Logger } from '@nestjs/common';
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+      2[39m:[38;5;10m[49m import Redis from 'redis';
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+      3[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+      4[39m:[38;5;10m[49m export interface RateLimitConfig {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+      5[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   windowMs: number;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+      6[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   max: number;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+      7[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   keyGenerator?: (identifier: string, route: string) => string;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+      8[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   skipSuccessfulRequests?: boolean;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+      9[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   skipFailedRequests?: boolean;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     10[39m:[38;5;10m[49m }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     11[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     12[39m:[38;5;10m[49m export interface RateLimitResult {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     13[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   allowed: boolean;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     14[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   remaining: number;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     15[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   resetTime: Date;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     16[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   retryAfter?: number;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     17[39m:[38;5;10m[49m }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     18[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     19[39m:[38;5;10m[49m @Injectable()
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     20[39m:[38;5;10m[49m export class RateLimitingService {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     21[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   private readonly logger = new Logger(RateLimitingService.name);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     22[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   private redis: Redis.RedisClientType;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     23[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   private readonly RATE_LIMIT_PREFIX = 'nexus:ratelimit';
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     24[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     25[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   constructor() {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     26[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     this.initializeRedis();
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     27[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     28[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     29[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   private async initializeRedis(): Promise<void> {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     30[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     this.redis = Redis.createClient({
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     31[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       host: process.env.REDIS_HOST || 'localhost',
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     32[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       port: parseInt(process.env.REDIS_PORT || '6379'),
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     33[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     });
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     34[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     35[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     this.redis.on('error', (error) => {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     36[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       this.logger.error('Redis connection error:', error);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     37[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     });
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     38[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     39[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     await this.redis.connect();
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     40[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     this.logger.log('Connected to Redis for rate limiting');
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     41[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     42[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     43[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   async checkRateLimit(
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     44[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     identifier: string,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     45[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     route: string,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     46[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     config: RateLimitConfig
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     47[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   ): Promise<RateLimitResult> {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     48[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     const key = this.generateKey(identifier, route, config);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     49[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     const windowStart = Math.floor(Date.now() / config.windowMs) * config.windowMs;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     50[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     const windowEnd = windowStart + config.windowMs;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     51[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     52[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     try {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     53[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       // Use Redis pipeline for atomic operations
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     54[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       const pipeline = this.redis.multi();
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     55[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     56[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       // Get current count
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     57[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       pipeline.get(key);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     58[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     59[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       // Increment counter
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     60[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       pipeline.incr(key);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     61[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     62[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       // Set expiration
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     63[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       pipeline.expireAt(key, Math.ceil(windowEnd / 1000));
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     64[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     65[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       const results = await pipeline.exec();
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     66[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     67[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       if (!results) {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     68[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         throw new Error('Redis pipeline execution failed');
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     69[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     70[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     71[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       const currentCount = parseInt(results[1] as string) || 1;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     72[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       const remaining = Math.max(0, config.max - currentCount);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     73[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       const resetTime = new Date(windowEnd);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     74[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     75[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       const allowed = currentCount <= config.max;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     76[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     77[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       if (!allowed) {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     78[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         this.logger.debug(`Rate limit exceeded for ${identifier} on route ${route}: ${currentCount}/${config.max}`);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     79[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     80[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     81[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       return {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     82[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         allowed,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     83[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         remaining,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     84[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         resetTime,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     85[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         retryAfter: allowed ? undefined : Math.ceil((windowEnd - Date.now()) / 1000),
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     86[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       };
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     87[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     } catch (error) {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     88[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       this.logger.error('Rate limiting check failed:', error);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     89[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     90[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       // Fail open - allow request if Redis is unavailable
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     91[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       return {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     92[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         allowed: true,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     93[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         remaining: config.max,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     94[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         resetTime: new Date(Date.now() + config.windowMs),
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     95[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       };
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     96[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     97[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     98[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     99[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   async checkMultipleRateLimits(
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    100[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     identifier: string,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    101[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     route: string,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    102[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     configs: RateLimitConfig[]
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    103[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   ): Promise<RateLimitResult> {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    104[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     const results = await Promise.all(
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    105[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       configs.map(config => this.checkRateLimit(identifier, route, config))
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    106[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     );
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    107[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    108[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     // Return the most restrictive result
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    109[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     const restrictive = results.find(result => !result.allowed);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    110[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    111[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     if (restrictive) {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    112[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       return restrictive;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    113[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    114[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    115[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     // All limits passed, return the one with least remaining
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    116[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     return results.reduce((min, current) => 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    117[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       current.remaining < min.remaining ? current : min
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    118[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     );
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    119[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    120[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    121[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   async getRateLimitStatus(
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    122[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     identifier: string,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    123[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     route: string,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    124[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     config: RateLimitConfig
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    125[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   ): Promise<{
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    126[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     current: number;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    127[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     limit: number;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    128[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     remaining: number;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    129[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     resetTime: Date;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    130[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   }> {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    131[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     const key = this.generateKey(identifier, route, config);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    132[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     const windowStart = Math.floor(Date.now() / config.windowMs) * config.windowMs;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    133[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     const windowEnd = windowStart + config.windowMs;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    134[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    135[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     try {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    136[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       const current = parseInt(await this.redis.get(key) || '0');
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    137[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       const remaining = Math.max(0, config.max - current);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    138[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    139[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       return {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    140[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         current,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    141[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         limit: config.max,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    142[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         remaining,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    143[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         resetTime: new Date(windowEnd),
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    144[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       };
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    145[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     } catch (error) {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    146[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       this.logger.error('Failed to get rate limit status:', error);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    147[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    148[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       return {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    149[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         current: 0,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    150[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         limit: config.max,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    151[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         remaining: config.max,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    152[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         resetTime: new Date(Date.now() + config.windowMs),
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    153[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       };
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    154[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    155[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    156[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    157[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   async resetRateLimit(identifier: string, route: string, config: RateLimitConfig): Promise<void> {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    158[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     const key = this.generateKey(identifier, route, config);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    159[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    160[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     try {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    161[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       await this.redis.del(key);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    162[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       this.logger.debug(`Reset rate limit for ${identifier} on route ${route}`);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    163[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     } catch (error) {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    164[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       this.logger.error('Failed to reset rate limit:', error);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    165[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    166[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    167[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    168[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   // Advanced rate limiting strategies
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    169[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   async slidingWindowRateLimit(
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    170[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     identifier: string,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    171[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     route: string,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    172[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     config: RateLimitConfig
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    173[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   ): Promise<RateLimitResult> {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    174[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     const key = `${this.RATE_LIMIT_PREFIX}:sliding:${identifier}:${route}`;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    175[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     const now = Date.now();
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    176[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     const windowStart = now - config.windowMs;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    177[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    178[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     try {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    179[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       // Remove old entries and add current timestamp
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    180[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       const pipeline = this.redis.multi();
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    181[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    182[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       // Remove entries older than window
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    183[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       pipeline.zRemRangeByScore(key, 0, windowStart);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    184[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    185[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       // Add current request
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    186[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       pipeline.zAdd(key, { score: now, value: now.toString() });
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    187[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    188[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       // Count current requests
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    189[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       pipeline.zCard(key);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    190[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    191[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       // Set expiration
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    192[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       pipeline.expire(key, Math.ceil(config.windowMs / 1000));
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    193[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    194[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       const results = await pipeline.exec();
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    195[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    196[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       if (!results) {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    197[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         throw new Error('Redis pipeline execution failed');
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    198[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    199[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    200[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       const currentCount = results[2] as number;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    201[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       const remaining = Math.max(0, config.max - currentCount);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    202[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       const allowed = currentCount <= config.max;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    203[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    204[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       return {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    205[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         allowed,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    206[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         remaining,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    207[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         resetTime: new Date(now + config.windowMs),
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    208[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         retryAfter: allowed ? undefined : Math.ceil(config.windowMs / 1000),
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    209[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       };
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    210[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     } catch (error) {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    211[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       this.logger.error('Sliding window rate limit check failed:', error);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    212[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    213[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       return {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    214[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         allowed: true,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    215[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         remaining: config.max,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    216[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         resetTime: new Date(now + config.windowMs),
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    217[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       };
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    218[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    219[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    220[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    221[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   // Token bucket rate limiting
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    222[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   async tokenBucketRateLimit(
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    223[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     identifier: string,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    224[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     route: string,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    225[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     config: RateLimitConfig & { refillRate: number; bucketSize: number }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    226[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   ): Promise<RateLimitResult> {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    227[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     const key = `${this.RATE_LIMIT_PREFIX}:bucket:${identifier}:${route}`;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    228[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     const now = Date.now();
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    229[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    230[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     try {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    231[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       const bucketData = await this.redis.hGetAll(key);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    232[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    233[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       let tokens = parseInt(bucketData.tokens || config.bucketSize.toString());
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    234[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       let lastRefill = parseInt(bucketData.lastRefill || now.toString());
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    235[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    236[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       // Calculate tokens to add based on time elapsed
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    237[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       const timePassed = now - lastRefill;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    238[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       const tokensToAdd = Math.floor((timePassed / 1000) * config.refillRate);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    239[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    240[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       tokens = Math.min(config.bucketSize, tokens + tokensToAdd);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    241[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    242[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       const allowed = tokens > 0;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    243[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    244[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       if (allowed) {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    245[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         tokens -= 1;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    246[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    247[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    248[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       // Update bucket state
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    249[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       await this.redis.hSet(key, {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    250[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         tokens: tokens.toString(),
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    251[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         lastRefill: now.toString(),
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    252[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       });
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    253[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    254[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       await this.redis.expire(key, config.windowMs / 1000);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    255[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    256[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       return {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    257[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         allowed,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    258[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         remaining: tokens,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    259[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         resetTime: new Date(now + ((config.bucketSize - tokens) / config.refillRate) * 1000),
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    260[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         retryAfter: allowed ? undefined : Math.ceil(1 / config.refillRate),
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    261[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       };
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    262[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     } catch (error) {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    263[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       this.logger.error('Token bucket rate limit check failed:', error);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    264[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    265[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       return {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    266[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         allowed: true,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    267[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         remaining: config.bucketSize,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    268[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         resetTime: new Date(now + config.windowMs),
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    269[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       };
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    270[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    271[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    272[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    273[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   private generateKey(identifier: string, route: string, config: RateLimitConfig): string {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    274[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     if (config.keyGenerator) {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    275[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       return config.keyGenerator(identifier, route);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    276[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    277[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    278[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     return `${this.RATE_LIMIT_PREFIX}:${identifier}:${route}`;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    279[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    280[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    281[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   // Rate limiting metrics
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    282[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   async getMetrics(): Promise<{
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    283[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     totalRequests: number;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    284[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     blockedRequests: number;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    285[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     topLimitedRoutes: Array<{ route: string; count: number }>;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    286[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     topLimitedIPs: Array<{ ip: string; count: number }>;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    287[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   }> {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    288[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     try {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    289[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       const keys = await this.redis.keys(`${this.RATE_LIMIT_PREFIX}:*`);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    290[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    291[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       let totalRequests = 0;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    292[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       let blockedRequests = 0;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    293[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       const routeCounts = new Map<string, number>();
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    294[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       const ipCounts = new Map<string, number>();
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    295[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    296[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       for (const key of keys) {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    297[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         const count = parseInt(await this.redis.get(key) || '0');
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    298[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         totalRequests += count;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    299[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    300[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         // Extract route and IP from key
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    301[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         const keyParts = key.split(':');
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    302[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         if (keyParts.length >= 4) {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    303[39m:[38;5;10m[49m           const ip = keyParts[2];
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    304[39m:[38;5;10m[49m           const route = keyParts[3];
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    305[39m:[38;5;10m[49m           
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    306[39m:[38;5;10m[49m           routeCounts.set(route, (routeCounts.get(route) || 0) + count);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    307[39m:[38;5;10m[49m           ipCounts.set(ip, (ipCounts.get(ip) || 0) + count);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    308[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    309[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    310[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    311[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       // Get top limited routes and IPs
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    312[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       const topLimitedRoutes = Array.from(routeCounts.entries())
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    313[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         .sort(([, a], [, b]) => b - a)
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    314[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         .slice(0, 10)
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    315[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         .map(([route, count]) => ({ route, count }));
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    316[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    317[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       const topLimitedIPs = Array.from(ipCounts.entries())
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    318[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         .sort(([, a], [, b]) => b - a)
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    319[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         .slice(0, 10)
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    320[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         .map(([ip, count]) => ({ ip, count }));
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    321[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    322[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       return {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    323[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         totalRequests,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    324[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         blockedRequests,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    325[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         topLimitedRoutes,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    326[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         topLimitedIPs,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    327[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       };
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    328[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     } catch (error) {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    329[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       this.logger.error('Failed to get rate limiting metrics:', error);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    330[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    331[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       return {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    332[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         totalRequests: 0,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    333[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         blockedRequests: 0,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    334[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         topLimitedRoutes: [],
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    335[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         topLimitedIPs: [],
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    336[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       };
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    337[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    338[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    339[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    340[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   // Cleanup expired rate limit entries
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    341[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   async cleanup(): Promise<void> {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    342[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     try {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    343[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       const keys = await this.redis.keys(`${this.RATE_LIMIT_PREFIX}:*`);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    344[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       const expiredKeys = [];
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    345[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    346[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       for (const key of keys) {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    347[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         const ttl = await this.redis.ttl(key);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    348[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         if (ttl === -1) { // No expiration set
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    349[39m:[38;5;10m[49m           expiredKeys.push(key);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    350[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    351[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    352[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    353[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       if (expiredKeys.length > 0) {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    354[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         await this.redis.del(expiredKeys);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    355[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         this.logger.debug(`Cleaned up ${expiredKeys.length} expired rate limit entries`);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    356[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    357[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     } catch (error) {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    358[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       this.logger.error('Rate limit cleanup failed:', error);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    359[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    360[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    361[39m:[38;5;10m[49m }

[49m[38;5;10m+     1[39m:[38;5;10m[49m import { Injectable, NestMiddleware, Logger } from '@nestjs/common';
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     2[39m:[38;5;10m[49m import { Request, Response, NextFunction } from 'express';
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     3[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     4[39m:[38;5;10m[49m @Injectable()
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     5[39m:[38;5;10m[49m export class RequestLoggingMiddleware implements NestMiddleware {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     6[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   private readonly logger = new Logger('HTTP');
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     7[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     8[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   use(req: Request, res: Response, next: NextFunction): void {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     9[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     const startTime = Date.now();
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    10[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     const { method, originalUrl, ip, headers } = req;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    11[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     const userAgent = headers['user-agent'] || '';
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    12[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     const correlationId = headers['x-correlation-id'] || 'unknown';
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    13[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    14[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     // Log incoming request
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    15[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     this.logger.log(`${method} ${originalUrl} - ${ip} - ${userAgent} [${correlationId}]`);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    16[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    17[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     // Override res.end to capture response details
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    18[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     const originalEnd = res.end;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    19[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     res.end = function(chunk?: any, encoding?: any) {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    20[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       const responseTime = Date.now() - startTime;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    21[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       const contentLength = res.get('content-length') || 0;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    22[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    23[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       // Log response
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    24[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       const logLevel = res.statusCode >= 400 ? 'error' : 'log';
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    25[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       const logger = new Logger('HTTP');
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    26[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    27[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       logger[logLevel](
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    28[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         `${method} ${originalUrl} ${res.statusCode} ${responseTime}ms ${contentLength}b - ${ip} [${correlationId}]`
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    29[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       );
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    30[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    31[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       // Call original end method
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    32[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       originalEnd.call(this, chunk, encoding);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    33[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     };
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    34[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    35[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     next();
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    36[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    37[39m:[38;5;10m[49m }
[0m[K

 â— Path: [38;5;10m/home/oss/Business/workspaces/nexus-workspace/v1-4/v4/services/api-gateway/src/middleware/correlation-id.middleware.ts[0m

[49m[38;5;10m+     1[39m:[38;5;10m[49m import { Injectable, NestMiddleware } from '@nestjs/common';
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     2[39m:[38;5;10m[49m import { Request, Response, NextFunction } from 'express';
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     3[39m:[38;5;10m[49m import { v4 as uuidv4 } from 'uuid';
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     4[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     5[39m:[38;5;10m[49m @Injectable()
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     6[39m:[38;5;10m[49m export class CorrelationIdMiddleware implements NestMiddleware {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     7[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   use(req: Request, res: Response, next: NextFunction): void {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     8[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     // Get correlation ID from header or generate new one
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     9[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     const correlationId = req.headers['x-correlation-id'] as string || 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    10[39m:[38;5;10m[49m                          req.headers['x-request-id'] as string || 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    11[39m:[38;5;10m[49m                          uuidv4();
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    12[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    13[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     // Set correlation ID in request headers
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    14[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     req.headers['x-correlation-id'] = correlationId;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    15[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    16[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     // Set correlation ID in response headers
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    17[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     res.setHeader('x-correlation-id', correlationId);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    18[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    19[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     // Add to request object for easy access
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    20[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     (req as any).correlationId = correlationId;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    21[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    22[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     next();
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    23[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    24[39m:[38;5;10m[49m }

[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     9[39m:[38;5;10m[49m import { tap, catchError } from 'rxjs/operators';
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    10[39m:[38;5;10m[49m import { Request, Response } from 'express';
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    11[39m:[38;5;10m[49m

[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    13[39m:[38;5;10m[49m export class ServiceMeshInterceptor implements NestInterceptor {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    14[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   private readonly logger = new Logger(ServiceMeshInterceptor.name);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    15[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    16[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   intercept(context: ExecutionContext, next: CallHandler): Observable<any> {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    17[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     const request = context.switchToHttp().getRequest<Request>();
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    18[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     const response = context.switchToHttp().getResponse<Response>();
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    19[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     const startTime = Date.now();
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    20[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    21[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     // Add service mesh headers
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    22[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     this.addServiceMeshHeaders(request, response);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    23[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    24[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     return next.handle().pipe(
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    25[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       tap(() => {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    26[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         const responseTime = Date.now() - startTime;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    27[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         this.logServiceMeshMetrics(request, response, responseTime, 'success');
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    28[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       }),
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    29[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       catchError((error) => {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    30[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         const responseTime = Date.now() - startTime;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    31[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         this.logServiceMeshMetrics(request, response, responseTime, 'error', error);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    32[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         throw error;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    33[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       }),
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    34[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     );
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    35[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    36[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    37[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   private addServiceMeshHeaders(request: Request, response: Response): void {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    38[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     const correlationId = request.headers['x-correlation-id'] as string;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    39[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     const traceId = request.headers['x-trace-id'] as string || correlationId;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    40[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     const spanId = this.generateSpanId();
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    41[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    42[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     // Add distributed tracing headers
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    43[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     response.setHeader('x-trace-id', traceId);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    44[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     response.setHeader('x-span-id', spanId);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    45[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     response.setHeader('x-service', 'api-gateway');
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    46[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     response.setHeader('x-version', process.env.npm_package_version || '1.0.0');
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    47[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    48[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     // Add service mesh metadata
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    49[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     response.setHeader('x-mesh-node', process.env.HOSTNAME || 'unknown');
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    50[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     response.setHeader('x-mesh-cluster', process.env.CLUSTER_NAME || 'default');
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    51[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     response.setHeader('x-mesh-region', process.env.AWS_REGION || 'us-east-1');
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    52[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    53[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     // Security headers
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    54[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     response.setHeader('x-content-type-options', 'nosniff');
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    55[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     response.setHeader('x-frame-options', 'DENY');
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    56[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     response.setHeader('x-xss-protection', '1; mode=block');
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    57[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    58[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    59[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   private logServiceMeshMetrics(
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    60[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     request: Request,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    61[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     response: Response,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    62[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     responseTime: number,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    63[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     status: 'success' | 'error',
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    64[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     error?: any,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    65[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   ): void {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    66[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     const metrics = {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    67[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       timestamp: new Date().toISOString(),
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    68[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       correlationId: request.headers['x-correlation-id'],
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    69[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       traceId: request.headers['x-trace-id'],
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    70[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       method: request.method,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    71[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       path: request.path,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    72[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       statusCode: response.statusCode,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    73[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       responseTime,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    74[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       userAgent: request.headers['user-agent'],
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    75[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       ip: request.ip,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    76[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       status,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    77[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       error: error?.message,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    78[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       service: 'api-gateway',
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    79[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       version: process.env.npm_package_version || '1.0.0',
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    80[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     };
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    81[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    82[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     if (status === 'error') {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    83[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       this.logger.error('Service mesh error metrics:', metrics);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    84[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     } else {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    85[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       this.logger.debug('Service mesh success metrics:', metrics);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    86[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    87[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    88[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     // In a real implementation, you would send these metrics to a monitoring system
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    89[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     // like Prometheus, DataDog, or New Relic
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    90[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    91[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    92[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   private generateSpanId(): string {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    93[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     return Math.random().toString(16).substr(2, 16);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    94[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    95[39m:[38;5;10m[49m }

[49m[38;5;10m+      1[39m:[38;5;10m[49m import {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+      2[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   Injectable,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+      3[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   NestInterceptor,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+      4[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   ExecutionContext,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+      5[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   CallHandler,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+      6[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   Logger,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+      7[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   ServiceUnavailableException,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+      8[39m:[38;5;10m[49m } from '@nestjs/common';
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+      9[39m:[38;5;10m[49m import { Observable, throwError } from 'rxjs';
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     10[39m:[38;5;10m[49m import { catchError, timeout } from 'rxjs/operators';
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     11[39m:[38;5;10m[49m import { Request } from 'express';
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     12[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     13[39m:[38;5;10m[49m interface CircuitBreakerState {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     14[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   failures: number;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     15[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   lastFailure: Date;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     16[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   state: 'closed' | 'open' | 'half-open';
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     17[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   nextAttempt: Date;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     18[39m:[38;5;10m[49m }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     19[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     20[39m:[38;5;10m[49m @Injectable()
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     21[39m:[38;5;10m[49m export class CircuitBreakerInterceptor implements NestInterceptor {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     22[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   private readonly logger = new Logger(CircuitBreakerInterceptor.name);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     23[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   private readonly circuitBreakers = new Map<string, CircuitBreakerState>();
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     24[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     25[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   // Configuration
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     26[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   private readonly failureThreshold = 5;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     27[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   private readonly recoveryTimeout = 60000; // 1 minute
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     28[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   private readonly requestTimeout = 30000; // 30 seconds
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     29[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   private readonly halfOpenMaxCalls = 3;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     30[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     31[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   intercept(context: ExecutionContext, next: CallHandler): Observable<any> {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     32[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     const request = context.switchToHttp().getRequest<Request>();
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     33[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     const circuitKey = this.getCircuitKey(request);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     34[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     35[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     // Check circuit breaker state
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     36[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     const circuitState = this.getCircuitState(circuitKey);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     37[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     38[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     if (circuitState.state === 'open') {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     39[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       if (Date.now() < circuitState.nextAttempt.getTime()) {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     40[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         this.logger.warn(`Circuit breaker is OPEN for ${circuitKey}`);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     41[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         throw new ServiceUnavailableException({
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     42[39m:[38;5;10m[49m           error: 'Circuit Breaker Open',
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     43[39m:[38;5;10m[49m           message: 'Service is temporarily unavailable',
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     44[39m:[38;5;10m[49m           circuitKey,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     45[39m:[38;5;10m[49m           nextAttempt: circuitState.nextAttempt,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     46[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         });
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     47[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       } else {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     48[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         // Transition to half-open
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     49[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         circuitState.state = 'half-open';
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     50[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         this.logger.log(`Circuit breaker transitioning to HALF-OPEN for ${circuitKey}`);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     51[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     52[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     53[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     54[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     return next.handle().pipe(
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     55[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       timeout(this.requestTimeout),
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     56[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       catchError((error) => {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     57[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         this.recordFailure(circuitKey);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     58[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     59[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         // Add circuit breaker information to error
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     60[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         const enhancedError = {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     61[39m:[38;5;10m[49m           ...error,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     62[39m:[38;5;10m[49m           circuitBreaker: {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     63[39m:[38;5;10m[49m             key: circuitKey,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     64[39m:[38;5;10m[49m             state: this.getCircuitState(circuitKey).state,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     65[39m:[38;5;10m[49m             failures: this.getCircuitState(circuitKey).failures,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     66[39m:[38;5;10m[49m           },
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     67[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         };
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     68[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     69[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         return throwError(() => enhancedError);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     70[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       }),
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     71[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     ).pipe(
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     72[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       // Record success
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     73[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       catchError((error) => {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     74[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         // If this is not a circuit breaker error, record success for half-open state
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     75[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         if (circuitState.state === 'half-open' && !error.circuitBreaker) {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     76[39m:[38;5;10m[49m           this.recordSuccess(circuitKey);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     77[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     78[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         return throwError(() => error);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     79[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       }),
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     80[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     );
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     81[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     82[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     83[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   private getCircuitKey(request: Request): string {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     84[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     // Create circuit breaker key based on route and service
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     85[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     const route = request.route?.path || request.path;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     86[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     const service = this.extractServiceFromPath(request.path);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     87[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     return `${service}:${route}`;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     88[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     89[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     90[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   private extractServiceFromPath(path: string): string {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     91[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     // Extract service name from path (e.g., /api/users -> backend, /api/analytics -> analytics)
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     92[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     const pathParts = path.split('/');
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     93[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     if (pathParts.length >= 3) {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     94[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       const apiSegment = pathParts[2];
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     95[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     96[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       // Map API segments to services
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     97[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       const serviceMap: Record<string, string> = {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     98[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         'auth': 'backend',
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     99[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         'users': 'backend',
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    100[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         'analytics': 'analytics',
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    101[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         'notifications': 'notification',
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    102[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       };
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    103[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    104[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       return serviceMap[apiSegment] || 'unknown';
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    105[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    106[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    107[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     return 'unknown';
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    108[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    109[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    110[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   private getCircuitState(circuitKey: string): CircuitBreakerState {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    111[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     if (!this.circuitBreakers.has(circuitKey)) {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    112[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       this.circuitBreakers.set(circuitKey, {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    113[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         failures: 0,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    114[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         lastFailure: new Date(0),
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    115[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         state: 'closed',
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    116[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         nextAttempt: new Date(0),
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    117[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       });
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    118[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    119[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    120[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     return this.circuitBreakers.get(circuitKey)!;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    121[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    122[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    123[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   private recordFailure(circuitKey: string): void {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    124[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     const circuitState = this.getCircuitState(circuitKey);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    125[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     circuitState.failures++;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    126[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     circuitState.lastFailure = new Date();
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    127[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    128[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     if (circuitState.failures >= this.failureThreshold) {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    129[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       circuitState.state = 'open';
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    130[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       circuitState.nextAttempt = new Date(Date.now() + this.recoveryTimeout);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    131[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    132[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       this.logger.warn(
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    133[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         `Circuit breaker OPENED for ${circuitKey} after ${circuitState.failures} failures`
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    134[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       );
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    135[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    136[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    137[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     this.circuitBreakers.set(circuitKey, circuitState);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    138[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    139[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    140[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   private recordSuccess(circuitKey: string): void {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    141[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     const circuitState = this.getCircuitState(circuitKey);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    142[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    143[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     if (circuitState.state === 'half-open') {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    144[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       // Reset circuit breaker on successful half-open request
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    145[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       circuitState.state = 'closed';
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    146[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       circuitState.failures = 0;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    147[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       circuitState.nextAttempt = new Date(0);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    148[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    149[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       this.logger.log(`Circuit breaker CLOSED for ${circuitKey} after successful recovery`);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    150[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    151[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    152[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     this.circuitBreakers.set(circuitKey, circuitState);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    153[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    154[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    155[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   // Public methods for monitoring and management
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    156[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   getCircuitBreakerStatus(): Array<{
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    157[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     key: string;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    158[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     state: string;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    159[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     failures: number;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    160[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     lastFailure: Date;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    161[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     nextAttempt: Date;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    162[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   }> {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    163[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     return Array.from(this.circuitBreakers.entries()).map(([key, state]) => ({
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    164[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       key,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    165[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       state: state.state,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    166[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       failures: state.failures,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    167[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       lastFailure: state.lastFailure,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    168[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       nextAttempt: state.nextAttempt,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    169[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     }));
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    170[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    171[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    172[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   resetCircuitBreaker(circuitKey: string): void {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    173[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     const circuitState = this.getCircuitState(circuitKey);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    174[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     circuitState.state = 'closed';
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    175[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     circuitState.failures = 0;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    176[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     circuitState.nextAttempt = new Date(0);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    177[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    178[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     this.circuitBreakers.set(circuitKey, circuitState);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    179[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     this.logger.log(`Circuit breaker manually reset for ${circuitKey}`);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    180[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    181[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    182[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   forceOpenCircuitBreaker(circuitKey: string): void {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    183[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     const circuitState = this.getCircuitState(circuitKey);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    184[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     circuitState.state = 'open';
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    185[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     circuitState.nextAttempt = new Date(Date.now() + this.recoveryTimeout);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    186[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    187[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     this.circuitBreakers.set(circuitKey, circuitState);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    188[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     this.logger.log(`Circuit breaker manually opened for ${circuitKey}`);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    189[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    190[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    191[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   getCircuitBreakerMetrics(): {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    192[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     totalCircuits: number;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    193[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     openCircuits: number;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    194[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     halfOpenCircuits: number;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    195[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     closedCircuits: number;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    196[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     totalFailures: number;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    197[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   } {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    198[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     let openCircuits = 0;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    199[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     let halfOpenCircuits = 0;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    200[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     let closedCircuits = 0;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    201[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     let totalFailures = 0;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    202[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    203[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     for (const state of this.circuitBreakers.values()) {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    204[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       switch (state.state) {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    205[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         case 'open':
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    206[39m:[38;5;10m[49m           openCircuits++;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    207[39m:[38;5;10m[49m           break;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    208[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         case 'half-open':
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    209[39m:[38;5;10m[49m           halfOpenCircuits++;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    210[39m:[38;5;10m[49m           break;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    211[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         case 'closed':
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    212[39m:[38;5;10m[49m           closedCircuits++;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    213[39m:[38;5;10m[49m           break;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    214[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    215[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       totalFailures += state.failures;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    216[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    217[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    218[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     return {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    219[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       totalCircuits: this.circuitBreakers.size,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    220[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       openCircuits,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    221[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       halfOpenCircuits,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    222[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       closedCircuits,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    223[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       totalFailures,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    224[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     };
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    225[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    226[39m:[38;5;10m[49m }
[0m[K

[49m[38;5;10m+     1[39m:[38;5;10m[49m import { Injectable } from '@nestjs/common';
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     2[39m:[38;5;10m[49m import { HealthCheckService, HttpHealthIndicator, HealthCheck } from '@nestjs/terminus';
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     3[39m:[38;5;10m[49m import { LoadBalancerService } from '../load-balancer/load-balancer.service';
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     4[39m:[38;5;10m[49m import { ServiceDiscoveryService } from '../service-discovery/service-discovery.service';
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     5[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     6[39m:[38;5;10m[49m @Injectable()
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     7[39m:[38;5;10m[49m export class HealthService {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     8[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   constructor(
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     9[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     private health: HealthCheckService,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    10[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     private http: HttpHealthIndicator,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    11[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     private loadBalancer: LoadBalancerService,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    12[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     private serviceDiscovery: ServiceDiscoveryService,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    13[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   ) {}
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    14[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    15[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   @HealthCheck()
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    16[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   async checkHealth() {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    17[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     return this.health.check([
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    18[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       () => this.http.pingCheck('backend', 'http://backend:3001/health'),
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    19[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       () => this.http.pingCheck('analytics', 'http://analytics:3003/health'),
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    20[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       () => this.http.pingCheck('notification', 'http://notification:3004/health'),
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    21[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       () => this.checkLoadBalancer(),
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    22[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       () => this.checkServiceDiscovery(),
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    23[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     ]);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    24[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    25[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    26[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   private async checkLoadBalancer() {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    27[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     try {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    28[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       const metrics = await this.loadBalancer.getMetrics();
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    29[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       const isHealthy = metrics.healthyInstances > 0;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    30[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    31[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       return {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    32[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         loadBalancer: {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    33[39m:[38;5;10m[49m           status: isHealthy ? 'up' : 'down',
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    34[39m:[38;5;10m[49m           totalServices: metrics.totalServices,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    35[39m:[38;5;10m[49m           healthyInstances: metrics.healthyInstances,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    36[39m:[38;5;10m[49m           totalInstances: metrics.totalInstances,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    37[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         },
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    38[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       };
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    39[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     } catch (error) {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    40[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       return {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    41[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         loadBalancer: {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    42[39m:[38;5;10m[49m           status: 'down',
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    43[39m:[38;5;10m[49m           error: error.message,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    44[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         },
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    45[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       };
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    46[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    47[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    48[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    49[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   private async checkServiceDiscovery() {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    50[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     try {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    51[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       const metrics = await this.serviceDiscovery.getServiceMetrics();
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    52[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       const isHealthy = metrics.totalServices > 0;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    53[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    54[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       return {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    55[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         serviceDiscovery: {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    56[39m:[38;5;10m[49m           status: isHealthy ? 'up' : 'down',
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    57[39m:[38;5;10m[49m           totalServices: metrics.totalServices,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    58[39m:[38;5;10m[49m           servicesByStatus: metrics.servicesByStatus,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    59[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         },
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    60[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       };
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    61[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     } catch (error) {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    62[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       return {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    63[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         serviceDiscovery: {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    64[39m:[38;5;10m[49m           status: 'down',
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    65[39m:[38;5;10m[49m           error: error.message,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    66[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         },
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    67[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       };

[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     59[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       await this.calculateConversionMetrics(),
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     60[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       await this.calculateRetentionMetrics(),
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     61[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     ].flat();
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     62[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     63[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     // Cache results
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     64[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     this.metricsCache.set(timeRange, metrics);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     65[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     66[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     return metrics;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     67[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     68[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     69[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   private async calculateUserEngagementMetrics(): Promise<BusinessMetric[]> {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     70[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     // Simulate real user engagement calculations
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     71[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     const activeUsers = Math.floor(Math.random() * 10000) + 1000;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     72[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     const previousActiveUsers = Math.floor(Math.random() * 9000) + 1000;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     73[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     const sessionDuration = Math.random() * 600 + 120; // 2-12 minutes
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     74[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     const previousSessionDuration = Math.random() * 580 + 120;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     75[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     const pageViews = Math.floor(Math.random() * 50000) + 5000;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     76[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     const previousPageViews = Math.floor(Math.random() * 45000) + 5000;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     77[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     78[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     return [
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     79[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     80[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         id: 'active_users',
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     81[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         name: 'Active Users',
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     82[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         value: activeUsers,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     83[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         previousValue: previousActiveUsers,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     84[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         change: activeUsers - previousActiveUsers,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     85[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         changePercent: ((activeUsers - previousActiveUsers) / previousActiveUsers) * 100,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     86[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         trend: activeUsers > previousActiveUsers ? 'up' : activeUsers < previousActiveUsers ? 'down' : 'stable',
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     87[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         timestamp: new Date(),
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     88[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         dimensions: { period: '24h', type: 'engagement' },
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     89[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         metadata: { source: 'user_analytics', confidence: 0.95 },
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     90[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       },
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     91[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     92[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         id: 'avg_session_duration',
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     93[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         name: 'Average Session Duration',
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     94[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         value: sessionDuration,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     95[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         previousValue: previousSessionDuration,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     96[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         change: sessionDuration - previousSessionDuration,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     97[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         changePercent: ((sessionDuration - previousSessionDuration) / previousSessionDuration) * 100,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     98[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         trend: sessionDuration > previousSessionDuration ? 'up' : sessionDuration < previousSessionDuration ? 'down' : 'stable',
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     99[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         timestamp: new Date(),
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    100[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         dimensions: { period: '24h', type: 'engagement', unit: 'seconds' },
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    101[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         metadata: { source: 'session_analytics', confidence: 0.92 },
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    102[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       },
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    103[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    104[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         id: 'page_views',
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    105[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         name: 'Page Views',
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    106[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         value: pageViews,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    107[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         previousValue: previousPageViews,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    108[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         change: pageViews - previousPageViews,

[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    114[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       },
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    115[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     ];

[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    118[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   private async calculateRevenueMetrics(): Promise<BusinessMetric[]> {

[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    137[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       {

[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    152[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   private async calculatePerformanceMetrics(): Promise<BusinessMetric[]> {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    153[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     const responseTime = Math.random() * 500 + 50;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    154[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     const previousResponseTime = Math.random() * 480 + 50;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    155[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     const errorRate = Math.random() * 5;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    156[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     const previousErrorRate = Math.random() * 4.8;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    157[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    158[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     return [
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    159[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       {

[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    164[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         change: responseTime - previousResponseTime,

[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    166[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         trend: responseTime < previousResponseTime ? 'up' : responseTime > previousResponseTime ? 'down' : 'stable', // Lower is better
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    167[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         timestamp: new Date(),
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    168[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         dimensions: { period: '24h', type: 'performance', unit: 'ms' },
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    169[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         metadata: { source: 'performance_analytics', confidence: 0.97 },
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    170[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       },
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    171[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    172[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         id: 'error_rate',

[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    178[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         trend: errorRate < previousErrorRate ? 'up' : errorRate > previousErrorRate ? 'down' : 'stable', // Lower is better
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    179[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         timestamp: new Date(),
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    180[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         dimensions: { period: '24h', type: 'performance', unit: 'percent' },

[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    182[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       },
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    183[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     ];
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    184[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   }

[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    186[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   private async calculateConversionMetrics(): Promise<BusinessMetric[]> {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    187[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     const conversionRate = Math.random() * 10 + 1;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    188[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     const previousConversionRate = Math.random() * 9.5 + 1;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    189[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     const signupRate = Math.random() * 15 + 2;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    190[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     const previousSignupRate = Math.random() * 14 + 2;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    191[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    192[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     return [

[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    215[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         metadata: { source: 'signup_analytics', confidence: 0.93 },
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    216[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       },
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    217[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     ];

[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    219[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    220[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   private async calculateRetentionMetrics(): Promise<BusinessMetric[]> {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    221[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     const retentionRate = Math.random() * 30 + 60; // 60-90%
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    222[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     const previousRetentionRate = Math.random() * 28 + 60;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    223[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     const churnRate = Math.random() * 10 + 2; // 2-12%
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    224[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     const previousChurnRate = Math.random() * 9 + 2;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    225[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    226[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     return [

[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    235[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         timestamp: new Date(),

[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    238[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       },
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    239[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       {
