[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    242[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         value: churnRate,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    243[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         previousValue: previousChurnRate,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    244[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         change: churnRate - previousChurnRate,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    245[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         changePercent: ((churnRate - previousChurnRate) / previousChurnRate) * 100,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    246[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         trend: churnRate < previousChurnRate ? 'up' : churnRate > previousChurnRate ? 'down' : 'stable', // Lower is better
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    247[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         timestamp: new Date(),
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    248[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         dimensions: { period: '30d', type: 'retention', unit: 'percent' },
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    249[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         metadata: { source: 'churn_analytics', confidence: 0.87 },
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    250[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       },
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    251[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     ];
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    252[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    253[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    254[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   // KPI Management
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    255[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   async calculateKPIs(): Promise<KPI[]> {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    256[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     const kpis: KPI[] = [
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    257[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    258[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         id: 'monthly_active_users',
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    259[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         name: 'Monthly Active Users',
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    260[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         description: 'Number of unique users who engaged with the platform in the last 30 days',
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    261[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         currentValue: Math.floor(Math.random() * 50000) + 10000,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    262[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         targetValue: 75000,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    263[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         threshold: { warning: 60000, critical: 45000 },
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    264[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         status: 'healthy',
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    265[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         trend: this.generateTrendData(30),
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    266[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         formula: 'COUNT(DISTINCT user_id) WHERE last_activity >= NOW() - INTERVAL 30 DAY',
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    267[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       },
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    268[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    269[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         id: 'customer_satisfaction',
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    270[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         name: 'Customer Satisfaction Score',
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    271[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         description: 'Average customer satisfaction rating based on surveys and feedback',
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    272[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         currentValue: Math.random() * 2 + 8, // 8-10 scale
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    273[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         targetValue: 9.0,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    274[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         threshold: { warning: 8.5, critical: 7.5 },
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    275[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         status: 'healthy',
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    276[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         trend: this.generateTrendData(30, 8, 10),
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    277[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         formula: 'AVG(satisfaction_rating) WHERE survey_date >= NOW() - INTERVAL 30 DAY',
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    278[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       },
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    279[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    280[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         id: 'system_uptime',
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    281[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         name: 'System Uptime',
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    282[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         description: 'Percentage of time the system was available and operational',
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    283[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         currentValue: Math.random() * 1 + 99, // 99-100%
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    284[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         targetValue: 99.9,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    285[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         threshold: { warning: 99.5, critical: 99.0 },
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    286[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         status: 'healthy',
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    287[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         trend: this.generateTrendData(30, 99, 100),
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    288[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         formula: '(total_uptime_minutes / total_minutes) * 100',
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    289[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       },
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    290[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     ];
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    291[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    292[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     // Update KPI status based on thresholds
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    293[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     kpis.forEach(kpi => {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    294[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       if (kpi.currentValue < kpi.threshold.critical) {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    295[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         kpi.status = 'critical';
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    296[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       } else if (kpi.currentValue < kpi.threshold.warning) {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    297[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         kpi.status = 'warning';
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    298[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       } else {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    299[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         kpi.status = 'healthy';
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    300[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    301[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     });
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    302[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    303[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     // Cache KPIs
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    304[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     kpis.forEach(kpi => this.kpisCache.set(kpi.id, kpi));
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    305[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    306[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     return kpis;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    307[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    308[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    309[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   private generateTrendData(days: number, min: number = 0, max: number = 100000): Array<{ timestamp: Date; value: number }> {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    310[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     const trend = [];
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    311[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     const now = new Date();
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    312[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    313[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     for (let i = days; i >= 0; i--) {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    314[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       const date = new Date(now.getTime() - i * 24 * 60 * 60 * 1000);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    315[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       const value = Math.random() * (max - min) + min;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    316[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       trend.push({ timestamp: date, value });
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    317[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    318[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    319[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     return trend;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    320[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    321[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    322[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   // AI-Powered Insights Generation
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    323[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   async generateInsights(): Promise<Insight[]> {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    324[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     const insights: Insight[] = [];
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    325[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    326[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     // Anomaly Detection Insights
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    327[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     insights.push(...await this.detectAnomalies());
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    328[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    329[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     // Trend Analysis Insights
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    330[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     insights.push(...await this.analyzeTrends());
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    331[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    332[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     // Correlation Insights
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    333[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     insights.push(...await this.findCorrelations());
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    334[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    335[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     // Predictive Insights
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    336[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     insights.push(...await this.generatePredictions());
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    337[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    338[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     // Cache insights
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    339[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     this.insightsCache.set('current', insights);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    340[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    341[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     return insights;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    342[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    343[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    344[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   private async detectAnomalies(): Promise<Insight[]> {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    345[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     const insights: Insight[] = [];
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    346[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    347[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     // Simulate anomaly detection
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    348[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     if (Math.random() > 0.7) {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    349[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       insights.push({
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    350[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         id: `anomaly_${Date.now()}`,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    351[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         type: 'anomaly',
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    352[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         title: 'Unusual Traffic Spike Detected',
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    353[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         description: 'Traffic has increased by 150% compared to the same time last week, which is outside normal variance patterns.',
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    354[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         severity: 'medium',
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    355[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         confidence: 0.87,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    356[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         data: {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    357[39m:[38;5;10m[49m           currentTraffic: 15000,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    358[39m:[38;5;10m[49m           expectedTraffic: 6000,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    359[39m:[38;5;10m[49m           variance: 150,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    360[39m:[38;5;10m[49m           timeWindow: '1h',
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    361[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         },
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    362[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         recommendations: [
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    363[39m:[38;5;10m[49m           'Monitor server performance and scaling',
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    364[39m:[38;5;10m[49m           'Check for potential marketing campaigns or viral content',
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    365[39m:[38;5;10m[49m           'Verify traffic quality to rule out bot activity',
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    366[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         ],
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    367[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         timestamp: new Date(),
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    368[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       });
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    369[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    370[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    371[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     if (Math.random() > 0.8) {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    372[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       insights.push({
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    373[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         id: `anomaly_${Date.now() + 1}`,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    374[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         type: 'anomaly',
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    375[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         title: 'Error Rate Anomaly',
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    376[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         description: 'Error rate has spiked to 8.5%, significantly higher than the normal 2-3% range.',
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    377[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         severity: 'high',
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    378[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         confidence: 0.94,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    379[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         data: {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    380[39m:[38;5;10m[49m           currentErrorRate: 8.5,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    381[39m:[38;5;10m[49m           normalErrorRate: 2.5,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    382[39m:[38;5;10m[49m           affectedEndpoints: ['/api/users', '/api/analytics'],
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    383[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         },
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    384[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         recommendations: [
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    385[39m:[38;5;10m[49m           'Investigate recent deployments or configuration changes',
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    386[39m:[38;5;10m[49m           'Check database connection pool and query performance',
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    387[39m:[38;5;10m[49m           'Review error logs for common patterns',
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    388[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         ],
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    389[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         timestamp: new Date(),
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    390[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       });
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    391[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    392[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    393[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     return insights;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    394[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    395[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    396[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   private async analyzeTrends(): Promise<Insight[]> {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    397[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     const insights: Insight[] = [];
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    398[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    399[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     // Simulate trend analysis
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    400[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     insights.push({
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    401[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       id: `trend_${Date.now()}`,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    402[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       type: 'trend',
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    403[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       title: 'Positive User Engagement Trend',
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    404[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       description: 'User engagement metrics show a consistent upward trend over the past 14 days, with session duration increasing by 23%.',
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    405[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       severity: 'low',
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    406[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       confidence: 0.91,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    407[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       data: {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    408[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         metric: 'session_duration',
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    409[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         trendDirection: 'up',
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    410[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         changePercent: 23,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    411[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         timeframe: '14d',
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    412[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         significance: 'high',
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    413[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       },
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    414[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       recommendations: [
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    415[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         'Analyze which features are driving increased engagement',
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    416[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         'Consider expanding successful features or content',
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    417[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         'Document best practices for future feature development',
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    418[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       ],
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    419[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       timestamp: new Date(),
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    420[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     });
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    421[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    422[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     return insights;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    423[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    424[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    425[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   private async findCorrelations(): Promise<Insight[]> {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    426[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     const insights: Insight[] = [];
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    427[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    428[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     // Simulate correlation analysis
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    429[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     insights.push({
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    430[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       id: `correlation_${Date.now()}`,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    431[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       type: 'correlation',
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    432[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       title: 'Strong Correlation: Page Load Time vs Bounce Rate',
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    433[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       description: 'Analysis reveals a strong negative correlation (-0.78) between page load time and user bounce rate.',
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    434[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       severity: 'medium',
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    435[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       confidence: 0.89,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    436[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       data: {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    437[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         correlation: -0.78,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    438[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         variables: ['page_load_time', 'bounce_rate'],
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    439[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         sampleSize: 10000,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    440[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         pValue: 0.001,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    441[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       },
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    442[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       recommendations: [
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    443[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         'Prioritize page speed optimization initiatives',
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    444[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         'Implement performance monitoring for critical pages',
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    445[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         'Consider CDN implementation for static assets',
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    446[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       ],
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    447[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       timestamp: new Date(),
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    448[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     });
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    449[39m:[38;5;10m[49m

[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    544[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       totalUsers: metrics.find(m => m.id === 'active_users')?.value || 0,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    545[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       totalRevenue: metrics.find(m => m.id === 'total_revenue')?.value || 0,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    546[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       systemHealth: kpis.every(k => k.status === 'healthy') ? 'healthy' : 'warning',

[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    212[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         },

[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    214[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     });
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    215[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    216[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     this.logger.log(`Initialized ${this.templates.size} report templates`);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    217[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    218[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    219[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   // Report Generation
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    220[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   async generateReport(templateId: string, parameters: Record<string, any> = {}): Promise<Report> {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    221[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     const template = this.templates.get(templateId);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    222[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     if (!template) {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    223[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       throw new Error(`Report template ${templateId} not found`);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    224[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    225[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    226[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     const reportId = `${templateId}_${Date.now()}`;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    227[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    228[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     const report: Report = {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    229[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       id: reportId,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    230[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       name: template.name,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    231[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       description: template.description,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    232[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       type: template.type,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    233[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       format: 'json',
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    234[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       schedule: 'on-demand',
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    235[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       recipients: [],
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    236[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       data: null,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    237[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       generatedAt: new Date(),
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    238[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       status: 'generating',
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    239[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       metadata: { templateId, parameters },
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    240[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     };
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    241[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    242[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     this.reports.set(reportId, report);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    243[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    244[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     try {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    245[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       // Generate report data
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    246[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       const reportData = await this.executeReportQueries(template, parameters);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    247[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    248[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       report.data = {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    249[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         template: template.name,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    250[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         generatedAt: new Date(),
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    251[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         parameters,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    252[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         sections: reportData,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    253[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         summary: this.generateReportSummary(reportData),
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    254[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       };
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    255[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    256[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       report.status = 'completed';
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    257[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       this.logger.log(`Generated report: ${report.name} (${reportId})`);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    258[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    259[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     } catch (error) {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    260[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       report.status = 'failed';
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    261[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       report.metadata.error = error.message;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    262[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       this.logger.error(`Failed to generate report ${reportId}:`, error);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    263[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    264[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    265[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     this.reports.set(reportId, report);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    266[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     return report;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    267[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    268[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    269[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   private async executeReportQueries(template: ReportTemplate, parameters: Record<string, any>): Promise<any[]> {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    270[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     const sectionData = [];
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    271[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    272[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     for (const section of template.sections) {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    273[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       try {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    274[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         // Simulate query execution with mock data
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    275[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         const data = await this.executeMockQuery(section, parameters);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    276[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    277[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         sectionData.push({
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    278[39m:[38;5;10m[49m           id: section.id,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    279[39m:[38;5;10m[49m           title: section.title,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    280[39m:[38;5;10m[49m           type: section.type,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    281[39m:[38;5;10m[49m           data,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    282[39m:[38;5;10m[49m           visualization: section.visualization,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    283[39m:[38;5;10m[49m           metadata: {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    284[39m:[38;5;10m[49m             recordCount: Array.isArray(data) ? data.length : 1,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    285[39m:[38;5;10m[49m             executionTime: Math.random() * 100 + 10, // ms
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    286[39m:[38;5;10m[49m           },
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    287[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         });
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    288[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       } catch (error) {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    289[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         this.logger.error(`Failed to execute query for section ${section.id}:`, error);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    290[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         sectionData.push({
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    291[39m:[38;5;10m[49m           id: section.id,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    292[39m:[38;5;10m[49m           title: section.title,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    293[39m:[38;5;10m[49m           type: section.type,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    294[39m:[38;5;10m[49m           data: null,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    295[39m:[38;5;10m[49m           error: error.message,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    296[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         });
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    297[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    298[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    299[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    300[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     return sectionData;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    301[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    302[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    303[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   private async executeMockQuery(section: ReportSection, parameters: Record<string, any>): Promise<any> {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    304[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     // Simulate different types of data based on section type
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    305[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     switch (section.type) {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    306[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       case 'metric':
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    307[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         return this.generateMockMetrics();
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    308[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       case 'chart':
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    309[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         return this.generateMockChartData(section.visualization.chartType);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    310[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       case 'table':
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    311[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         return this.generateMockTableData();
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    312[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       default:
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    313[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         return { message: 'No data available' };
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    314[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    315[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    316[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    317[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   private generateMockMetrics(): any[] {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    318[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     return [
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    319[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       { name: 'Active Users', value: 12543, change: 8.5, status: 'healthy' },
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    320[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       { name: 'Revenue', value: 89234, change: -2.1, status: 'warning' },
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    321[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       { name: 'Conversion Rate', value: 3.2, change: 12.3, status: 'healthy' },
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    322[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       { name: 'System Uptime', value: 99.8, change: 0.1, status: 'healthy' },
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    323[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     ];
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    324[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    325[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    326[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   private generateMockChartData(chartType?: string): any[] {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    327[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     const dataPoints = 30;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    328[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     const data = [];
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    329[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    330[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     for (let i = 0; i < dataPoints; i++) {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    331[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       const date = new Date();
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    332[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       date.setDate(date.getDate() - (dataPoints - i));
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    333[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    334[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       data.push({
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    335[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         date: date.toISOString().split('T')[0],
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    336[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         value: Math.floor(Math.random() * 1000) + 100,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    337[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         category: i % 3 === 0 ? 'A' : i % 3 === 1 ? 'B' : 'C',
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    338[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       });
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    339[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    340[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    341[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     return data;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    342[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    343[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    344[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   private generateMockTableData(): any[] {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    345[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     return [
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    346[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       { service: 'API Gateway', status: 'healthy', responseTime: 45, errorRate: 0.1 },
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    347[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       { service: 'Backend', status: 'healthy', responseTime: 120, errorRate: 0.3 },
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    348[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       { service: 'Analytics', status: 'warning', responseTime: 200, errorRate: 1.2 },
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    349[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       { service: 'Notification', status: 'healthy', responseTime: 80, errorRate: 0.2 },
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    350[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     ];
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    351[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    352[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    353[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   private generateReportSummary(sectionData: any[]): any {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    354[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     return {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    355[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       totalSections: sectionData.length,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    356[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       successfulSections: sectionData.filter(s => !s.error).length,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    357[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       failedSections: sectionData.filter(s => s.error).length,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    358[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       totalRecords: sectionData.reduce((sum, s) => sum + (s.metadata?.recordCount || 0), 0),
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    359[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       avgExecutionTime: sectionData.reduce((sum, s) => sum + (s.metadata?.executionTime || 0), 0) / sectionData.length,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    360[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     };
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    361[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    362[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    363[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   // Report Scheduling
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    364[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   async scheduleReport(
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    365[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     templateId: string,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    366[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     schedule: string,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    367[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     recipients: string[],
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    368[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     parameters: Record<string, any> = {}
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    369[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   ): Promise<string> {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    370[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     const scheduleId = `schedule_${templateId}_${Date.now()}`;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    371[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    372[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     const scheduledReport = {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    373[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       id: scheduleId,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    374[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       templateId,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    375[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       schedule,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    376[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       recipients,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    377[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       parameters,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    378[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       createdAt: new Date(),
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    379[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       lastRun: null,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    380[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       nextRun: this.calculateNextRun(schedule),
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    381[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       status: 'active',
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    382[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     };
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    383[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    384[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     this.scheduledReports.set(scheduleId, scheduledReport);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    385[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    386[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     this.logger.log(`Scheduled report: ${templateId} (${schedule}) for ${recipients.length} recipients`);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    387[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    388[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     return scheduleId;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    389[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    390[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    391[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   private calculateNextRun(schedule: string): Date {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    392[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     const now = new Date();
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    393[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    394[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     switch (schedule) {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    395[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       case 'hourly':
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    396[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         return new Date(now.getTime() + 60 * 60 * 1000);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    397[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       case 'daily':
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    398[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         const tomorrow = new Date(now);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    399[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         tomorrow.setDate(tomorrow.getDate() + 1);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    400[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         tomorrow.setHours(9, 0, 0, 0); // 9 AM
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    401[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         return tomorrow;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    402[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       case 'weekly':
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    403[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         const nextWeek = new Date(now);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    404[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         nextWeek.setDate(nextWeek.getDate() + 7);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    405[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         nextWeek.setHours(9, 0, 0, 0);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    406[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         return nextWeek;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    407[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       case 'monthly':
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    408[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         const nextMonth = new Date(now);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    409[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         nextMonth.setMonth(nextMonth.getMonth() + 1);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    410[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         nextMonth.setDate(1);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    411[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         nextMonth.setHours(9, 0, 0, 0);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    412[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         return nextMonth;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    413[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       default:
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    414[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         return new Date(now.getTime() + 24 * 60 * 60 * 1000);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    415[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    416[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    417[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    418[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   // Scheduled Report Execution
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    419[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   @Cron(CronExpression.EVERY_HOUR)
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    420[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   async executeScheduledReports(): Promise<void> {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    421[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     const now = new Date();
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    422[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    423[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     for (const [scheduleId, scheduledReport] of this.scheduledReports.entries()) {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    424[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       if (scheduledReport.status === 'active' && scheduledReport.nextRun <= now) {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    425[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         try {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    426[39m:[38;5;10m[49m           this.logger.log(`Executing scheduled report: ${scheduledReport.templateId}`);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    427[39m:[38;5;10m[49m           
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    428[39m:[38;5;10m[49m           const report = await this.generateReport(scheduledReport.templateId, scheduledReport.parameters);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    429[39m:[38;5;10m[49m           
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    430[39m:[38;5;10m[49m           // Send report to recipients (simulate)
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    431[39m:[38;5;10m[49m           await this.sendReportToRecipients(report, scheduledReport.recipients);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    432[39m:[38;5;10m[49m           
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    433[39m:[38;5;10m[49m           // Update schedule
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    434[39m:[38;5;10m[49m           scheduledReport.lastRun = now;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    435[39m:[38;5;10m[49m           scheduledReport.nextRun = this.calculateNextRun(scheduledReport.schedule);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    436[39m:[38;5;10m[49m           
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    437[39m:[38;5;10m[49m           this.scheduledReports.set(scheduleId, scheduledReport);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    438[39m:[38;5;10m[49m           
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    439[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         } catch (error) {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    440[39m:[38;5;10m[49m           this.logger.error(`Failed to execute scheduled report ${scheduleId}:`, error);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    441[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    442[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    443[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    444[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    445[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    446[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   private async sendReportToRecipients(report: Report, recipients: string[]): Promise<void> {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    447[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     // Simulate sending report via email/notification service
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    448[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     this.logger.log(`Sending report ${report.name} to ${recipients.length} recipients`);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    449[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    450[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     // In a real implementation, this would integrate with the notification service
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    451[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     for (const recipient of recipients) {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    452[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       this.logger.debug(`Sent report to ${recipient}`);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    453[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    454[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    455[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    456[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   // Export Functionality
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    457[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   async exportReport(reportId: string, format: 'pdf' | 'csv' | 'excel' | 'html'): Promise<Buffer> {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    458[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     const report = this.reports.get(reportId);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    459[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     if (!report) {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    460[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       throw new Error(`Report ${reportId} not found`);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    461[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    462[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    463[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     switch (format) {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    464[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       case 'pdf':
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    465[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         return await this.exportToPDF(report);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    466[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       case 'csv':
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    467[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         return await this.exportToCSV(report);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    468[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       case 'excel':
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    469[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         return await this.exportToExcel(report);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    470[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       case 'html':
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    471[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         return await this.exportToHTML(report);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    472[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       default:
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    473[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         throw new Error(`Unsupported export format: ${format}`);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    474[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    475[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    476[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    477[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   private async exportToPDF(report: Report): Promise<Buffer> {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    478[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     // Simulate PDF generation
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    479[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     const pdfContent = `PDF Report: ${report.name}\nGenerated: ${report.generatedAt}\n\nData: ${JSON.stringify(report.data, null, 2)}`;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    480[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     return Buffer.from(pdfContent, 'utf8');
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    481[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    482[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    483[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   private async exportToCSV(report: Report): Promise<Buffer> {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    484[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     // Simulate CSV generation
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    485[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     let csvContent = `Report Name,${report.name}\nGenerated At,${report.generatedAt}\n\n`;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    486[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    487[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     if (report.data && report.data.sections) {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    488[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       for (const section of report.data.sections) {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    489[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         csvContent += `Section,${section.title}\n`;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    490[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         if (Array.isArray(section.data)) {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    491[39m:[38;5;10m[49m           // Convert array data to CSV
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    492[39m:[38;5;10m[49m           const headers = Object.keys(section.data[0] || {});
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    493[39m:[38;5;10m[49m           csvContent += headers.join(',') + '\n';
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    494[39m:[38;5;10m[49m           
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    495[39m:[38;5;10m[49m           for (const row of section.data) {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    496[39m:[38;5;10m[49m             csvContent += headers.map(h => row[h] || '').join(',') + '\n';
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    497[39m:[38;5;10m[49m           }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    498[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    499[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         csvContent += '\n';
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    500[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    501[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    502[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    503[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     return Buffer.from(csvContent, 'utf8');
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    504[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    505[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    506[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   private async exportToExcel(report: Report): Promise<Buffer> {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    507[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     // Simulate Excel generation (would use a library like xlsx in real implementation)
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    508[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     const excelContent = `Excel Report: ${report.name}\nGenerated: ${report.generatedAt}\n\nData: ${JSON.stringify(report.data, null, 2)}`;

[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    564[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     const scheduled = this.scheduledReports.get(scheduleId);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    565[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     if (scheduled) {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    566[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       scheduled.status = 'cancelled';
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    567[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       this.scheduledReports.set(scheduleId, scheduled);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    568[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       return true;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    569[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    570[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     return false;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    571[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   }

[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    55[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   async getMetricDetails(@Param('metricId') metricId: string): Promise<BusinessMetric | null> {

[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     50[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   @ApiResponse({ status: 200, description: 'Report exported successfully' })
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     51[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   async exportReport(
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     52[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     @Param('reportId') reportId: string,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     53[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     @Query('format') format: 'pdf' | 'csv' | 'excel' | 'html' = 'pdf',
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     54[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     @Res() res: Response,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     55[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   ): Promise<void> {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     56[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     const exportData = await this.reportingService.exportReport(reportId, format);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     57[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     58[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     const contentTypes = {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     59[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       pdf: 'application/pdf',
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     60[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       csv: 'text/csv',
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     61[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       excel: 'application/vnd.openxmlformats-officedocument.spreadsheetml.sheet',
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     62[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       html: 'text/html',
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     63[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     };
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     64[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     65[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     const fileExtensions = {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     66[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       pdf: 'pdf',
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     67[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       csv: 'csv',
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     68[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       excel: 'xlsx',
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     69[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       html: 'html',
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     70[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     };
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     71[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     72[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     res.setHeader('Content-Type', contentTypes[format]);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     73[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     res.setHeader('Content-Disposition', `attachment; filename="report_${reportId}.${fileExtensions[format]}"`);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     74[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     res.send(exportData);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     75[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     76[39m:[38;5;10m[49m

[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     79[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   @ApiResponse({ status: 201, description: 'Report scheduled successfully' })

[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     33[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       port: parseInt(process.env.SMTP_PORT || '587'),

[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    163[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       `,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    164[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       text: `
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    165[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         Password Reset Request - {{companyName}}
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    166[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    167[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         Hello {{name}},
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    168[39m:[38;5;10m[49m

[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    170[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    171[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         SECURITY NOTICE: If you didn't request this password reset, please ignore this email. Your password will remain unchanged.
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    172[39m:[38;5;10m[49m

[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    174[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         {{resetUrl}}

[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    177[39m:[38;5;10m[49m

[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    179[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         For security questions, contact us at {{supportEmail}}
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    180[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       `,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    181[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     });
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    182[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    183[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     // Notification template
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    184[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     this.templates.set('notification', {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    185[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       subject: '{{subject}} - {{companyName}}',
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    186[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       html: `
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    187[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         <!DOCTYPE html>
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    188[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         <html>
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    189[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         <head>
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    190[39m:[38;5;10m[49m           <meta charset="utf-8">
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    191[39m:[38;5;10m[49m           <title>{{subject}}</title>
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    192[39m:[38;5;10m[49m           <style>
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    193[39m:[38;5;10m[49m             body { font-family: Arial, sans-serif; line-height: 1.6; color: #333; }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    194[39m:[38;5;10m[49m             .container { max-width: 600px; margin: 0 auto; padding: 20px; }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    195[39m:[38;5;10m[49m             .header { background: #28a745; color: white; padding: 20px; text-align: center; }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    196[39m:[38;5;10m[49m             .content { padding: 20px; background: #f9f9f9; }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    197[39m:[38;5;10m[49m             .footer { padding: 20px; text-align: center; font-size: 12px; color: #666; }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    198[39m:[38;5;10m[49m           </style>

[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    200[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         <body>
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    201[39m:[38;5;10m[49m           <div class="container">
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    202[39m:[38;5;10m[49m             <div class="header">
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    203[39m:[38;5;10m[49m               <h1>{{subject}}</h1>
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    204[39m:[38;5;10m[49m             </div>
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    205[39m:[38;5;10m[49m             <div class="content">
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    206[39m:[38;5;10m[49m               <h2>Hello {{name}},</h2>
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    207[39m:[38;5;10m[49m               <p>{{message}}</p>
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    208[39m:[38;5;10m[49m               {{#if actionUrl}}
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    209[39m:[38;5;10m[49m               <p style="text-align: center;">
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    210[39m:[38;5;10m[49m                 <a href="{{actionUrl}}" style="display: inline-block; padding: 12px 24px; background: #28a745; color: white; text-decoration: none; border-radius: 4px;">{{actionText}}</a>
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    211[39m:[38;5;10m[49m               </p>
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    212[39m:[38;5;10m[49m               {{/if}}
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    213[39m:[38;5;10m[49m             </div>
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    214[39m:[38;5;10m[49m             <div class="footer">
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    215[39m:[38;5;10m[49m               <p>Â© {{year}} {{companyName}}. All rights reserved.</p>
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    216[39m:[38;5;10m[49m             </div>
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    217[39m:[38;5;10m[49m           </div>
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    218[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         </body>
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    219[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         </html>
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    220[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       `,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    221[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       text: `
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    222[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         {{subject}} - {{companyName}}
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    223[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    224[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         Hello {{name}},
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    225[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    226[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         {{message}}
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    227[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    228[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         {{#if actionUrl}}
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    229[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         {{actionText}}: {{actionUrl}}
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    230[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         {{/if}}
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    231[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    232[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         Â© {{year}} {{companyName}}. All rights reserved.
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    233[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       `,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    234[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     });
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    235[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    236[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     this.logger.log(`Loaded ${this.templates.size} email templates`);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    237[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    238[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    239[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   @Process('send-email')
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    240[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   async handleSendEmail(job: Job<EmailJob>): Promise<void> {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    241[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     const { id, userId, template, data, to, subject, priority } = job.data;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    242[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    243[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     this.logger.debug(`Processing email job ${id} for user ${userId}`);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    244[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    245[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     try {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    246[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       // Get template
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    247[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       const emailTemplate = this.templates.get(template);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    248[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       if (!emailTemplate) {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    249[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         throw new Error(`Email template '${template}' not found`);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    250[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    251[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    252[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       // Prepare template data with defaults
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    253[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       const templateData = {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    254[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         ...data,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    255[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         companyName: data.companyName || 'Nexus Platform',
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    256[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         year: new Date().getFullYear(),
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    257[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         supportEmail: data.supportEmail || 'support@nexus.dev',
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    258[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         dashboardUrl: data.dashboardUrl || process.env.FRONTEND_URL || 'http://localhost:3000',
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    259[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       };
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    260[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    261[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       // Compile templates
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    262[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       const subjectTemplate = handlebars.compile(emailTemplate.subject);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    263[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       const htmlTemplate = handlebars.compile(emailTemplate.html);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    264[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       const textTemplate = handlebars.compile(emailTemplate.text);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    265[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    266[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       // Render email content
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    267[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       const renderedSubject = subjectTemplate(templateData);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    268[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       const renderedHtml = htmlTemplate(templateData);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    269[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       const renderedText = textTemplate(templateData);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    270[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    271[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       // Send email
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    272[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       const mailOptions = {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    273[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         from: process.env.SMTP_FROM || 'noreply@nexus.dev',
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    274[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         to: to || data.email,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    275[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         subject: subject || renderedSubject,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    276[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         html: renderedHtml,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    277[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         text: renderedText,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    278[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         priority: this.mapPriority(priority),
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    279[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         headers: {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    280[39m:[38;5;10m[49m           'X-Notification-ID': id,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    281[39m:[38;5;10m[49m           'X-User-ID': userId,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    282[39m:[38;5;10m[49m           'X-Template': template,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    283[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         },
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    284[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       };
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    285[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    286[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       const result = await this.transporter.sendMail(mailOptions);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    287[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    288[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       this.logger.log(`Email sent successfully: ${id} (MessageID: ${result.messageId})`);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    289[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    290[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       // Update job with success info
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    291[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       job.progress(100);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    292[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    293[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     } catch (error) {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    294[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       this.logger.error(`Failed to send email ${id}:`, error);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    295[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       throw error; // This will mark the job as failed and trigger retry
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    296[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    297[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    298[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    299[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   @Process('send-bulk-email')
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    300[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   async handleBulkEmail(job: Job<{ emails: EmailJob[] }>): Promise<void> {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    301[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     const { emails } = job.data;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    302[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    303[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     this.logger.debug(`Processing bulk email job with ${emails.length} emails`);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    304[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    305[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     let successCount = 0;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    306[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     let failureCount = 0;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    307[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    308[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     for (let i = 0; i < emails.length; i++) {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    309[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       try {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    310[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         await this.handleSendEmail({ data: emails[i] } as Job<EmailJob>);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    311[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         successCount++;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    312[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       } catch (error) {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    313[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         failureCount++;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    314[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         this.logger.error(`Failed to send bulk email ${i}:`, error);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    315[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    316[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    317[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       // Update progress
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    318[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       job.progress(Math.round(((i + 1) / emails.length) * 100));
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    319[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    320[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    321[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     this.logger.log(`Bulk email completed: ${successCount} sent, ${failureCount} failed`);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    322[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    323[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    324[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   private mapPriority(priority: string): 'high' | 'normal' | 'low' {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    325[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     switch (priority?.toLowerCase()) {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    326[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       case 'urgent':
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    327[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       case 'high':
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    328[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         return 'high';
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    329[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       case 'low':
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    330[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         return 'low';
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    331[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       default:
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    332[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         return 'normal';
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    333[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    334[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    335[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    336[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   // Template management
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    337[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   async addTemplate(name: string, template: { subject: string; html: string; text: string }): Promise<void> {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    338[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     this.templates.set(name, template);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    339[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     this.logger.log(`Added email template: ${name}`);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    340[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    341[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    342[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   async getTemplate(name: string): Promise<{ subject: string; html: string; text: string } | undefined> {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    343[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     return this.templates.get(name);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    344[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    345[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    346[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   async getAllTemplates(): Promise<string[]> {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    347[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     return Array.from(this.templates.keys());
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    348[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    349[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    350[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   // Email validation
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    351[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   private isValidEmail(email: string): boolean {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    352[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     const emailRegex = /^[^\s@]+@[^\s@]+\.[^\s@]+$/;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    353[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     return emailRegex.test(email);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    354[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    355[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    356[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   // Bounce handling (would integrate with webhook endpoints)
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    357[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   async handleBounce(messageId: string, bounceType: 'hard' | 'soft', reason: string): Promise<void> {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    358[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     this.logger.warn(`Email bounce detected: ${messageId} (${bounceType}): ${reason}`);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    359[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    360[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     // In a real implementation, you would:
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    361[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     // 1. Update user's email status
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    362[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     // 2. Add to suppression list if hard bounce

[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     27[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     this.loadSMSTemplates();
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     28[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     29[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     30[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   private initializeTwilio(): void {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     31[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     const accountSid = process.env.TWILIO_ACCOUNT_SID;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     32[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     const authToken = process.env.TWILIO_AUTH_TOKEN;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     33[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     this.fromNumber = process.env.TWILIO_FROM_NUMBER || '+1234567890';
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     34[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     35[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     if (!accountSid || !authToken) {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     36[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       this.logger.warn('Twilio credentials not configured. SMS functionality will be limited.');
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     37[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       return;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     38[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     39[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     40[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     try {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     41[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       this.twilioClient = new Twilio(accountSid, authToken);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     42[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       this.logger.log('Twilio client initialized successfully');
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     43[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     } catch (error) {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     44[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       this.logger.error('Failed to initialize Twilio client:', error);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     45[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     46[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     47[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     48[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   private loadSMSTemplates(): void {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     49[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     // Welcome SMS template
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     50[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     this.templates.set('welcome', 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     51[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       'Welcome to {{companyName}}, {{name}}! Your account is now active. Get started: {{dashboardUrl}}'
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     52[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     );
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     53[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     54[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     // Password reset SMS template
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     55[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     this.templates.set('password-reset', 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     56[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       'Password reset for {{companyName}}: {{resetUrl}} (expires in 24h). If you didn\'t request this, ignore this message.'
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     57[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     );
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     58[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     59[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     // Verification code template
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     60[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     this.templates.set('verification-code', 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     61[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       'Your {{companyName}} verification code is: {{code}}. This code expires in {{expiryMinutes}} minutes.'
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     62[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     );
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     63[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     64[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     // Alert template
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     65[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     this.templates.set('alert', 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     66[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       'ALERT: {{alertType}} - {{message}}. Time: {{timestamp}}. Check your dashboard for details.'
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     67[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     );
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     68[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     69[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     // Notification template
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     70[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     this.templates.set('notification', 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     71[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       '{{companyName}}: {{message}}{{#if actionUrl}} - {{actionUrl}}{{/if}}'
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     72[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     );
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     73[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     74[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     // Order confirmation template
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     75[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     this.templates.set('order-confirmation', 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     76[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       'Order confirmed! Order #{{orderNumber}} for ${{amount}}. Estimated delivery: {{deliveryDate}}. Track: {{trackingUrl}}'
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     77[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     );
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     78[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     79[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     // Appointment reminder template
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     80[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     this.templates.set('appointment-reminder', 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     81[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       'Reminder: You have an appointment with {{providerName}} on {{date}} at {{time}}. Location: {{location}}'
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     82[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     );
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     83[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     84[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     // Payment reminder template
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     85[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     this.templates.set('payment-reminder', 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     86[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       'Payment reminder: Your {{serviceName}} payment of ${{amount}} is due on {{dueDate}}. Pay now: {{paymentUrl}}'
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     87[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     );
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     88[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     89[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     this.logger.log(`Loaded ${this.templates.size} SMS templates`);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     90[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     91[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     92[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   @Process('send-sms')
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     93[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   async handleSendSMS(job: Job<SMSJob>): Promise<void> {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     94[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     const { id, userId, template, data, to, message, priority } = job.data;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     95[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     96[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     this.logger.debug(`Processing SMS job ${id} for user ${userId}`);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     97[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     98[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     if (!this.twilioClient) {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     99[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       throw new Error('Twilio client not initialized. Check your configuration.');
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    100[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    101[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    102[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     try {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    103[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       // Get template and render message
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    104[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       let finalMessage = message;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    105[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    106[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       if (template && this.templates.has(template)) {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    107[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         const templateContent = this.templates.get(template)!;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    108[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         finalMessage = this.renderTemplate(templateContent, {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    109[39m:[38;5;10m[49m           ...data,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    110[39m:[38;5;10m[49m           companyName: data.companyName || 'Nexus Platform',
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    111[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         });
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    112[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    113[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    114[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       // Validate phone number
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    115[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       const cleanPhoneNumber = this.cleanPhoneNumber(to);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    116[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       if (!this.isValidPhoneNumber(cleanPhoneNumber)) {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    117[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         throw new Error(`Invalid phone number: ${to}`);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    118[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    119[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    120[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       // Truncate message if too long (SMS limit is 160 characters for single SMS)
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    121[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       if (finalMessage.length > 160) {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    122[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         this.logger.warn(`SMS message truncated from ${finalMessage.length} to 160 characters`);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    123[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         finalMessage = finalMessage.substring(0, 157) + '...';
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    124[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    125[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    126[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       // Send SMS via Twilio
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    127[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       const result = await this.twilioClient.messages.create({
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    128[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         body: finalMessage,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    129[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         from: this.fromNumber,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    130[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         to: cleanPhoneNumber,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    131[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         statusCallback: `${process.env.API_BASE_URL}/webhooks/sms/status`,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    132[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       });
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    133[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    134[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       this.logger.log(`SMS sent successfully: ${id} (SID: ${result.sid})`);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    135[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    136[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       // Update job progress
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    137[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       job.progress(100);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    138[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    139[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     } catch (error) {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    140[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       this.logger.error(`Failed to send SMS ${id}:`, error);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    141[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       throw error;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    142[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    143[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    144[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    145[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   @Process('send-bulk-sms')
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    146[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   async handleBulkSMS(job: Job<{ messages: SMSJob[] }>): Promise<void> {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    147[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     const { messages } = job.data;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    148[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    149[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     this.logger.debug(`Processing bulk SMS job with ${messages.length} messages`);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    150[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    151[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     let successCount = 0;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    152[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     let failureCount = 0;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    153[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    154[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     for (let i = 0; i < messages.length; i++) {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    155[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       try {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    156[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         await this.handleSendSMS({ data: messages[i] } as Job<SMSJob>);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    157[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         successCount++;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    158[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    159[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         // Rate limiting - Twilio has rate limits
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    160[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         if (i < messages.length - 1) {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    161[39m:[38;5;10m[49m           await this.delay(100); // 100ms delay between messages
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    162[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    163[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       } catch (error) {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    164[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         failureCount++;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    165[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         this.logger.error(`Failed to send bulk SMS ${i}:`, error);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    166[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    167[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    168[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       // Update progress
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    169[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       job.progress(Math.round(((i + 1) / messages.length) * 100));
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    170[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    171[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    172[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     this.logger.log(`Bulk SMS completed: ${successCount} sent, ${failureCount} failed`);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    173[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    174[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    175[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   @Process('send-verification-code')
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    176[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   async handleVerificationCode(job: Job<{
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    177[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     phoneNumber: string;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    178[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     code: string;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    179[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     expiryMinutes: number;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    180[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   }>): Promise<void> {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    181[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     const { phoneNumber, code, expiryMinutes } = job.data;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    182[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    183[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     const smsJob: SMSJob = {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    184[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       id: `verification_${Date.now()}`,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    185[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       userId: 'system',
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    186[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       template: 'verification-code',
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    187[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       data: {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    188[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         code,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    189[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         expiryMinutes,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    190[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         companyName: 'Nexus Platform',
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    191[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       },
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    192[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       to: phoneNumber,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    193[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       message: '',
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    194[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       priority: 'high',
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    195[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       channel: 'sms',
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    196[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       timestamp: new Date(),
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    197[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     };
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    198[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    199[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     await this.handleSendSMS({ data: smsJob } as Job<SMSJob>);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    200[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    201[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    202[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   private renderTemplate(template: string, data: Record<string, any>): string {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    203[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     let rendered = template;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    204[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    205[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     // Simple template rendering (replace {{variable}} with data values)
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    206[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     Object.keys(data).forEach(key => {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    207[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       const regex = new RegExp(`{{${key}}}`, 'g');
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    208[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       rendered = rendered.replace(regex, String(data[key] || ''));
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    209[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     });
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    210[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    211[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     // Handle conditional blocks {{#if variable}}...{{/if}}
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    212[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     rendered = rendered.replace(/{{#if\s+(\w+)}}(.*?){{\/if}}/g, (match, variable, content) => {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    213[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       return data[variable] ? content : '';
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    214[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     });
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    215[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    216[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     return rendered;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    217[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    218[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    219[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   private cleanPhoneNumber(phoneNumber: string): string {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    220[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     // Remove all non-digit characters except +
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    221[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     let cleaned = phoneNumber.replace(/[^\d+]/g, '');
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    222[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    223[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     // Add country code if missing (assuming US +1)
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    224[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     if (!cleaned.startsWith('+')) {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    225[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       if (cleaned.length === 10) {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    226[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         cleaned = '+1' + cleaned;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    227[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       } else if (cleaned.length === 11 && cleaned.startsWith('1')) {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    228[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         cleaned = '+' + cleaned;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    229[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    230[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    231[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    232[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     return cleaned;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    233[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    234[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    235[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   private isValidPhoneNumber(phoneNumber: string): boolean {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    236[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     // Basic phone number validation
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    237[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     const phoneRegex = /^\+[1-9]\d{1,14}$/;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    238[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     return phoneRegex.test(phoneNumber);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    239[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   }
