[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     66[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     this.cdnUrl = process.env.CDN_URL || 'https://cdn.nexus.dev';
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     67[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     68[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     69[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   private initializeS3(): void {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     70[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     this.s3Client = new S3Client({
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     71[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       region: process.env.AWS_REGION || 'us-east-1',
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     72[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       credentials: {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     73[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         accessKeyId: process.env.AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID || '',
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     74[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         secretAccessKey: process.env.AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY || '',
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     75[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       },
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     76[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     });
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     77[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     78[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     79[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   // File Upload
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     80[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   async uploadFile(
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     81[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     file: Express.Multer.File,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     82[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     options: UploadOptions
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     83[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   ): Promise<FileMetadata> {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     84[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     this.logger.debug(`Uploading file: ${file.originalname} (${file.size} bytes)`);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     85[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     86[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     // Validate file
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     87[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     await this.validateFile(file, options);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     88[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     89[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     // Generate unique filename
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     90[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     const fileId = this.generateFileId();
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     91[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     const extension = path.extname(file.originalname);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     92[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     const filename = `${fileId}${extension}`;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     93[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     const filePath = this.generateFilePath(options.userId, filename);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     94[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     95[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     // Detect file type
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     96[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     const detectedType = await fileTypeFromBuffer(file.buffer);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     97[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     const mimetype = detectedType?.mime || file.mimetype;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     98[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     99[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     // Create file metadata
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    100[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     const fileMetadata: FileMetadata = {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    101[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       id: fileId,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    102[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       originalName: file.originalname,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    103[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       filename,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    104[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       mimetype,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    105[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       size: file.size,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    106[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       path: filePath,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    107[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       url: `${this.cdnUrl}/${filePath}`,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    108[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       userId: options.userId,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    109[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       folderId: options.folderId,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    110[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       tags: options.tags || [],
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    111[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       isPublic: options.isPublic || false,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    112[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       uploadedAt: new Date(),
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    113[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       downloadCount: 0,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    114[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       virusScanStatus: 'pending',
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    115[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       processingStatus: 'pending',
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    116[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       metadata: {},
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    117[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     };
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    118[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    119[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     try {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    120[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       // Upload to S3
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    121[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       await this.uploadToS3(filePath, file.buffer, mimetype);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    122[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    123[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       // Store metadata
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    124[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       this.files.set(fileId, fileMetadata);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    125[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    126[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       // Queue for virus scanning
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    127[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       await this.virusScanQueue.add('scan-file', {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    128[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         fileId,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    129[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         filePath,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    130[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         userId: options.userId,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    131[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       });
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    132[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    133[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       // Queue for processing
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    134[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       await this.fileProcessingQueue.add('process-file', {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    135[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         fileId,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    136[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         filePath,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    137[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         mimetype,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    138[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         generateThumbnail: options.generateThumbnail,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    139[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       });
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    140[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    141[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       this.logger.log(`File uploaded successfully: ${fileId}`);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    142[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       return fileMetadata;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    143[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    144[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     } catch (error) {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    145[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       this.logger.error(`Failed to upload file ${fileId}:`, error);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    146[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       throw error;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    147[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    148[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    149[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    150[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   // Multiple file upload
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    151[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   async uploadMultipleFiles(
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    152[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     files: Express.Multer.File[],
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    153[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     options: UploadOptions
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    154[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   ): Promise<FileMetadata[]> {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    155[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     this.logger.debug(`Uploading ${files.length} files`);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    156[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    157[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     const uploadPromises = files.map(file => this.uploadFile(file, options));
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    158[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     return await Promise.all(uploadPromises);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    159[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    160[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    161[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   // File Download
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    162[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   async downloadFile(fileId: string, userId?: string): Promise<{
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    163[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     stream: NodeJS.ReadableStream;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    164[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     metadata: FileMetadata;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    165[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   }> {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    166[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     const fileMetadata = this.files.get(fileId);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    167[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     if (!fileMetadata) {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    168[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       throw new BadRequestException(`File ${fileId} not found`);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    169[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    170[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    171[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     // Check access permissions
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    172[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     if (!fileMetadata.isPublic && fileMetadata.userId !== userId) {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    173[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       throw new BadRequestException('Access denied');
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    174[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    175[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    176[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     try {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    177[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       // Get file from S3
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    178[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       const command = new GetObjectCommand({
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    179[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         Bucket: this.bucketName,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    180[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         Key: fileMetadata.path,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    181[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       });
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    182[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    183[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       const response = await this.s3Client.send(command);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    184[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    185[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       // Update access statistics
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    186[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       fileMetadata.lastAccessedAt = new Date();
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    187[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       fileMetadata.downloadCount++;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    188[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       this.files.set(fileId, fileMetadata);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    189[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    190[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       return {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    191[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         stream: response.Body as NodeJS.ReadableStream,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    192[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         metadata: fileMetadata,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    193[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       };
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    194[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    195[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     } catch (error) {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    196[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       this.logger.error(`Failed to download file ${fileId}:`, error);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    197[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       throw error;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    198[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    199[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    200[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    201[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   // Generate presigned URL for direct download
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    202[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   async getPresignedUrl(fileId: string, expiresIn: number = 3600): Promise<string> {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    203[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     const fileMetadata = this.files.get(fileId);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    204[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     if (!fileMetadata) {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    205[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       throw new BadRequestException(`File ${fileId} not found`);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    206[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    207[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    208[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     const command = new GetObjectCommand({
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    209[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       Bucket: this.bucketName,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    210[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       Key: fileMetadata.path,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    211[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     });
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    212[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    213[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     return await getSignedUrl(this.s3Client, command, { expiresIn });
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    214[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    215[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    216[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   // File deletion
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    217[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   async deleteFile(fileId: string, userId: string): Promise<void> {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    218[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     const fileMetadata = this.files.get(fileId);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    219[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     if (!fileMetadata) {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    220[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       throw new BadRequestException(`File ${fileId} not found`);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    221[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    222[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    223[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     // Check ownership
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    224[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     if (fileMetadata.userId !== userId) {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    225[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       throw new BadRequestException('Access denied');
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    226[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    227[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    228[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     try {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    229[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       // Delete from S3
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    230[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       await this.deleteFromS3(fileMetadata.path);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    231[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    232[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       // Delete thumbnail if exists
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    233[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       if (fileMetadata.thumbnailUrl) {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    234[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         const thumbnailPath = fileMetadata.path.replace(/\.[^/.]+$/, '_thumb.jpg');
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    235[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         await this.deleteFromS3(thumbnailPath);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    236[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    237[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    238[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       // Remove from metadata
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    239[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       this.files.delete(fileId);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    240[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    241[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       this.logger.log(`File deleted successfully: ${fileId}`);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    242[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    243[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     } catch (error) {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    244[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       this.logger.error(`Failed to delete file ${fileId}:`, error);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    245[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       throw error;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    246[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    247[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    248[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    249[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   // File search and listing
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    250[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   async listFiles(
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    251[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     userId: string,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    252[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     options: {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    253[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       folderId?: string;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    254[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       tags?: string[];
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    255[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       mimetype?: string;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    256[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       limit?: number;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    257[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       offset?: number;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    258[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       sortBy?: 'name' | 'size' | 'date';
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    259[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       sortOrder?: 'asc' | 'desc';
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    260[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     } = {}
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    261[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   ): Promise<{
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    262[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     files: FileMetadata[];
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    263[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     total: number;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    264[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     hasMore: boolean;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    265[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   }> {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    266[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     let userFiles = Array.from(this.files.values())
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    267[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       .filter(file => file.userId === userId);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    268[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    269[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     // Apply filters
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    270[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     if (options.folderId) {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    271[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       userFiles = userFiles.filter(file => file.folderId === options.folderId);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    272[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    273[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    274[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     if (options.tags && options.tags.length > 0) {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    275[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       userFiles = userFiles.filter(file => 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    276[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         options.tags!.some(tag => file.tags.includes(tag))
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    277[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       );
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    278[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    279[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    280[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     if (options.mimetype) {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    281[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       userFiles = userFiles.filter(file => 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    282[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         file.mimetype.startsWith(options.mimetype!)
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    283[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       );
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    284[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    285[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    286[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     // Sort files
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    287[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     const sortBy = options.sortBy || 'date';
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    288[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     const sortOrder = options.sortOrder || 'desc';
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    289[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    290[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     userFiles.sort((a, b) => {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    291[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       let comparison = 0;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    292[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    293[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       switch (sortBy) {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    294[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         case 'name':
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    295[39m:[38;5;10m[49m           comparison = a.originalName.localeCompare(b.originalName);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    296[39m:[38;5;10m[49m           break;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    297[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         case 'size':
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    298[39m:[38;5;10m[49m           comparison = a.size - b.size;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    299[39m:[38;5;10m[49m           break;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    300[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         case 'date':
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    301[39m:[38;5;10m[49m           comparison = a.uploadedAt.getTime() - b.uploadedAt.getTime();
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    302[39m:[38;5;10m[49m           break;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    303[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    304[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    305[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       return sortOrder === 'asc' ? comparison : -comparison;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    306[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     });
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    307[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    308[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     // Pagination
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    309[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     const limit = options.limit || 50;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    310[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     const offset = options.offset || 0;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    311[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     const total = userFiles.length;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    312[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     const paginatedFiles = userFiles.slice(offset, offset + limit);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    313[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    314[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     return {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    315[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       files: paginatedFiles,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    316[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       total,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    317[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       hasMore: offset + limit < total,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    318[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     };
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    319[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    320[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    321[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   // File search
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    322[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   async searchFiles(
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    323[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     userId: string,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    324[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     query: string,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    325[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     options: {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    326[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       mimetype?: string;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    327[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       tags?: string[];
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    328[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       limit?: number;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    329[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     } = {}
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    330[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   ): Promise<FileMetadata[]> {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    331[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     const userFiles = Array.from(this.files.values())
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    332[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       .filter(file => file.userId === userId);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    333[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    334[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     const searchResults = userFiles.filter(file => {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    335[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       // Search in filename and tags
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    336[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       const searchText = `${file.originalName} ${file.tags.join(' ')}`.toLowerCase();
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    337[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       const matchesQuery = searchText.includes(query.toLowerCase());
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    338[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    339[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       // Apply additional filters
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    340[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       const matchesMimetype = !options.mimetype || file.mimetype.startsWith(options.mimetype);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    341[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       const matchesTags = !options.tags || options.tags.some(tag => file.tags.includes(tag));
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    342[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    343[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       return matchesQuery && matchesMimetype && matchesTags;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    344[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     });
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    345[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    346[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     const limit = options.limit || 20;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    347[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     return searchResults.slice(0, limit);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    348[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    349[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    350[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   // Folder management
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    351[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   async createFolder(name: string, userId: string, parentId?: string): Promise<{
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    352[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     id: string;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    353[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     name: string;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    354[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     parentId?: string;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    355[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     userId: string;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    356[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     createdAt: Date;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    357[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   }> {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    358[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     const folderId = this.generateFileId();
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    359[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    360[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     const folder = {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    361[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       id: folderId,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    362[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       name,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    363[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       parentId,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    364[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       userId,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    365[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       createdAt: new Date(),
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    366[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     };
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    367[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    368[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     // In a real implementation, this would be stored in a database
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    369[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     this.logger.log(`Created folder: ${name} (${folderId})`);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    370[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    371[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     return folder;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    372[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    373[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    374[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   // File sharing
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    375[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   async shareFile(fileId: string, userId: string, options: {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    376[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     expiresAt?: Date;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    377[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     password?: string;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    378[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     allowDownload?: boolean;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    379[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   } = {}): Promise<{
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    380[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     shareId: string;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    381[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     shareUrl: string;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    382[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     expiresAt?: Date;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    383[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   }> {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    384[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     const fileMetadata = this.files.get(fileId);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    385[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     if (!fileMetadata || fileMetadata.userId !== userId) {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    386[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       throw new BadRequestException('File not found or access denied');
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    387[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    388[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    389[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     const shareId = this.generateFileId();
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    390[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     const shareUrl = `${process.env.FRONTEND_URL}/share/${shareId}`;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    391[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    392[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     // In a real implementation, share data would be stored in database
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    393[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     this.logger.log(`Created share link for file ${fileId}: ${shareId}`);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    394[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    395[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     return {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    396[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       shareId,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    397[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       shareUrl,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    398[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       expiresAt: options.expiresAt,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    399[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     };
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    400[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    401[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    402[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   // File statistics
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    403[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   async getFileStats(userId: string): Promise<{
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    404[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     totalFiles: number;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    405[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     totalSize: number;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    406[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     filesByType: Record<string, number>;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    407[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     storageUsed: number;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    408[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     storageLimit: number;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    409[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   }> {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    410[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     const userFiles = Array.from(this.files.values())
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    411[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       .filter(file => file.userId === userId);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    412[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    413[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     const totalFiles = userFiles.length;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    414[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     const totalSize = userFiles.reduce((sum, file) => sum + file.size, 0);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    415[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    416[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     const filesByType: Record<string, number> = {};
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    417[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     userFiles.forEach(file => {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    418[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       const type = file.mimetype.split('/')[0];
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    419[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       filesByType[type] = (filesByType[type] || 0) + 1;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    420[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     });
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    421[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    422[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     return {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    423[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       totalFiles,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    424[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       totalSize,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    425[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       filesByType,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    426[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       storageUsed: totalSize,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    427[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       storageLimit: 10 * 1024 * 1024 * 1024, // 10GB default limit
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    428[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     };
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    429[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    430[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    431[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   // Private helper methods
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    432[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   private async validateFile(file: Express.Multer.File, options: UploadOptions): Promise<void> {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    433[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     // Size validation
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    434[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     const maxSize = options.maxSize || 100 * 1024 * 1024; // 100MB default
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    435[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     if (file.size > maxSize) {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    436[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       throw new BadRequestException(`File size exceeds limit of ${maxSize} bytes`);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    437[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    438[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    439[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     // Type validation
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    440[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     if (options.allowedTypes && options.allowedTypes.length > 0) {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    441[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       const isAllowed = options.allowedTypes.some(type => 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    442[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         file.mimetype.startsWith(type) || file.mimetype === type
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    443[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       );
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    444[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    445[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       if (!isAllowed) {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    446[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         throw new BadRequestException(`File type ${file.mimetype} not allowed`);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    447[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    448[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    449[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    450[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     // Filename validation
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    451[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     if (!file.originalname || file.originalname.length > 255) {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    452[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       throw new BadRequestException('Invalid filename');
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    453[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    454[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    455[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    456[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   private generateFileId(): string {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    457[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     return `file_${Date.now()}_${Math.random().toString(36).substr(2, 9)}`;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    458[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    459[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    460[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   private generateFilePath(userId: string, filename: string): string {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    461[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     const date = new Date();
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    462[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     const year = date.getFullYear();
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    463[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     const month = String(date.getMonth() + 1).padStart(2, '0');
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    464[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     const day = String(date.getDate()).padStart(2, '0');
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    465[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    466[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     return `users/${userId}/${year}/${month}/${day}/${filename}`;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    467[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    468[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    469[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   private async uploadToS3(key: string, buffer: Buffer, contentType: string): Promise<void> {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    470[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     const command = new PutObjectCommand({
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    471[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       Bucket: this.bucketName,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    472[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       Key: key,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    473[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       Body: buffer,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    474[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       ContentType: contentType,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    475[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     });

[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    194[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   // Authentication
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    195[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   async authenticate(
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    196[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     email: string,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    197[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     password: string,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    198[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     tenantId: string = 'default',
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    199[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     mfaCode?: string
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    200[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   ): Promise<{
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    201[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     user: User;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    202[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     accessToken: string;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    203[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     refreshToken: string;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    204[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     requiresMfa: boolean;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    205[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   }> {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    206[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     const user = Array.from(this.users.values())
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    207[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       .find(u => u.email === email && u.tenantId === tenantId);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    208[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    209[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     if (!user || !user.isActive) {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    210[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       throw new UnauthorizedException('Invalid credentials');
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    211[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    212[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    213[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     // Verify password (in real implementation, compare with hashed password)
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    214[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     const isPasswordValid = await bcrypt.compare(password, user.metadata.passwordHash || '');
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    215[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     if (!isPasswordValid) {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    216[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       throw new UnauthorizedException('Invalid credentials');
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    217[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    218[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    219[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     // Check MFA if enabled
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    220[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     if (user.mfaEnabled) {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    221[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       if (!mfaCode) {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    222[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         return {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    223[39m:[38;5;10m[49m           user,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    224[39m:[38;5;10m[49m           accessToken: '',
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    225[39m:[38;5;10m[49m           refreshToken: '',
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    226[39m:[38;5;10m[49m           requiresMfa: true,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    227[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         };
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    228[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    229[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    230[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       const isValidMfa = speakeasy.totp.verify({
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    231[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         secret: user.mfaSecret!,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    232[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         encoding: 'base32',
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    233[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         token: mfaCode,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    234[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         window: 2,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    235[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       });
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    236[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    237[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       if (!isValidMfa) {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    238[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         throw new UnauthorizedException('Invalid MFA code');
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    239[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    240[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    241[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    242[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     // Generate tokens
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    243[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     const { accessToken, refreshToken } = await this.generateTokens(user);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    244[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    245[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     // Update last login
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    246[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     user.lastLoginAt = new Date();
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    247[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     this.users.set(user.id, user);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    248[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    249[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     return {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    250[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       user,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    251[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       accessToken,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    252[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       refreshToken,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    253[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       requiresMfa: false,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    254[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     };
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    255[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    256[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    257[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   // User Registration
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    258[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   async registerUser(userData: {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    259[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     email: string;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    260[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     password: string;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    261[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     firstName: string;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    262[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     lastName: string;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    263[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     username?: string;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    264[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     tenantId?: string;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    265[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   }): Promise<User> {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    266[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     const tenantId = userData.tenantId || 'default';
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    267[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     const tenant = this.tenants.get(tenantId);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    268[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    269[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     if (!tenant || !tenant.isActive) {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    270[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       throw new BadRequestException('Invalid tenant');
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    271[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    272[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    273[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     if (!tenant.settings.allowSelfRegistration) {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    274[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       throw new BadRequestException('Self registration not allowed');
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    275[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    276[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    277[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     // Check if user already exists
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    278[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     const existingUser = Array.from(this.users.values())
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    279[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       .find(u => u.email === userData.email && u.tenantId === tenantId);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    280[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    281[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     if (existingUser) {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    282[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       throw new BadRequestException('User already exists');
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    283[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    284[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    285[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     // Validate password policy
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    286[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     await this.validatePassword(userData.password, tenant.settings.passwordPolicy);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    287[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    288[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     // Hash password
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    289[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     const passwordHash = await bcrypt.hash(userData.password, 12);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    290[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    291[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     // Create user
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    292[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     const userId = this.generateId();
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    293[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     const user: User = {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    294[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       id: userId,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    295[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       email: userData.email,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    296[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       username: userData.username || userData.email,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    297[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       firstName: userData.firstName,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    298[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       lastName: userData.lastName,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    299[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       isActive: true,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    300[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       isVerified: !tenant.settings.requireEmailVerification,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    301[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       roles: [this.roles.get('user')!],
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    302[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       permissions: [],
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    303[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       tenantId,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    304[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       mfaEnabled: false,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    305[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       createdAt: new Date(),
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    306[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       updatedAt: new Date(),
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    307[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       metadata: { passwordHash },
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    308[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     };
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    309[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    310[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     this.users.set(userId, user);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    311[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     this.logger.log(`User registered: ${userData.email} (${userId})`);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    312[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    313[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     return user;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    314[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    315[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    316[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   // Role-Based Access Control
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    317[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   async assignRole(userId: string, roleId: string, assignedBy: string): Promise<void> {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    318[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     const user = this.users.get(userId);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    319[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     const role = this.roles.get(roleId);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    320[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    321[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     if (!user || !role) {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    322[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       throw new BadRequestException('User or role not found');
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    323[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    324[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    325[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     // Check if user already has the role
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    326[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     if (user.roles.some(r => r.id === roleId)) {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    327[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       throw new BadRequestException('User already has this role');
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    328[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    329[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    330[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     user.roles.push(role);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    331[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     user.updatedAt = new Date();
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    332[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     this.users.set(userId, user);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    333[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    334[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     this.logger.log(`Role ${roleId} assigned to user ${userId} by ${assignedBy}`);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    335[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    336[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    337[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   async removeRole(userId: string, roleId: string, removedBy: string): Promise<void> {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    338[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     const user = this.users.get(userId);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    339[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     if (!user) {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    340[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       throw new BadRequestException('User not found');
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    341[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    342[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    343[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     user.roles = user.roles.filter(r => r.id !== roleId);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    344[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     user.updatedAt = new Date();
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    345[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     this.users.set(userId, user);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    346[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    347[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     this.logger.log(`Role ${roleId} removed from user ${userId} by ${removedBy}`);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    348[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    349[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    350[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   // Permission Checking
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    351[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   async hasPermission(
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    352[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     userId: string,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    353[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     resource: string,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    354[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     action: string,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    355[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     context?: Record<string, any>
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    356[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   ): Promise<boolean> {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    357[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     const user = this.users.get(userId);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    358[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     if (!user || !user.isActive) {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    359[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       return false;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    360[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    361[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    362[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     // Check direct permissions
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    363[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     const hasDirectPermission = user.permissions.some(p => 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    364[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       p.resource === resource && p.action === action
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    365[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     );
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    366[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    367[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     if (hasDirectPermission) {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    368[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       return true;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    369[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    370[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    371[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     // Check role-based permissions
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    372[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     for (const role of user.roles) {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    373[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       const hasRolePermission = role.permissions.some(p => 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    374[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         p.resource === resource && (p.action === action || p.action === '*')
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    375[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       );
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    376[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    377[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       if (hasRolePermission) {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    378[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         return true;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    379[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    380[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    381[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    382[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     return false;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    383[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    384[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    385[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   // Multi-Factor Authentication
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    386[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   async enableMFA(userId: string): Promise<{
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    387[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     secret: string;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    388[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     qrCodeUrl: string;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    389[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     backupCodes: string[];
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    390[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   }> {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    391[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     const user = this.users.get(userId);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    392[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     if (!user) {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    393[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       throw new BadRequestException('User not found');
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    394[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    395[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    396[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     const secret = speakeasy.generateSecret({
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    397[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       name: `Nexus (${user.email})`,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    398[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       issuer: 'Nexus Platform',
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    399[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     });
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    400[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    401[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     const qrCodeUrl = await QRCode.toDataURL(secret.otpauth_url!);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    402[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     const backupCodes = this.generateBackupCodes();
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    403[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    404[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     user.mfaSecret = secret.base32;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    405[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     user.metadata.backupCodes = backupCodes;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    406[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     this.users.set(userId, user);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    407[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    408[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     return {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    409[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       secret: secret.base32,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    410[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       qrCodeUrl,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    411[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       backupCodes,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    412[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     };
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    413[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    414[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    415[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   async confirmMFA(userId: string, token: string): Promise<void> {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    416[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     const user = this.users.get(userId);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    417[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     if (!user || !user.mfaSecret) {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    418[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       throw new BadRequestException('MFA setup not found');
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    419[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    420[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    421[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     const isValid = speakeasy.totp.verify({
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    422[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       secret: user.mfaSecret,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    423[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       encoding: 'base32',
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    424[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       token,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    425[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       window: 2,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    426[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     });
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    427[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    428[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     if (!isValid) {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    429[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       throw new BadRequestException('Invalid MFA token');
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    430[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    431[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    432[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     user.mfaEnabled = true;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    433[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     user.updatedAt = new Date();
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    434[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     this.users.set(userId, user);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    435[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    436[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     this.logger.log(`MFA enabled for user ${userId}`);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    437[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    438[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    439[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   // Session Management
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    440[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   async createSession(
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    441[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     userId: string,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    442[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     ipAddress: string,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    443[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     userAgent: string
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    444[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   ): Promise<Session> {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    445[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     const user = this.users.get(userId);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    446[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     if (!user) {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    447[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       throw new BadRequestException('User not found');
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    448[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    449[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    450[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     const tenant = this.tenants.get(user.tenantId);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    451[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     if (!tenant) {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    452[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       throw new BadRequestException('Tenant not found');
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    453[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    454[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    455[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     // Check session limits
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    456[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     const userSessions = Array.from(this.sessions.values())
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    457[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       .filter(s => s.userId === userId && s.isActive);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    458[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    459[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     if (userSessions.length >= tenant.settings.maxSessions) {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    460[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       // Remove oldest session
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    461[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       const oldestSession = userSessions.sort((a, b) => 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    462[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         a.createdAt.getTime() - b.createdAt.getTime()
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    463[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       )[0];
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    464[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    465[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       await this.revokeSession(oldestSession.id);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    466[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    467[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    468[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     const sessionId = this.generateId();
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    469[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     const { accessToken, refreshToken } = await this.generateTokens(user);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    470[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    471[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     const session: Session = {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    472[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       id: sessionId,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    473[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       userId,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    474[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       tenantId: user.tenantId,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    475[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       accessToken,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    476[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       refreshToken,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    477[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       expiresAt: new Date(Date.now() + tenant.settings.sessionTimeout),
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    478[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       ipAddress,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    479[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       userAgent,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    480[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       isActive: true,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    481[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       createdAt: new Date(),
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    482[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     };
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    483[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    484[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     this.sessions.set(sessionId, session);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    485[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     return session;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    486[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    487[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    488[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   async revokeSession(sessionId: string): Promise<void> {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    489[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     const session = this.sessions.get(sessionId);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    490[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     if (session) {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    491[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       session.isActive = false;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    492[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       this.sessions.set(sessionId, session);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    493[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       this.logger.log(`Session revoked: ${sessionId}`);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    494[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    495[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    496[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    497[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   // Tenant Management
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    498[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   async createTenant(tenantData: {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    499[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     name: string;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    500[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     domain: string;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    501[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     settings?: Partial<Tenant['settings']>;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    502[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   }): Promise<Tenant> {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    503[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     const tenantId = this.generateId();
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    504[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    505[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     const tenant: Tenant = {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    506[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       id: tenantId,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    507[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       name: tenantData.name,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    508[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       domain: tenantData.domain,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    509[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       settings: {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    510[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         allowSelfRegistration: true,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    511[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         requireEmailVerification: true,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    512[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         passwordPolicy: {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    513[39m:[38;5;10m[49m           minLength: 8,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    514[39m:[38;5;10m[49m           requireUppercase: true,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    515[39m:[38;5;10m[49m           requireLowercase: true,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    516[39m:[38;5;10m[49m           requireNumbers: true,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    517[39m:[38;5;10m[49m           requireSpecialChars: true,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    518[39m:[38;5;10m[49m           maxAge: 90,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    519[39m:[38;5;10m[49m           preventReuse: 5,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    520[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         },
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    521[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         mfaRequired: false,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    522[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         sessionTimeout: 24 * 60 * 60 * 1000,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    523[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         maxSessions: 5,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    524[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         ...tenantData.settings,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    525[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       },
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    526[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       isActive: true,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    527[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       createdAt: new Date(),
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    528[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     };
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    529[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    530[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     this.tenants.set(tenantId, tenant);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    531[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     this.logger.log(`Tenant created: ${tenantData.name} (${tenantId})`);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    532[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    533[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     return tenant;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    534[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    535[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    536[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   // OAuth Integration
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    537[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   async handleOAuthCallback(
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    538[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     provider: string,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    539[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     profile: any,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    540[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     tenantId: string = 'default'
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    541[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   ): Promise<{
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    542[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     user: User;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    543[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     accessToken: string;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    544[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     refreshToken: string;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    545[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     isNewUser: boolean;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    546[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   }> {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    547[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     let user = Array.from(this.users.values())
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    548[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       .find(u => u.email === profile.email && u.tenantId === tenantId);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    549[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    550[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     let isNewUser = false;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    551[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    552[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     if (!user) {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    553[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       // Create new user from OAuth profile
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    554[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       const userId = this.generateId();
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    555[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       user = {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    556[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         id: userId,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    557[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         email: profile.email,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    558[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         username: profile.username || profile.email,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    559[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         firstName: profile.firstName || profile.name?.givenName || '',
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    560[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         lastName: profile.lastName || profile.name?.familyName || '',
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    561[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         isActive: true,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    562[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         isVerified: true, // OAuth users are pre-verified
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    563[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         roles: [this.roles.get('user')!],
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    564[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         permissions: [],
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    565[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         tenantId,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    566[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         mfaEnabled: false,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    567[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         createdAt: new Date(),
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    568[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         updatedAt: new Date(),
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    569[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         metadata: {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    570[39m:[38;5;10m[49m           oauthProvider: provider,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    571[39m:[38;5;10m[49m           oauthId: profile.id,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    572[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         },
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    573[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       };
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    574[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    575[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       this.users.set(userId, user);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    576[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       isNewUser = true;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    577[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       this.logger.log(`OAuth user created: ${profile.email} via ${provider}`);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    578[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    579[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    580[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     const { accessToken, refreshToken } = await this.generateTokens(user);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    581[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    582[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     return {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    583[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       user,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    584[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       accessToken,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    585[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       refreshToken,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    586[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       isNewUser,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    587[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     };
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    588[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    589[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    590[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   // Private helper methods
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    591[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   private async generateTokens(user: User): Promise<{
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    592[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     accessToken: string;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    593[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     refreshToken: string;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    594[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   }> {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    595[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     const payload = {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    596[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       sub: user.id,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    597[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       email: user.email,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    598[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       tenantId: user.tenantId,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    599[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       roles: user.roles.map(r => r.name),
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    600[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     };
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    601[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    602[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     const accessToken = this.jwtService.sign(payload, { expiresIn: '1h' });
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    603[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     const refreshToken = this.jwtService.sign(
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    604[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       { sub: user.id, type: 'refresh' },
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    605[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       { expiresIn: '7d' }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    606[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     );
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    607[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    608[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     return { accessToken, refreshToken };
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    609[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    610[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    611[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   private async validatePassword(password: string, policy: PasswordPolicy): Promise<void> {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    612[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     if (password.length < policy.minLength) {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    613[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       throw new BadRequestException(`Password must be at least ${policy.minLength} characters`);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    614[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    615[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    616[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     if (policy.requireUppercase && !/[A-Z]/.test(password)) {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    617[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       throw new BadRequestException('Password must contain uppercase letters');
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    618[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    619[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    620[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     if (policy.requireLowercase && !/[a-z]/.test(password)) {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    621[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       throw new BadRequestException('Password must contain lowercase letters');
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    622[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    623[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    624[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     if (policy.requireNumbers && !/\d/.test(password)) {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    625[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       throw new BadRequestException('Password must contain numbers');
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    626[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    627[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    628[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     if (policy.requireSpecialChars && !/[!@#$%^&*(),.?":{}|<>]/.test(password)) {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    629[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       throw new BadRequestException('Password must contain special characters');
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    630[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    631[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    632[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    633[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   private generateId(): string {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    634[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     return `${Date.now()}_${Math.random().toString(36).substr(2, 9)}`;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    635[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    636[39m:[38;5;10m[49m

[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    642[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     return codes;
