[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    188[39m:[38;5;10m[49m           'Unlimited users',
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    189[39m:[38;5;10m[49m           '1TB storage',
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    190[39m:[38;5;10m[49m           '24/7 dedicated support',
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    191[39m:[38;5;10m[49m           'All features',
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    192[39m:[38;5;10m[49m           'Custom integrations',
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    193[39m:[38;5;10m[49m           'SLA guarantee',
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    194[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         ],
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    195[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         isActive: true,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    196[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         metadata: {},
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    197[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         createdAt: new Date(),
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    198[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       },
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    199[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     ];
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    200[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    201[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     defaultPlans.forEach(plan => {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    202[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       this.plans.set(plan.id, plan);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    203[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     });
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    204[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    205[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     this.logger.log(`Initialized ${defaultPlans.length} default plans`);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    206[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    207[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    208[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   // Customer Management
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    209[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   async createCustomer(customerData: {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    210[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     email: string;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    211[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     name: string;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    212[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     phone?: string;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    213[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     address?: Customer['address'];
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    214[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     metadata?: Record<string, any>;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    215[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   }): Promise<Customer> {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    216[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     const customerId = this.generateId();
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    217[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    218[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     let stripeCustomerId: string | undefined;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    219[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    220[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     if (this.stripe) {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    221[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       try {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    222[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         const stripeCustomer = await this.stripe.customers.create({
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    223[39m:[38;5;10m[49m           email: customerData.email,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    224[39m:[38;5;10m[49m           name: customerData.name,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    225[39m:[38;5;10m[49m           phone: customerData.phone,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    226[39m:[38;5;10m[49m           address: customerData.address,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    227[39m:[38;5;10m[49m           metadata: customerData.metadata || {},
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    228[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         });
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    229[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         stripeCustomerId = stripeCustomer.id;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    230[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       } catch (error) {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    231[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         this.logger.error('Failed to create Stripe customer:', error);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    232[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    233[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    234[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    235[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     const customer: Customer = {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    236[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       id: customerId,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    237[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       email: customerData.email,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    238[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       name: customerData.name,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    239[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       phone: customerData.phone,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    240[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       address: customerData.address,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    241[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       stripeCustomerId,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    242[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       metadata: customerData.metadata || {},
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    243[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       createdAt: new Date(),
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    244[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       updatedAt: new Date(),
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    245[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     };
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    246[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    247[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     this.customers.set(customerId, customer);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    248[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     this.logger.log(`Customer created: ${customerData.email} (${customerId})`);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    249[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    250[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     return customer;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    251[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    252[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    253[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   // Payment Processing
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    254[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   async createPayment(paymentData: {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    255[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     customerId: string;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    256[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     amount: number;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    257[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     currency: string;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    258[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     paymentMethod: 'stripe' | 'paypal';
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    259[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     description: string;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    260[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     metadata?: Record<string, any>;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    261[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   }): Promise<Payment> {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    262[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     const customer = this.customers.get(paymentData.customerId);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    263[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     if (!customer) {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    264[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       throw new BadRequestException('Customer not found');
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    265[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    266[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    267[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     const paymentId = this.generateId();
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    268[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    269[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     const payment: Payment = {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    270[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       id: paymentId,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    271[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       customerId: paymentData.customerId,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    272[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       amount: paymentData.amount,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    273[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       currency: paymentData.currency,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    274[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       status: 'pending',
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    275[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       paymentMethod: paymentData.paymentMethod,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    276[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       description: paymentData.description,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    277[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       metadata: paymentData.metadata || {},
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    278[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       createdAt: new Date(),
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    279[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       updatedAt: new Date(),
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    280[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     };
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    281[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    282[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     this.payments.set(paymentId, payment);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    283[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    284[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     // Queue for processing
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    285[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     await this.paymentQueue.add('process-payment', {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    286[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       paymentId,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    287[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       customerId: paymentData.customerId,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    288[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       amount: paymentData.amount,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    289[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       currency: paymentData.currency,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    290[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       paymentMethod: paymentData.paymentMethod,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    291[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     });
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    292[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    293[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     this.logger.log(`Payment created: ${paymentId} for ${paymentData.amount} ${paymentData.currency}`);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    294[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     return payment;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    295[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    296[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    297[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   async processStripePayment(
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    298[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     paymentId: string,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    299[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     customerId: string,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    300[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     amount: number,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    301[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     currency: string
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    302[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   ): Promise<void> {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    303[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     if (!this.stripe) {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    304[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       throw new Error('Stripe not configured');
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    305[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    306[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    307[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     const payment = this.payments.get(paymentId);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    308[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     const customer = this.customers.get(customerId);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    309[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    310[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     if (!payment || !customer) {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    311[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       throw new Error('Payment or customer not found');
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    312[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    313[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    314[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     try {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    315[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       payment.status = 'processing';
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    316[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       this.payments.set(paymentId, payment);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    317[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    318[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       // Create payment intent
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    319[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       const paymentIntent = await this.stripe.paymentIntents.create({
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    320[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         amount,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    321[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         currency,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    322[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         customer: customer.stripeCustomerId,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    323[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         description: payment.description,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    324[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         metadata: {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    325[39m:[38;5;10m[49m           paymentId,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    326[39m:[38;5;10m[49m           customerId,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    327[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         },
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    328[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       });
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    329[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    330[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       payment.paymentIntentId = paymentIntent.id;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    331[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       payment.status = paymentIntent.status === 'succeeded' ? 'succeeded' : 'processing';
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    332[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       payment.updatedAt = new Date();
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    333[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    334[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       this.payments.set(paymentId, payment);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    335[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    336[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       this.logger.log(`Stripe payment processed: ${paymentId} (${paymentIntent.id})`);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    337[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    338[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     } catch (error) {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    339[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       payment.status = 'failed';
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    340[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       payment.failureReason = error.message;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    341[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       payment.updatedAt = new Date();
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    342[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       this.payments.set(paymentId, payment);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    343[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    344[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       this.logger.error(`Stripe payment failed: ${paymentId}`, error);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    345[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       throw error;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    346[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    347[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    348[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    349[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   // Subscription Management
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    350[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   async createSubscription(subscriptionData: {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    351[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     customerId: string;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    352[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     planId: string;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    353[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     trialEnd?: Date;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    354[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     metadata?: Record<string, any>;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    355[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   }): Promise<Subscription> {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    356[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     const customer = this.customers.get(subscriptionData.customerId);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    357[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     const plan = this.plans.get(subscriptionData.planId);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    358[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    359[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     if (!customer || !plan) {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    360[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       throw new BadRequestException('Customer or plan not found');
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    361[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    362[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    363[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     const subscriptionId = this.generateId();
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    364[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     const now = new Date();
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    365[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     const periodEnd = new Date(now);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    366[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    367[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     // Calculate period end based on plan interval
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    368[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     switch (plan.interval) {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    369[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       case 'day':
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    370[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         periodEnd.setDate(periodEnd.getDate() + plan.intervalCount);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    371[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         break;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    372[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       case 'week':
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    373[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         periodEnd.setDate(periodEnd.getDate() + (plan.intervalCount * 7));
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    374[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         break;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    375[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       case 'month':
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    376[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         periodEnd.setMonth(periodEnd.getMonth() + plan.intervalCount);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    377[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         break;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    378[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       case 'year':
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    379[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         periodEnd.setFullYear(periodEnd.getFullYear() + plan.intervalCount);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    380[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         break;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    381[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    382[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    383[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     let stripeSubscriptionId: string | undefined;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    384[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    385[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     if (this.stripe && customer.stripeCustomerId && plan.stripePriceId) {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    386[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       try {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    387[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         const stripeSubscription = await this.stripe.subscriptions.create({
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    388[39m:[38;5;10m[49m           customer: customer.stripeCustomerId,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    389[39m:[38;5;10m[49m           items: [{ price: plan.stripePriceId }],
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    390[39m:[38;5;10m[49m           trial_end: subscriptionData.trialEnd ? Math.floor(subscriptionData.trialEnd.getTime() / 1000) : undefined,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    391[39m:[38;5;10m[49m           metadata: subscriptionData.metadata || {},
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    392[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         });
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    393[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         stripeSubscriptionId = stripeSubscription.id;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    394[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       } catch (error) {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    395[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         this.logger.error('Failed to create Stripe subscription:', error);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    396[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    397[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    398[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    399[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     const subscription: Subscription = {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    400[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       id: subscriptionId,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    401[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       customerId: subscriptionData.customerId,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    402[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       planId: subscriptionData.planId,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    403[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       status: subscriptionData.trialEnd ? 'trialing' : 'active',
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    404[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       currentPeriodStart: now,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    405[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       currentPeriodEnd: periodEnd,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    406[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       trialEnd: subscriptionData.trialEnd,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    407[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       cancelAtPeriodEnd: false,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    408[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       stripeSubscriptionId,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    409[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       metadata: subscriptionData.metadata || {},
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    410[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       createdAt: new Date(),
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    411[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       updatedAt: new Date(),
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    412[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     };
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    413[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    414[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     this.subscriptions.set(subscriptionId, subscription);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    415[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     this.logger.log(`Subscription created: ${subscriptionId} for plan ${subscriptionData.planId}`);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    416[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    417[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     return subscription;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    418[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    419[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    420[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   async cancelSubscription(subscriptionId: string, cancelAtPeriodEnd: boolean = true): Promise<Subscription> {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    421[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     const subscription = this.subscriptions.get(subscriptionId);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    422[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     if (!subscription) {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    423[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       throw new BadRequestException('Subscription not found');
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    424[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    425[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    426[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     if (cancelAtPeriodEnd) {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    427[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       subscription.cancelAtPeriodEnd = true;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    428[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       subscription.status = 'active'; // Keep active until period end
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    429[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     } else {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    430[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       subscription.status = 'canceled';
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    431[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    432[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    433[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     subscription.updatedAt = new Date();
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    434[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     this.subscriptions.set(subscriptionId, subscription);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    435[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    436[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     // Cancel in Stripe if applicable
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    437[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     if (this.stripe && subscription.stripeSubscriptionId) {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    438[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       try {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    439[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         await this.stripe.subscriptions.update(subscription.stripeSubscriptionId, {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    440[39m:[38;5;10m[49m           cancel_at_period_end: cancelAtPeriodEnd,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    441[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         });
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    442[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       } catch (error) {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    443[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         this.logger.error('Failed to cancel Stripe subscription:', error);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    444[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    445[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    446[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    447[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     this.logger.log(`Subscription ${cancelAtPeriodEnd ? 'scheduled for cancellation' : 'canceled'}: ${subscriptionId}`);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    448[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     return subscription;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    449[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    450[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    451[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   // Invoice Management
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    452[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   async generateInvoice(invoiceData: {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    453[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     customerId: string;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    454[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     subscriptionId?: string;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    455[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     items: Omit<InvoiceItem, 'id' | 'totalAmount'>[];
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    456[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     dueDate: Date;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    457[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     taxRate?: number;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    458[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     discountAmount?: number;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    459[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   }): Promise<Invoice> {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    460[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     const customer = this.customers.get(invoiceData.customerId);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    461[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     if (!customer) {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    462[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       throw new BadRequestException('Customer not found');
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    463[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    464[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    465[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     const invoiceId = this.generateId();
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    466[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    467[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     // Calculate amounts
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    468[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     const items: InvoiceItem[] = invoiceData.items.map(item => ({
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    469[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       ...item,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    470[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       id: this.generateId(),
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    471[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       totalAmount: new Decimal(item.quantity).mul(item.unitAmount).toNumber(),
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    472[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     }));
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    473[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    474[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     const subtotal = items.reduce((sum, item) => sum + item.totalAmount, 0);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    475[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     const taxAmount = new Decimal(subtotal).mul(invoiceData.taxRate || 0).toNumber();
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    476[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     const discountAmount = invoiceData.discountAmount || 0;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    477[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     const totalAmount = subtotal + taxAmount - discountAmount;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    478[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    479[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     const invoice: Invoice = {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    480[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       id: invoiceId,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    481[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       customerId: invoiceData.customerId,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    482[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       subscriptionId: invoiceData.subscriptionId,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    483[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       amount: subtotal,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    484[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       currency: 'usd', // Default currency
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    485[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       status: 'draft',
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    486[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       dueDate: invoiceData.dueDate,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    487[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       items,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    488[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       taxAmount,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    489[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       discountAmount,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    490[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       totalAmount,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    491[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       createdAt: new Date(),
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    492[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     };
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    493[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    494[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     this.invoices.set(invoiceId, invoice);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    495[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    496[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     // Queue for PDF generation
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    497[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     await this.invoiceQueue.add('generate-invoice-pdf', {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    498[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       invoiceId,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    499[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       customerId: invoiceData.customerId,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    500[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     });
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    501[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    502[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     this.logger.log(`Invoice generated: ${invoiceId} for customer ${invoiceData.customerId}`);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    503[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     return invoice;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    504[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    505[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    506[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   // Scheduled Tasks
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    507[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   @Cron(CronExpression.EVERY_DAY_AT_MIDNIGHT)
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    508[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   async processSubscriptionRenewals(): Promise<void> {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    509[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     this.logger.debug('Processing subscription renewals');
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    510[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    511[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     const now = new Date();
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    512[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     const subscriptionsToRenew = Array.from(this.subscriptions.values())
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    513[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       .filter(sub => 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    514[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         sub.status === 'active' && 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    515[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         sub.currentPeriodEnd <= now &&
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    516[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         !sub.cancelAtPeriodEnd
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    517[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       );
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    518[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    519[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     for (const subscription of subscriptionsToRenew) {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    520[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       await this.subscriptionQueue.add('renew-subscription', {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    521[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         subscriptionId: subscription.id,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    522[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       });
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    523[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    524[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    525[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     this.logger.log(`Queued ${subscriptionsToRenew.length} subscriptions for renewal`);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    526[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    527[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    528[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   @Cron(CronExpression.EVERY_DAY_AT_1AM)
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    529[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   async processOverdueInvoices(): Promise<void> {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    530[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     this.logger.debug('Processing overdue invoices');
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    531[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    532[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     const now = new Date();
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    533[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     const overdueInvoices = Array.from(this.invoices.values())
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    534[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       .filter(invoice => 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    535[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         invoice.status === 'open' && 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    536[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         invoice.dueDate < now
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    537[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       );
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    538[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    539[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     for (const invoice of overdueInvoices) {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    540[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       // Send overdue notice
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    541[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       this.logger.warn(`Invoice overdue: ${invoice.id}`);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    542[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    543[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       // In a real implementation, you would:
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    544[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       // 1. Send overdue notification
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    545[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       // 2. Apply late fees
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    546[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       // 3. Suspend services if needed
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    547[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       // 4. Start collection process
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    548[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    549[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    550[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    551[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   // Analytics and Reporting
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    552[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   async getPaymentAnalytics(period: 'day' | 'week' | 'month' | 'year' = 'month'): Promise<{
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    553[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     totalRevenue: number;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    554[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     totalTransactions: number;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    555[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     averageTransactionValue: number;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    556[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     successRate: number;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    557[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     topPaymentMethods: Array<{ method: string; count: number; revenue: number }>;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    558[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     revenueByDay: Array<{ date: string; revenue: number }>;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    559[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   }> {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    560[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     const payments = Array.from(this.payments.values());
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    561[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     const successfulPayments = payments.filter(p => p.status === 'succeeded');
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    562[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    563[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     const totalRevenue = successfulPayments.reduce((sum, p) => sum + p.amount, 0);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    564[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     const totalTransactions = payments.length;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    565[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     const averageTransactionValue = totalRevenue / (successfulPayments.length || 1);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    566[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     const successRate = (successfulPayments.length / (totalTransactions || 1)) * 100;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    567[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    568[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     // Group by payment method
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    569[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     const methodStats = new Map<string, { count: number; revenue: number }>();
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    570[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     successfulPayments.forEach(payment => {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    571[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       const existing = methodStats.get(payment.paymentMethod) || { count: 0, revenue: 0 };
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    572[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       existing.count++;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    573[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       existing.revenue += payment.amount;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    574[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       methodStats.set(payment.paymentMethod, existing);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    575[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     });
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    576[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    577[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     const topPaymentMethods = Array.from(methodStats.entries())
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    578[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       .map(([method, stats]) => ({ method, ...stats }))
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    579[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       .sort((a, b) => b.revenue - a.revenue);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    580[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    581[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     // Revenue by day (mock data for now)
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    582[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     const revenueByDay = this.generateRevenueByDay(period);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    583[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    584[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     return {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    585[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       totalRevenue,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    586[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       totalTransactions,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    587[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       averageTransactionValue,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    588[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       successRate,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    589[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       topPaymentMethods,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    590[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       revenueByDay,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    591[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     };
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    592[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    593[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    594[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   private generateRevenueByDay(period: string): Array<{ date: string; revenue: number }> {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    595[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     const days = period === 'week' ? 7 : period === 'month' ? 30 : 365;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    596[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     const data = [];
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    597[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    598[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     for (let i = days - 1; i >= 0; i--) {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    599[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       const date = new Date();
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    600[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       date.setDate(date.getDate() - i);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    601[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    602[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       data.push({
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    603[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         date: date.toISOString().split('T')[0],
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    604[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         revenue: Math.floor(Math.random() * 10000) + 1000,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    605[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       });
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    606[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    607[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    608[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     return data;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    609[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    610[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    611[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   // Helper methods

[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    613[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     return `${Date.now()}_${Math.random().toString(36).substr(2, 9)}`;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    614[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   }

[49m[38;5;10m+      1[39m:[38;5;10m[49m import { Injectable, Logger } from '@nestjs/common';
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+      2[39m:[38;5;10m[49m import { Client } from '@elastic/elasticsearch';
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+      3[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+      4[39m:[38;5;10m[49m export interface SearchDocument {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+      5[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   id: string;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+      6[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   title: string;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+      7[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   content: string;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+      8[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   type: string;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+      9[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   userId: string;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     10[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   tags: string[];
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     11[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   metadata: Record<string, any>;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     12[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   createdAt: Date;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     13[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   updatedAt: Date;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     14[39m:[38;5;10m[49m }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     15[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     16[39m:[38;5;10m[49m export interface SearchResult {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     17[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   id: string;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     18[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   title: string;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     19[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   content: string;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     20[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   type: string;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     21[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   score: number;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     22[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   highlights: Record<string, string[]>;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     23[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   metadata: Record<string, any>;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     24[39m:[38;5;10m[49m }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     25[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     26[39m:[38;5;10m[49m @Injectable()
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     27[39m:[38;5;10m[49m export class SearchService {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     28[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   private readonly logger = new Logger(SearchService.name);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     29[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   private client: Client;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     30[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   private readonly indexName = 'nexus-search';
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     31[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     32[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   constructor() {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     33[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     this.initializeElasticsearch();
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     34[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     35[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     36[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   private initializeElasticsearch(): void {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     37[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     this.client = new Client({
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     38[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       node: process.env.ELASTICSEARCH_URL || 'http://localhost:9200',
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     39[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       auth: {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     40[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         username: process.env.ELASTICSEARCH_USERNAME || 'elastic',
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     41[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         password: process.env.ELASTICSEARCH_PASSWORD || 'changeme',
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     42[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       },
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     43[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     });
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     44[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     45[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     this.logger.log('Elasticsearch client initialized');
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     46[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     47[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     48[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   async indexDocument(document: SearchDocument): Promise<void> {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     49[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     try {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     50[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       await this.client.index({
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     51[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         index: this.indexName,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     52[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         id: document.id,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     53[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         body: document,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     54[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       });
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     55[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     56[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       this.logger.debug(`Document indexed: ${document.id}`);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     57[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     } catch (error) {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     58[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       this.logger.error(`Failed to index document ${document.id}:`, error);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     59[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       throw error;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     60[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     61[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     62[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     63[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   async search(
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     64[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     query: string,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     65[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     options: {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     66[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       type?: string;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     67[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       userId?: string;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     68[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       tags?: string[];
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     69[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       limit?: number;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     70[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       offset?: number;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     71[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     } = {}
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     72[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   ): Promise<{
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     73[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     results: SearchResult[];
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     74[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     total: number;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     75[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     took: number;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     76[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   }> {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     77[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     try {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     78[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       const searchBody: any = {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     79[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         query: {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     80[39m:[38;5;10m[49m           bool: {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     81[39m:[38;5;10m[49m             must: [
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     82[39m:[38;5;10m[49m               {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     83[39m:[38;5;10m[49m                 multi_match: {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     84[39m:[38;5;10m[49m                   query,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     85[39m:[38;5;10m[49m                   fields: ['title^2', 'content', 'tags'],
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     86[39m:[38;5;10m[49m                   type: 'best_fields',
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     87[39m:[38;5;10m[49m                   fuzziness: 'AUTO',
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     88[39m:[38;5;10m[49m                 },
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     89[39m:[38;5;10m[49m               },
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     90[39m:[38;5;10m[49m             ],
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     91[39m:[38;5;10m[49m             filter: [],
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     92[39m:[38;5;10m[49m           },
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     93[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         },
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     94[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         highlight: {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     95[39m:[38;5;10m[49m           fields: {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     96[39m:[38;5;10m[49m             title: {},
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     97[39m:[38;5;10m[49m             content: {},
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     98[39m:[38;5;10m[49m           },
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     99[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         },
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    100[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         size: options.limit || 20,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    101[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         from: options.offset || 0,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    102[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       };
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    103[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    104[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       // Add filters
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    105[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       if (options.type) {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    106[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         searchBody.query.bool.filter.push({ term: { type: options.type } });
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    107[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    108[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    109[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       if (options.userId) {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    110[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         searchBody.query.bool.filter.push({ term: { userId: options.userId } });
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    111[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    112[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    113[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       if (options.tags && options.tags.length > 0) {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    114[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         searchBody.query.bool.filter.push({ terms: { tags: options.tags } });
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    115[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    116[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    117[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       const response = await this.client.search({
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    118[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         index: this.indexName,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    119[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         body: searchBody,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    120[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       });
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    121[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    122[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       const results: SearchResult[] = response.body.hits.hits.map((hit: any) => ({
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    123[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         id: hit._id,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    124[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         title: hit._source.title,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    125[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         content: hit._source.content,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    126[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         type: hit._source.type,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    127[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         score: hit._score,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    128[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         highlights: hit.highlight || {},
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    129[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         metadata: hit._source.metadata,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    130[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       }));
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    131[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    132[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       return {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    133[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         results,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    134[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         total: response.body.hits.total.value,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    135[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         took: response.body.took,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    136[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       };
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    137[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     } catch (error) {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    138[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       this.logger.error('Search failed:', error);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    139[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       throw error;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    140[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    141[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    142[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    143[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   async suggest(query: string, field: string = 'title'): Promise<string[]> {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    144[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     try {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    145[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       const response = await this.client.search({
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    146[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         index: this.indexName,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    147[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         body: {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    148[39m:[38;5;10m[49m           suggest: {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    149[39m:[38;5;10m[49m             suggestions: {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    150[39m:[38;5;10m[49m               text: query,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    151[39m:[38;5;10m[49m               completion: {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    152[39m:[38;5;10m[49m                 field: `${field}.suggest`,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    153[39m:[38;5;10m[49m                 size: 10,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    154[39m:[38;5;10m[49m               },
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    155[39m:[38;5;10m[49m             },
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    156[39m:[38;5;10m[49m           },
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    157[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         },
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    158[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       });
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    159[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    160[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       return response.body.suggest.suggestions[0].options.map((option: any) => option.text);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    161[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     } catch (error) {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    162[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       this.logger.error('Suggestion failed:', error);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    163[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       return [];
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    164[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    165[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   }

[49m[38;5;10m+      1[39m:[38;5;10m[49m import { Injectable, Logger } from '@nestjs/common';
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+      2[39m:[38;5;10m[49m import * as nodemailer from 'nodemailer';
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+      3[39m:[38;5;10m[49m import * as handlebars from 'handlebars';
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+      4[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+      5[39m:[38;5;10m[49m export interface EmailCampaign {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+      6[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   id: string;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+      7[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   name: string;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+      8[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   subject: string;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+      9[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   template: string;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     10[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   recipients: string[];
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     11[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   status: 'draft' | 'scheduled' | 'sending' | 'sent' | 'paused';
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     12[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   scheduledAt?: Date;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     13[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   sentAt?: Date;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     14[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   stats: {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     15[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     sent: number;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     16[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     delivered: number;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     17[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     opened: number;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     18[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     clicked: number;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     19[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     bounced: number;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     20[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     unsubscribed: number;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     21[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   };
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     22[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   createdAt: Date;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     23[39m:[38;5;10m[49m }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     24[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     25[39m:[38;5;10m[49m @Injectable()
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     26[39m:[38;5;10m[49m export class EmailService {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     27[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   private readonly logger = new Logger(EmailService.name);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     28[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   private transporter: nodemailer.Transporter;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     29[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   private campaigns = new Map<string, EmailCampaign>();
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     30[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     31[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   constructor() {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     32[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     this.initializeTransporter();
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     33[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     34[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     35[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   private initializeTransporter(): void {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     36[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     this.transporter = nodemailer.createTransporter({
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     37[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       host: process.env.SMTP_HOST || 'localhost',
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     38[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       port: parseInt(process.env.SMTP_PORT || '587'),
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     39[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       secure: process.env.SMTP_SECURE === 'true',
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     40[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       auth: {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     41[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         user: process.env.SMTP_USER,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     42[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         pass: process.env.SMTP_PASS,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     43[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       },
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     44[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     });
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     45[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     46[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     47[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   async createCampaign(campaignData: {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     48[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     name: string;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     49[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     subject: string;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     50[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     template: string;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     51[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     recipients: string[];
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     52[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     scheduledAt?: Date;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     53[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   }): Promise<EmailCampaign> {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     54[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     const campaignId = this.generateId();
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     55[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     56[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     const campaign: EmailCampaign = {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     57[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       id: campaignId,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     58[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       name: campaignData.name,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     59[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       subject: campaignData.subject,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     60[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       template: campaignData.template,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     61[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       recipients: campaignData.recipients,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     62[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       status: campaignData.scheduledAt ? 'scheduled' : 'draft',
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     63[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       scheduledAt: campaignData.scheduledAt,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     64[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       stats: {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     65[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         sent: 0,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     66[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         delivered: 0,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     67[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         opened: 0,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     68[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         clicked: 0,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     69[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         bounced: 0,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     70[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         unsubscribed: 0,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     71[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       },
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     72[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       createdAt: new Date(),
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     73[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     };
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     74[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     75[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     this.campaigns.set(campaignId, campaign);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     76[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     this.logger.log(`Email campaign created: ${campaignData.name} (${campaignId})`);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     77[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     78[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     return campaign;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     79[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     80[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     81[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   async sendCampaign(campaignId: string): Promise<void> {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     82[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     const campaign = this.campaigns.get(campaignId);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     83[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     if (!campaign) {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     84[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       throw new Error(`Campaign ${campaignId} not found`);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     85[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     86[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     87[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     campaign.status = 'sending';
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     88[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     this.campaigns.set(campaignId, campaign);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     89[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     90[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     try {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     91[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       for (const recipient of campaign.recipients) {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     92[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         await this.sendEmail({
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     93[39m:[38;5;10m[49m           to: recipient,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     94[39m:[38;5;10m[49m           subject: campaign.subject,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     95[39m:[38;5;10m[49m           template: campaign.template,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     96[39m:[38;5;10m[49m           data: { recipient },
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     97[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         });
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     98[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     99[39m:[38;5;10m[49m         campaign.stats.sent++;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    100[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    101[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    102[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       campaign.status = 'sent';
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    103[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       campaign.sentAt = new Date();
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    104[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       this.campaigns.set(campaignId, campaign);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    105[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    106[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       this.logger.log(`Campaign sent: ${campaignId} to ${campaign.recipients.length} recipients`);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    107[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     } catch (error) {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    108[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       campaign.status = 'draft';
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    109[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       this.campaigns.set(campaignId, campaign);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    110[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       this.logger.error(`Campaign failed: ${campaignId}`, error);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    111[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       throw error;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    112[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    113[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    114[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    115[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   private async sendEmail(emailData: {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    116[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     to: string;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    117[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     subject: string;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    118[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     template: string;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    119[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     data: Record<string, any>;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    120[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   }): Promise<void> {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    121[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     const compiledTemplate = handlebars.compile(emailData.template);

[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     69[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     const syncKey = `${syncRequest.userId}_${syncRequest.deviceId}`;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     70[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     71[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     // Simulate conflict detection and resolution

[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     73[39m:[38;5;10m[49m

[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     79[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       conflicts,
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     80[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     };
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     81[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     82[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     this.syncData.set(syncKey, syncData);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     83[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     84[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     // Update device last sync
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     85[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     const deviceKey = `${syncRequest.userId}_${syncRequest.deviceId}`;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     86[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     const device = this.devices.get(deviceKey);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     87[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     if (device) {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     88[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       device.lastSyncAt = new Date();
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     89[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       this.devices.set(deviceKey, device);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     90[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     91[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     92[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     this.logger.debug(`Data synced for device ${syncRequest.deviceId}`);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     93[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     return syncData;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     94[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     95[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     96[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   private detectConflicts(data: Record<string, any>): Array<{
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     97[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     field: string;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     98[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     localValue: any;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+     99[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     serverValue: any;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    100[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     resolution: 'local' | 'server' | 'merge';
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    101[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   }> {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    102[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     // Simulate conflict detection logic
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    103[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     const conflicts = [];
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    104[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    105[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     // In a real implementation, you would compare with server data
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    106[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     // and detect conflicts based on timestamps, versions, etc.
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    107[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    108[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     return conflicts;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    109[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   }
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    110[39m:[38;5;10m[49m 
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    111[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   async getDeviceAnalytics(): Promise<{
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    112[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     totalDevices: number;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    113[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     activeDevices: number;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    114[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     platformBreakdown: Record<string, number>;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    115[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     appVersions: Record<string, number>;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    116[39m:[38;5;10m[49m   }> {
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    117[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     const devices = Array.from(this.devices.values());
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    118[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     const activeDevices = devices.filter(d => d.isActive);
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    119[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    120[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     const platformBreakdown: Record<string, number> = {};
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    121[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     const appVersions: Record<string, number> = {};
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    122[39m:[38;5;10m[49m

[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    124[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       platformBreakdown[device.platform] = (platformBreakdown[device.platform] || 0) + 1;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    125[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       appVersions[device.appVersion] = (appVersions[device.appVersion] || 0) + 1;
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    126[39m:[38;5;10m[49m     });
[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    127[39m:[38;5;10m[49m

[0m[49m[38;5;10m+    129[39m:[38;5;10m[49m       totalDevices: devices.length,
